3032.rule: Score this immediately if three or more friendly fighters made a successful Attack action in this phase. *(Able to be scored if you draw this card after the condition was met)*.

3033.name: Execution
3033.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband took an enemy leader out of action in the preceding action phase.

3034.name: Swarming Spirits
3034.rule: Score this immediately if two or more friendly fighters moved through a hex occupied by an enemy fighter in this phase. *(Able to be scored if you draw this card after the condition was met)*.

3035.name: Take the City
3035.rule: Score this in an end phase if you hold all objectives on one or more game boards.

3036.name: The Vengeful Dead
3036.rule: Score this in an end phase if all surviving friendly fighters (at least three) are Inspired.

3037.name: Treacherous Foe
3037.rule: Score this immediately if your warband makes a reaction.

3038.name: Vengeful Advance
3038.rule: Score this in an end phase if all surviving friendly fighters are *in your opponent's territory*.

3039.name: Drifting Advance
3039.rule: Push all friendly Chainrasps up to two hexes. This push must take them closer to the nearest enemy fighter in each case. If there is more than one nearest enemy fighter, you can choose which the Chainrasp is pushed towards.

3040.name: Endless Malice
3040.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action that fails. That fighter can make another Attack action that targets the same fighter.

3041.name: Grasping Chains
3041.rule: Each friendly Chainrasp providing support in the first Attack action in the next activation is considered to be two supporting fighters.

3042.name: Howling Vortex
3042.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If this spell is cast, push all enemy fighters up to one hex.

3043.name: Maddening Cackle
3043.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an enemy fighter's Attack action that fails. That fighter is no longer Inspired, and cannot be Inspired. This effect persists.

3044.name: Rending Scream
3044.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel::MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, each enemy fighter adjacent to the caster suffers 1 damage.

3045.name: Spectral Parry
3045.rule: Choose a friendly fighter that does not have a Guard token. Place a Guard token next to them.

3046.name: Spectral Touch
3046.rule: The first Attack action in the next activation has Cleave.

3047.name: Sudden Appearance
3047.rule: Choose a friendly fighter and place them on any starting hex.

3048.name: Vengeful Curse
3048.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an enemy fighter's Attack action that takes an adjacent friendly fighter out of action. Their attacker suffers 1 damage.

3049.name: Chill Touch
3049.rule: Rolls of :dfDodge: are not successes for defence rolls made during Attack actions made by this fighter.

3050.name: Creeping Terror
3050.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter makes a Move action, roll an attack dice for the first enemy fighter they moved through in that action. On a :atSmash: or :atCrit:, the enemy fighter suffers 1 damage.

3051.name: Curse of Unbinding
3051.rule: **Reaction:** During an enemy fighter's spell or spell Attack action, if the spell is cast and the caster is within three hexes of this fighter, roll a magic dice. On a roll of :MagFocus: that spell is not cast and is not resolved.

3052.name: Driven by Hatred
3052.rule: +1 Dice to their Attack action when this fighter makes a Charge action.

3053.name: Face of Death
3053.rule: **Reaction:** During an adjacent enemy fighter's Attack action, before any dice are rolled, roll a defence dice. On a roll of :dfBlock: or :dfCrit:, your opponent rolls 1 fewer dice for that Attack action (to a minimum of 1).

3054.name: Grasping Thorns
3054.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's successful Attack action, you can push the target of that Attack action up to two hexes. They must end this push adjacent to this fighter.

3055.name: Inescapable Vengeance
3055.rule: When this fighter makes a Move or Charge action, instead of moving them normally you can place them on any starting hex.

3056.name: Sadistic Strike
3056.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 3 - :boom: 1] \n If the target has any wound tokens, this Attack action deals +2 Damage.

3057.name: Shacklegheist Chains
3057.rule: When this fighter's Attack action takes an enemy fighter out of action, gain 1 additional glory point.

3059.name: Agents of Change
3059.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband successfully cast four or more spells in the preceding action phase.

3060.name: Bind the City
3060.rule: Score this in an end phase if you hold three or more objectives.

3061.name: Chosen by Destiny
3061.rule: Score this in an end phase if either Narvia or Turosh from your warband is on the battlefield and the other is out of action.

3062.name: Eyes of the Master
3062.rule: Score this in an end phase if there is at least one friendly fighter in each of the following: your territory, enemy territory, and no one's territory.

3063.name: Harness Knowledge
3063.rule: Score this in an end phase if the same friendly fighter has held the same objective at the end of two consecutive action phases.

3064.name: Master of Magic
3064.rule: Score this immediately if your warband successfully casts two or more spells in this phase. *(Able to be scored if you draw this card after the condition was met)*.

3065.name: Rising Inferno
3065.rule: Score this in an end phase if you caused 4 or more damage with spells in the preceding action phase.

3066.name: Summoner
3066.rule: Score this immediately the second or subsequent time you use Vortemis' action to summon a Blue Horror.

3067.name: Ultimate Change
3067.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband took two or more enemy fighters out of action in the preceding action phase.

3068.name: Blessing of Tzeentch
3068.rule: **Innate (:MagChannel:)** for the first spell your warband attempts to cast in the next activation.

3069.name: Bound by Fate
3069.rule: Choose two friendly fighters that are within three hexes of each other. Switch their positions.

3070.name: Deceitful Step
3070.rule: Choose a friendly fighter that is not adjacent to an enemy fighter and roll a magic dice. On a roll of :MagChannel:, place them on any starting hex. Otherwise, place them on any objective token. If you cannot, nothing happens.

3071.name: Driven by Ambition
3071.rule: The first friendly fighter to make a Move action (not as part of a Charge action) in the next activation has +2 Move.

3072.name: Eidetic Memory
3072.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an Attack action made by friendly K'charik that fails. They can make another Attack action which targets the same fighter.

3073.name: Malicious Flames
3073.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during an Attack action or gambit that has dealt enough damage to a friendly Brimstone Horrors to take it out of action, but before removing the fighter from the battlefield. Adjacent enemy fighters suffer 1 damage.

3074.name: Ravenous Flame
3074.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If this spell is cast, Scatter 3 from any lethal hex. Any fighters in any hex in the chain suffer 1 damage.

3075.name: Shield of Fate
3075.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If this spell is cast, the caster has +1 Defence. This spell persists until the caster is out of action or the end of the round, whichever happens first.

3076.name: Stolen Fate
3076.rule: You can re-roll one dice for the attack roll of the first Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation.

3077.name: Wracking Change
3077.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel::MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast choose an enemy fighter within 4 hexes of the caster. That fighter suffers 1 damage and 1 additional damage for each :atCrit: in the casting roll.

3078.name: Arcanite Shield
3078.rule: This fighter's Defence characteristic changes to :dfBlock:.

3080.name: Empowered Sorcery
3080.rule: +1 Damage to all spell Attack actions.

3081.name: Fateward
3081.rule: You can re-roll the defence roll for this fighter when it is the target of an Attack action.

3082.name: Fiery Blessing
3082.rule: +1 Dice to this fighter's Attack actions that have a Range of 3 or more.

3084.name: Scroll of the Dark Arts
3084.rule: This fighter's Sorcerous Bolt Attack action has +1 Range.

3085.name: Silver Tether
3085.rule: If this fighter is holding an objective in the third end phase, score 1 glory point.

3087.name: Strength of Arrogance
3087.rule: +1 Damage to all Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2.

3088.name: Call that a Win
3088.rule: Score this in the third end phase if there are five or more surviving friendly fighters.

3089.name: Dank Haven
3089.rule: Score this in the third end phase if there are no enemy fighters in your territory.

3090.name: Flash Finale
3090.rule: Score this immediately if an enemy fighter is taken out of action by a spell cast by your warband.

3091.name: Infestation
3091.rule: Score this in an end phase if you hold *every objective*.

3092.name: Mad Scurry
3092.rule: Score this in an end phase if at least five of your surviving fighters made a Move action in the preceding action phase.

3093.name: Malicious Kill
3093.rule: Score this immediately if your warband takes an enemy fighter with two or more upgrades out of action.

3094.name: Obliterated
3094.rule: Score this immediately if a friendly Snirk Sourtongue is Inspired and takes an enemy fighter out of action.

3095.name: Scragged
3095.rule: Score this immediately if an enemy fighter is taken out of action while adjacent to three or more friendly fighters.

3096.name: Vicious Killers
3096.rule: Score this in an end phase if two or more friendly fighters made successful Attack actions that targeted the same fighter, and that fighter was taken out of action, in the preceding action phase.

3097.name: Curse of da Bad Moon
3097.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus::MagFocus:):** If this spell is cast, choose a hex within four hexes of the caster. Any fighter in that hex or any hex adjacent to it suffers 1 damage.

3098.name: Fungal Blessing
3098.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an enemy fighter's Attack action that takes an adjacent friendly fighter out of action. Their attacker suffers 1 damage.

3099.name: Jealous Hex
3099.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If this spell is cast, choose a fighter that has the highest Wounds characteristic on the battlefield. That fighter has -1 Wounds (to a minimum of 1). This spell persists until that fighter is out of action.

3100.name: Little Waaagh!
3100.rule: +1 Dice to the first Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation.

3101.name: Madcap Mushroom
3101.rule: **Innate (:MagChannel: :MagFocus:)** for the next spell your warband attempts to cast. The fighter casting the spell suffers 1 damage if there are any :MagCrit: in that casting roll, rather than two or more :MagCrit:.

3102.name: Make Some Noise
3102.rule: Choose up to two friendly Squigs and push each of them up to two hexes.

3103.name: 'Orrible Leer
3103.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If this spell is cast, push each enemy fighter adjacent to the caster up to one hex.

3104.name: Sneaky Stabbin'
3104.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel::MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, +1 Dice and Cleave to the first Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 made by a friendly fighter in the next activation.

3105.name: Sneaky Step
3105.rule: Choose a friendly fighter and push them one hex.

3106.name: Stab 'em in the Knee
3106.rule: If the first Attack action in the next activation has a Range of 1 or 2, it has +1 Damage for each supporting fighter after the first.

3107.name: Endless Whirl
3107.rule: Action: Each adjacent fighter suffers 1 damage. Use this action only if this fighter is Inspired.

3108.name: Extra Bouncy
3108.rule: When this fighter makes a Move or Charge action they can move through other fighters, but their move must end in an empty hex.

3109.name: Fiery Brand
3109.rule: On a critical hit, this fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1 have +1 Damage.

3111.name: Lurker
3111.rule: **Reaction:** After a fighter is pushed a number of hexes, if that fighter was adjacent to this fighter before the push, push this fighter up to the same number of hexes. This fighter must end the push adjacent to the other fighter.

3112.name: Nasty Stabba
3112.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 2] \n This Attack action has +2 Dice if a friendly Prog is supporting this fighter.

3113.name: Ravenous
3113.rule: +1 Damage to this fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1.

3114.name: Sniffer Spite
3114.rule: If this fighter is in enemy territory in the third end phase, gain 1 glory point.

3115.name: Vindictive Glare
3115.rule: [:Hex: 3 - :MagChannel: - - :boom: 1] \n On a critical hit, this Attack action has +1 Damage.

3116.name: Volley Caller
3116.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter makes the Grot Bow Attack action, an adjacent friendly fighter makes their Grot Bow Attack action.

3117.name: A Worthy Skull
3117.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband took an enemy leader out of action in the preceding action phase.

3118.name: Blood for the Blood God!
3118.rule: Score this immediately if three or more of your fighters made a Charge action in this phase. *(Able to be scored if you draw this card after the condition was met)*.

3119.name: Coward!
3119.rule: Score this immediately if an enemy fighter begins a Move action adjacent to one of your fighters and ends it adjacent to none of your fighters.

3120.name: Draw the Gaze of Khorne
3120.rule: Score this immediately if your warband takes two or more enemy fighters out of action in this phase. *(Able to be scored if you draw this card after the condition was met)*.

3121.name: It Begins
3121.rule: Score this in an end phase if at least one fighter from each warband is out of action.

3122.name: Khorne Cares Not
3122.rule: Score this in an end phase if five or more fighters are out of action.

3123.name: Khorne's Champion
3123.rule: Score this in the third end phase if all fighters except one of your fighters are out of action.

3124.name: Let the Blood Flow
3124.rule: Score this immediately if three or more of your fighters made a successful Attack action in this phase. *(Able to be scored if you draw this card after the condition was met)*.

3125.name: There is Only Slaughter
3125.rule: Score this in an end phase if no fighter is holding an objective.

3126.name: Blood Offering
3126.rule: Choose a friendly fighter. They suffer 1 damage. Roll two extra attack dice for their first Attack action in the next activation.

3127.name: Blood Rain
3127.rule: All Attack actions in the next activation have the :atFury: characteristic, even if they would normally have the :atSmash: characteristic.

3128.name: Boon of Khorne
3128.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action that takes an enemy fighter out of action. Remove all wound tokens from one friendly fighter.

3129.name: Desecrate
3129.rule: Remove one objective that you hold from the battlefield.

3130.name: Final Blow
3130.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an enemy fighter's Attack action that takes an adjacent friendly fighter out of action. Their attacker suffers 1 damage.

3131.name: Fuelled by Slaughter
3131.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an Attack action or ploy that takes a fighter out of action. A friendly fighter can make an Attack action.

3132.name: Insensate
3132.rule: The first friendly fighter who suffers any amount of damage in the next activation only suffers one damage.

3133.name: Khorne Calls
3133.rule: Roll one extra attack dice for your first Attack action in the next activation.

3134.name: Rebirth in Blood
3134.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an Attack action or ploy that takes your last surviving fighter out of action. Roll a defence dice. If you roll a :dfBlock: or :dfCrit: remove all wound tokens from them, and place them on a starting hex in your territory.

3135.name: Skulls for the Skull Throne!
3135.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action that takes an enemy fighter out of action. Draw up to two power cards.

3136.name: Berserk Charge
3136.rule: Both :atFury: and :atSmash: symbols are successes when this fighter makes a Charge action.

3138.name: Deadly Spin
3138.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atFury: 3 - :boom: 1] \n Targets adjacent enemy fighters - roll for each.

3139.name: Ever-Advancing
3139.rule: **Reaction:** When this fighter could be driven back during an Attack action (whether or not your opponent chooses to do so), you can instead push them one hex.

3140.name: Frenzy
3140.rule: Roll an extra attack dice when this fighter makes a Charge action.

3141.name: Grisly Trophy
3141.rule: When this fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action, gain 1 additional glory point.

3142.name: Terrifying Howl
3142.rule: **Action:** Push each adjacent enemy fighter one hex.

3143.name: Unstoppable Charge
3143.rule: When this fighter makes a Charge action they can move through other fighters, but their move must end in an empty hex.

3144.name: Whirlwind of Death
3144.rule: +1 Damage to all Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2.

3145.name: Wicked Blade
3145.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atFury: 3 - :boom: 2] \n If you roll at least one :atCrit: this Attack action has Cleave.

3146.name: Awe-Inspiring
3146.rule: Score this immediately if your warband has taken two or more fighters out of action in this phase. *(Able to be scored if you draw this card after the condition was met)*.

3147.name: Cleanse
3147.rule: Score this in an end phase if you hold all objectives *in enemy territory*.

3148.name: Consecrated Area
3148.rule: Score this in an end phase if  there are no enemy fighters adjacent to your fighters.

3149.name: Eternals
3149.rule: Score this in the third end phase if none of your fighters are out of action.

3150.name: Immovable Object
3150.rule: Score this in an end phase if  the same friendly fighter has held the same objective at the end of two consecutive action phases.

3151.name: Lightning Strikes
3151.rule: Score this immediately if an enemy fighter is taken out of action by a Charge action made by one of your fighters.

3152.name: Seize Ground
3152.rule: Score this in an end phase if  you hold an objective in enemy territory.

3153.name: Sigmar's Bulwark
3153.rule: Score this in an end phase if none of your fighters suffered any damage in the preceding action phase.

3154.name: Slayers of Tyrants
3154.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband took an enemy leader out of action in the preceding action phase.

3155.name: Heroic Guard
3155.rule: Choose a friendly fighter and put them on Guard.

3156.name: Peal of Thunder
3156.rule: Choose any enemy fighter and push them one hex in any direction.

3157.name: Righteous Zeal
3157.rule: +1 Damage to the first Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 in the next activation.

3158.name: Sigmarite Wall
3158.rule: Choose two adjacent friendly fighters and put them on Guard.

3159.name: Stormforged Resistance
3159.rule: Friendly fighters cannot be driven back by the first Attack action in the next activation.

3160.name: Stormforged Tactics
3160.rule: In the next activation, you can make the following Reaction. \n **Reaction:** After an enemy fighter's Attack action that fails, choose up to two friendly fighters and push them up to one hex each.

3161.name: Tireless Assault
3161.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action that fails. That fighter can make another Attack action that targets the same fighter.

3162.name: Undaunted
3162.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an Attack action or ploy that takes a friendly fighter out of action leaving one surviving friendly fighter on the battlefield. Remove all wound tokens from the surviving fighter.

3163.name: Unstoppable Strike
3163.rule: The first Attack action in the next activation gains Cleave.

3164.name: Valiant Attack
3164.rule: Enemy fighters cannot support the target of the first Attack action in the next activation.

3166.name: Block
3166.rule: **Action:** This fighter and all adjacent friendly fighters go on Guard.

3167.name: Brave Strike
3167.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 2] \n Roll an extra attack dice if there are no adjacent friendly fighters.

3168.name: Fatal Riposte
3168.rule: **Reaction:** During an Attack action that targets this fighter and fails, roll an attack dice. On a roll of :atSmash: or :atCrit: this fighter cannot be driven back and they can make an Attack action. It must target the attacker.

3169.name: Heroic Might
3169.rule: This fighter's Attack action gains Cleave.

3170.name: Heroic Stride
3170.rule: **Reaction:** After an enemy fighter ends their activation within two hexes of this fighter, you can push this fighter one hex.

3171.name: Lightning Blade
3171.rule: [:Hex: 2 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 1] \n On a critical hit, this Attack action has +1 Damage.

3172.name: Lightning Blast
3172.rule: When they make a critical hit, this fighter also inflicts 1 damage on enemy fighters adjacent to the target's hex.

3173.name: Righteous Strike
3173.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 3 - :boom: 2] \n **Reaction:** After this Attack action, if it failed and the target was an enemy leader, make this Attack action again.

3174.name: Shield Bash
3174.rule: **Reaction:** During an adjacent fighter's Attack action that targets this fighter and fails, this fighter cannot be driven back and you can push their attacker one hex.

3175.name: A Worthy Deed
3175.rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter takes an enemy fighter with a Wounds characteristic of 4 or more out of action with an Attack action.

3176.name: Dark Rewards
3176.rule: Score this in an end phase if all surviving friendly fighters (at least three) are Inspired.

3177.name: Glory or Damnation
3177.rule: Score this in an end phase if a surviving friendly fighter has three or more upgrades.

3178.name: Magical Apotheosis
3178.rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter successfully casts a spell that requires two or more successes.

3179.name: Oath of Annihilation
3179.rule: You may reveal this card at the start of your first activation in the action phase, then return it to your hand. Score this in an end phase if *all enemy fighters* are out of action. If you revealed this card, gain 1 additional glory point.

3180.name: Oath of Conquest
3180.rule: You may reveal this card at the start of your first activation in the action phase, then return it to your hand. Score this in the third end phase if all surviving friendly fighters are in enemy territory. If you revealed this card, gain 1 additional glory point.

3181.name: Oath of Denial
3181.rule: You may reveal this card at the start of your first activation in the action phase, then return it to your hand. Score this in the third end phase if there are no enemy fighters in your territory. If you revealed this card, gain 1 additional glory point.

3182.name: Oath of Murder
3182.rule: You may reveal this card at the start of your first activation in the action phase, then return it to your hand. Score this in an end phase if your warband took an enemy leader out of action in the preceding action phase. If you revealed this card, gain 1 additional glory point.

3183.name: Oath of Supremacy
3183.rule: You may reveal this card at the start of your first activation in the action phase, then return it to your hand. Score this in an end phase if you hold three or more objectives. If you revealed this card, gain 1 additional glory point.

3184.name: Brutal Sacrifice
3184.rule: Choose a friendly fighter adjacent to another friendly fighter, and an upgrade in your hand that can be applied to the fighter you chose. The other fighter is taken out of action, and the upgrade is applied to the fighter you chose.

3185.name: Dark Destiny
3185.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during an Attack action that would take a friendly fighter out of action. Roll a defence dice. On a roll of :dfBlock: or :dfCrit: the fighter takes no damage, is not driven back and is not taken out of action.

3186.name: Enfeeble
3186.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel::MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, choose an enemy fighter within four hexes of the caster. That fighter's Attack actions have -1 Damage (to a minimum of 1). This spell persists until that fighter is out of action.

3187.name: Ensnare
3187.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel::MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, choose an enemy fighter within four hexes of the caster. That fighter has -1 Move (to a minimum of 0). This spell persists until that fighter is out of action.

3188.name: Fearless Strike
3188.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during a friendly fighter's Attack action, before the attack roll, if that fighter has no supporting fighters. Any rolls of :atSup1: in the attack roll are successes.

3189.name: Glimpse the Future
3189.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, choose a friendly fighter within four hexes of the caster. When they next make an Attack action, you can re-roll one dice in the attack roll. This spell persists until that Attack action is made or that fighter is out of action, whichever happens first.

3190.name: Heel
3190.rule: Push a friendly Grawl up to a number of hexes equal to twice its Move characteristic. It must end this push in a hex adjacent to a friendly Ollo.

3191.name: Hunting Pack
3191.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during a friendly fighter's Attack action, before the attack roll, if that fighter has two or more supporting fighters. Any rolls of :atSup2: in the attack roll are considered to be rolls of :atCrit:.

3192.name: Oathsworn Attack
3192.rule: The first Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has +1 Dice.

3193.name: Warding Eye
3193.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If this spell is cast, choose a friendly fighter within four hexes of the caster. They have +1 Defence. This spell persists until the end of the phase or that fighter is out of action, whichever happens first.

3194.name: Chaos Boon
3194.rule: -1 Wounds (to a minimum of 1). This fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2 have +1 Damage.

3196.name: Ensorcelled Javelin
3196.rule: [:Hex: 3 - :atFury: 3 - :boom: 1 -(Cleave)-] \n This Attack action has +1 Damage when made during this fighter's Charge action.

3197.name: Grundann's Path
3197.rule: When this fighter makes a Charge action, rolls of both :atSmash: and :atFury: are successes in their attack roll.

3198.name: Path to Glory
3198.rule: +1 Wounds, +1 Dice to this fighter's Attack actions. You may only apply this upgrade to a fighter that has an upgrade.

3199.name: Point-blank Shot
3199.rule: [:Hex: 3 - :atFury: 2 - :boom: 1] \n **Reaction:** After an enemy fighter's Move action that ends adjacent to this fighter, make this Attack action. It must target that fighter and cannot drive them back.

3200.name: Seized Trophy
3200.rule: **Reaction:** After a friendly fighter's Attack action that takes an adjacent enemy fighter out of action, if this card is in your hand, apply this upgrade to that friendly fighter.

3201.name: Shond's Path
3201.rule: On a critical hit, this fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2 have +1 Damage.

3203.name: Trained Killer
3203.rule: **Reaction:** During a friendly Ollo's Attack action, before the attack roll, push this fighter up to two hexes. It must end this push adjacent to the target of the Attack action.

3204.name: Carnage
3204.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband took three or more enemy fighters out of action in the preceding action phase.

3205.name: Demolished
3205.rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action with an Attack action with a Damage characteristic of 5 or more.

3206.name: Earn Your Keep
3206.rule: Score this immediately if an enemy fighter is taken out of action by an Attack action made by a friendly fighter other than Mollog.

3207.name: Easy Pickings
3207.rule: Score this immediately if two or more enemy fighters are taken out of action by a single Attack action made by a friendly fighter.

3208.name: Feeding Frenzy
3208.rule: Score this immediately if each surviving friendly fighter (at least three) is adjacent to any enemy fighters.

3209.name: Got Them
3209.rule: Score this immediately at the beginning of your activation if there are three or more enemy fighters adjacent to a friendly Mollog.

3210.name: Is It Asleep
3210.rule: Score this in an end phase if a friendly Mollog took no actions in the preceding action phase.

3211.name: Protect the Lair
3211.rule: Score this in the third end phase if there are no enemy fighters in your territory.

3212.name: Rampage
3212.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband took four or more enemy fighters out of action in the preceding action phase.

3213.name: Brutal Savagery
3213.rule: The first Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has +1 Dice.

3214.name: Feast
3214.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's Attack action that takes an adjacent enemy fighter out of action. Remove up to one wound token from the friendly fighter's fighter card.

3215.name: Flit
3215.rule: Push a friendly Bat Squig up to three hexes. This push can take them through occupied hexes but must end in an empty hex.

3216.name: Follow Your Instincts
3216.rule: Discard an objective card, then draw an objective card.

3217.name: Hobble
3217.rule: Choose an enemy fighter adjacent to a friendly Stalagsquig and roll an attack dice. On a roll of :atSmash: or :atCrit: place a Move token next to that enemy fighter.

3218.name: Predatory Growls
3218.rule: Choose an enemy fighter and push them one hex.

3219.name: Shrouded in Gloom
3219.rule: Attack actions with a Range of 3 or more in the next activation have a Dice characteristic (before other modifiers) of :atFury: 1.

3220.name: Sporeburst
3220.rule: Choose an enemy fighter adjacent to a friendly Spiteshroom and roll an attack dice. On a roll of :atSmash: or :atCrit: the enemy fighter suffers 1 damage.

3221.name: There the Whole Time
3221.rule: Roll an attack dice. On a roll of :atSmash: or :atCrit: return a friendly Stalagsquig that has been taken out of action to any empty hex on the battlefield.

3222.name: Wind Up
3222.rule: +1 Damage to the first Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 made by a friendly fighter in the next activation.

3223.name: Blooming Spores
3223.rule: +1 Damage to this fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2.

3224.name: Foul Temper
3224.rule: You can re-roll one dice in each attack roll for this fighter's Attack actions.

3225.name: Horrific Stench
3225.rule: Enemy fighters adjacent to this fighter are considered to have one fewer supporting fighters (to a minimum of zero).

3226.name: Inescapable Jaws
3226.rule: Both :atFury: and :atSmash: symbols are successes in the attack roll when this fighter makes a Charge action.

3227.name: Jabbertoad
3227.rule: [:Hex: 3 - :atFury: 3 - :boom: 1 -(Knockback 1)-] \n Discard this card after making this Attack action.

3228.name: Regenerate
3228.rule: At the beginning of each round, remove up to one wound token from this fighter's fighter card.

3229.name: Rooted to the Spot
3229.rule: This fighter can hold objectives, even though its fighter card says it cannot.

3230.name: Spore Cloud
3230.rule: **Action:** Scatter 2 from this fighter's hex. Any enemy fighters in any hex in the chain suffer 1 damage.

3231.name: Unswattable
3231.rule: **Reaction:** After an Attack action that targets this fighter and fails, push this fighter up to one hex.

3232.name: Wrath of Living Rock
3232.rule: This fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1 have Cleave.

3233.name: Collect Bounty
3233.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband took an enemy leader out of action in the preceding action phase.

3234.name: Focus Fire
3234.rule: Score this immediately if the third different friendly fighter makes an Attack action with a Range of 3 or more targeting the same fighter in this phase.

3235.name: Headshot
3235.rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter scores a critical hit with an Attack action with a Range of 3 or more.

3236.name: It's Ours Now
3236.rule: Score this in an end phase if two or more friendly fighters are in no one's territory.

3237.name: Live by the Code
3237.rule: Score this in an end phase if you did not discard any objective cards in the preceding action phase. If you do, you cannot discard any objective cards in this end phase.

3238.name: Search the City
3238.rule: Score this in an end phase if you hold three or more objectives.

3239.name: Seeking Advancement
3239.rule: Score this immediately if your warband takes an enemy fighter with a Wounds characteristic of 4 or more out of action.

3240.name: Sound Finances
3240.rule: Score this in an end phase if you have 5 or more unspent glory points.

3241.name: Stake a Claim
3241.rule: Score this in an end phase if all friendly fighters are in your territory and no enemy fighters are in your territory.

3242.name: Aetheric Augmentation
3242.rule: The first Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has +1 Dice.

3243.name: Ambitious Attack
3243.rule: +1 Damage to the first Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 made by a friendly fighter in the next activation.

3244.name: Atmospheric Isolation
3244.rule: Play this only if there is a surviving friendly Thundrik. No more power cards can be played until after the next activation.

3245.name: Prepared Position
3245.rule: Choose a friendly fighter that does not have a Guard token. Place a Guard token next to them.

3246.name: Protect the Boss
3246.rule: Choose a friendly fighter and push them up to two hexes so that they are adjacent to your leader.

3247.name: Quiet Contemplation
3247.rule: Choose one: draw a power card, or discard an objective card then draw an objective card.

3248.name: Seek the Skyvessel
3248.rule: Choose up to two friendly fighters and make a Move action with each of them.

3249.name: Timed Charge
3249.rule: **Reaction:** After a friendly Drakkskewer's Move action that begins adjacent to any enemy fighters, roll an attack dice. On a roll of :atSmash: or :atCrit: those enemy fighters each suffer 1 damage.

3250.name: Toxic Gases
3250.rule: Choose an enemy fighter. That fighter's player must make a choice: either that fighter suffers 1 damage or you push that fighter up to two hexes.

3251.name: Unyielding
3251.rule: Friendly fighters cannot be driven back in the next activation.

3253.name: Ancestral Might
3253.rule: +1 Damage to this fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2.

3256.name: Empowered Aethershot
3256.rule: The Attack actions on this fighter's fighter card with a Range of 3 or more have Cleave.

3257.name: Magmalt Draught
3257.rule: **Reaction:** During an Attack action or gambit that will damage this fighter, discard this card. Reduce the damage suffered by 1, to a minimum of 1.

3258.name: Paymaster
3258.rule: You can re-roll one dice in each Attack roll made for friendly fighters adjacent to this fighter.

3259.name: Punishing Retort
3259.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atFury: 2 - :boom: 1] \n **Reaction:** During an adjacent enemy fighter's Attack action that targets this fighter and fails, this fighter cannot be driven back and makes this Attack action. It must target the attacker.

3260.name: Rapid Reload
3260.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's first Aethermatic Volley Gun Attack action in a round, they can make that Attack action again.

3261.name: Swashbuckler
3261.rule: +1 Dice to this fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2.

3262.name: Domain Denied
3262.rule: Score this in an end phase if no enemy fighters are holding objectives.

3263.name: Glade's Last Hope
3263.rule: Score this in an end phase if at least 3 wound tokens were removed from the fighter cards of friendly fighters in the preceding action phase.

3264.name: Glade's Pride
3264.rule: Score this in the third end phase if no friendly fighter is out of action.

3265.name: Lithe Spirits
3265.rule: Score this immediately if your warband makes its second or subsequent reaction in this phase.

3266.name: Reclaim the Lamentiri
3266.rule: Score this in an end phase if you hold all the objectives in at least one player's territory.

3267.name: Show No Mercy
3267.rule: Score this in an end phase if 3 or more enemy fighters are out of action.

3268.name: Song of Hatred
3268.rule: Score this immediately if your warband successfully casts their second or subsequent spell in this phase.

3269.name: Strike Swiftly
3269.rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action with a Charge action.

3270.name: Vengeful Revenants
3270.rule: Score this in an end phase if at least one friendly fighter is out of action, and at least twice as many enemy fighters as friendly fighters are out of action.

3271.name: Curse of the Dwindling
3271.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel::MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, choose an enemy fighter within five hexes of the caster. That fighter's Attack actions have -1 Dice (to a minimum of 1). This spell persists until that fighter is out of action.

3272.name: Healing Amphora
3272.rule: Choose a friendly Gallanghann or a friendly fighter adjacent to a friendly Gallanghann and roll a defence dice. On a roll of :dfBlock: or :dfCrit: remove up to two wound tokens from that fighter's fighter card. Otherwise remove up to one wound token from that fighter's fighter card.

3273.name: Last Guardians
3273.rule: Choose a friendly fighter that does not have a Guard token. Place a Guard token next to them.

3274.name: Leech Power
3274.rule: Play this only if a friendly Ylthari is holding an objective. Remove that objective from the battlefield and remove up to one wound token from that Ylthari's fighter card.

3275.name: Mesmerising Gaze
3275.rule: Choose an enemy fighter adjacent to a friendly fighter and choose one: remove the enemy fighter's Guard tokens, or place a Move token next to the enemy fighter.

3276.name: Pangs of the Great Lack
3276.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If this spell is cast, choose an enemy fighter within five hexes of the caster. That fighter suffers 1 damage.

3277.name: Revenant Rage
3277.rule: The first Attack action in the next activation has +1 Dice.

3278.name: Springseed Step
3278.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's Move action. Choose another friendly fighter and push them up to three hexes. They must end this push adjacent to the fighter that moved.

3279.name: Strength of the Burgeoning
3279.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, the first Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 in the next activation has +1 Damage.

3280.name: Writhing Roots
3280.rule: The first fighter to make a Move action in the next activation has -2 Move (to a minimum of 0).

3281.name: Cage of Thorns
3281.rule: [:Hex: 3 - :MagFocus: - - :boom: 1] If this Attack action succeeds, place a Move token next to the target.

3284.name: Inescapable Grasp
3284.rule: Rolls of :dfDodge: are not successes in the defence rolls of enemy fighters targeted by this fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2.

3285.name: Menacing Step
3285.rule: **Reaction:** After an enemy fighter's Move action that ends adjacent to at least one other friendly fighter, push this fighter up to two hexes. The push must end with this fighter adjacent to the enemy fighter.

3286.name: Pinning Shot
3286.rule: This fighter is considered to be a supporting fighter for adjacent friendly fighters.

3287.name: Spiteful Thorns
3287.rule: **Reaction:** After an enemy fighter's Attack action with a Range of 1 that targets this fighter and succeeds, roll an attack dice. On a roll of :atSmash: or :atCrit: the attacker suffers 1 damage.

3288.name: Unflinching Guardian
3288.rule: **Reaction:** During an enemy fighter's Attack action that targets a friendly fighter supported by this fighter, after the defence roll but before the Attack action succeeds or fails, you can re-roll one defence dice.

3289.name: Vengeful Blow
3289.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atFury: 2 - :boom: 1] \n This Attack action has +1 Dice and +1 Damage for each friendly fighter that is out of action.

3291.name: Acolyte of the Katophranes
3291.rule: Score this in the third end phase if you have at least one surviving friendly fighter that has at least one Katophrane Tome. Choose a surviving friendly. Gain 1 glory point for each Katophrane Tome that fighter has.

3292.name: Aggressive Commander
3292.rule: Score this in the third end phase if you took the first activation in each round.

3293.name: All or Nothing
3293.rule: Score this in the third end phase if you have scored no objective cards this game. If you do, you cannot score any other objective cards.

3294.name: Annihilation
3294.rule: Score this in an end phase if *all enemy fighters have been taken out of action*.

3295.name: Arcane Implosion
3295.rule: Score this immediately if an enemy fighter is taken out of action while attempting to cast a spell.

3296.name: Arcane Torrent
3296.rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter successfully casts a spell and there are two or more :MagCrit: in the casting roll.

3297.name: Biding Your Time
3297.rule: Score this in an end phase if you have at least one fighter on the battlefield and your warband took no Attack actions in the preceding action phase.

3298.name: Bloodless Skirmish
3298.rule: Score this in the third end phase if there are no fighters out of action.

3299.name: Branching Fate
3299.rule: Score this immediately if you roll three or more dice in an attack or defence roll and they all show a different symbol.

3300.name: Brute Force
3300.rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter's Attack action succeeds against an enemy fighter who has two or more supporting fighters more than the friendly fighter.

3301.name: Building Momentum
3301.rule: Score this in an end phase if you have scored at least 2 other objective cards in this phase.

3302.name: Calculated Risk
3302.rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter makes a Move action through a lethal hex that damages them but doesn't take them out of action.

3303.name: Catching Up
3303.rule: Score this in an end phase if you have fewer glory points than an opponent.

3304.name: Charmed Life
3304.rule: Score this in an end phase if you removed at least 3 wound tokens from a single fighter, and that fighter was not taken out of action, in the preceding action phase.

3305.name: Combination Strike
3305.rule: Score this in an end phase if you scored at least two objective cards in the preceding action phase.

3306.name: Conquest
3306.rule: Score this in the third end phase if all of your surviving fighters are *in your opponent's territory*.

3307.name: Cornered
3307.rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action with an Attack action that is only successful because their target is Trapped.

3308.name: Dashed Hopes
3308.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband took at least one Inspired enemy fighter out of action in the preceding action phase.

3309.name: Death from Afar
3309.rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action while at least three hexes from that fighter.

3310.name: Denial
3310.rule: Score this in the third end phase if there are no enemy fighters in your territory.

3311.name: Devastation
3311.rule: Score this in an end phase if *three or more* enemy fighters were taken out of action in the preceding action phase.

3312.name: Didn't Even Want It
3312.rule: Score this in an end phase if an enemy fighter is holding objective 1.

3313.name: Digging Deep
3313.rule: Score this in an end phase if you drew at least four power and/or objective cards in the preceding action phase.

3314.name: Disdain for Knowledge
3314.rule: Score this card immediately if your warband takes an enemy fighter out of action, and that fighter has at least one **Katophrane Tome**.

3315.name: Envious Acquisition
3315.rule: Score this in an end phase if you hold an objective held by an enemy fighter at the beginning of the round.

3316.name: Every Trick in the Book
3316.rule: Score this in an end phase if you have no power cards in your hand.

3317.name: Extreme Flank
3317.rule: Score this in an end phase if there is a friendly fighter on an edge hex and another friendly fighter on an edge hex on the opposite edge of the battlefield to the first fighter. Where there is more than one opposite edge, it must be the furthest of these edges.

3318.name: Finish Them
3318.rule: Score this immediately if your warband takes an enemy fighter out of action with an Attack action with a Damage characteristic of 1.

3319.name: Fired Up
3319.rule: Score this in an end phase if at least one surviving friendly fighter is Inspired.

3320.name: Frugal
3320.rule: Score this in an end phase if you have at least 3 unspent glory points.

3321.name: Ganging Up
3321.rule: Score this immediately if all hexes adjacent to a single enemy fighter (other than blocked or incomplete hexes) contain friendly fighters.

3322.name: Get Thee Hence
3322.rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter's Attack action drives an enemy fighter back two or more hexes.

3323.name: Giant-slayer
3323.rule: Score this immediately if your warband takes a fighter with a Wounds characteristic of 5 or more out of action.

3324.name: Girded for Battle
3324.rule: Score this in an end phase if all surviving friendly fighters (at least three) have at least one upgrade.

3325.name: Grand Melee
3325.rule: Score this in an end phase if at least three enemy fighters were damaged in the preceding action phase.

3326.name: Great Gains
3326.rule: Score this in an end phase if you gained at least 5 glory points in this round.

3327.name: Hale and Whole
3327.rule: Score this in an end phase if no friendly fighters are out of action and no friendly fighters have wound tokens on their fighter cards.

3328.name: Heroic Effort
3328.rule: Score this in an end phase if you activated the same fighter four times in the preceding action phase.

3329.name: Hoarder
3329.rule: Score this in the third end phase if you have at least 9 unspent glory points.

3330.name: Hold Objective 1
3330.rule: Score this in an end phase if you are holding objective *1*.

3331.name: Hold Objective 2
3331.rule: Score this in an end phase if you are holding objective *2*.

3332.name: Hold Objective 3
3332.rule: Score this in an end phase if you are holding objective *3*.

3333.name: Hold Objective 4
3333.rule: Score this in an end phase if you are holding objective *4*.

3334.name: Hold Objective 5
3334.rule: Score this in an end phase if you are holding objective *5*.

3335.name: Hold What We Have
3335.rule: Score this in an end phase if you have at least one fighter on the battlefield and your warband made no Move actions in the preceding action phase.

3336.name: Indomitable Defender
3336.rule: Score this in an end phase if a single surviving friendly fighter was the target of at least three Attack actions in the preceding action phase and was not taken out of action.

3337.name: Interdiction
3337.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband took an enemy wizard out of action in the preceding action phase.

3338.name: Keep Chopping
3338.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband made an Attack action in four or more activations in the preceding action phase.

3339.name: Keep Moving
3339.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband made a Move action in four or more activations in the preceding action phase.

3340.name: Keep Them Guessing
3340.rule: *(Errata update)* Score this in an end phase if your warband made at least four different actions from the following list in the preceding action phase: Move (other than as part of a Charge), Attack (other than as part of a Charge), Charge, Guard, another action on a fighter card (other than a reaction).

3341.name: Lethal Repertoire
3341.rule: Score this in an end phase if a friendly fighter made an Attack action in the preceding action phase printed on an upgrade that you played in the same phase.

3342.name: Loner
3342.rule: Score this in an end phase if at least one surviving friendly fighter has no other fighter within three hexes.

3343.name: Longstrider
3343.rule: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter makes their second or subsequent Move action in a single action phase.

3344.name: Magical Mastery
3344.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband successfully cast six or more spells in the preceding action phase.

3345.name: Magical Storm
3345.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband successfully cast four or more spells in the preceding action phase.

3346.name: Magical Void
3346.rule: Score this in an end phase if an opponent's warband attempted to cast at least one spell and did not successfully cast any spells in the preceding phase.

3347.name: Martyred
3347.rule: Score this immediately if the first fighter taken out of action in this round is a friendly fighter.

3348.name: Massive Overkill
3348.rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action with an Attack action that deals an amount of damage that is at least twice the target's Wounds characteristic.

3349.name: Master of Mayhem
3349.rule: Score this immediately if you use your warband's third action or card that Scatters in the same phase.

3350.name: Master of Terrain
3350.rule: Score this immediately if an enemy fighter is taken out of action by a lethal hex.

3351.name: Neck and Neck
3351.rule: Score this in an end phase if you and an opponent are tied for the same number of glory points (at least 1).

3352.name: No Heroes
3352.rule: Score this in the third end phase if there are at least three surviving friendly fighters, and none of them are Inspired.

3353.name: No Openings
3353.rule: Score this in an end phase if your opponent scored no objectives in the preceding action phase.

3354.name: Nowhere to Go
3354.rule: Score this immediately if each hex adjacent to an enemy fighter is either occupied, blocked or lethal.

3355.name: On a Roll
3355.rule: Score this in an end phase if you scored at least four other objective cards in this round.

3356.name: One Fate
3356.rule: Score this immediately if you roll three or more dice in an attack or defence roll and they all show the same symbol.

3357.name: Opening Gambit
3357.rule: Score this in an end phase if you scored at least one objective card in the preceding action phase.

3358.name: Our Powers Combined
3358.rule: Score this immediately if all of the successes (at least two) in your attack or defence roll were support symbols.

3359.name: Patient Commander
3359.rule: Score this in the third end phase if you took the second activation in each round.

3360.name: Peerless Fighter
3360.rule: Score this immediately if there are two or more :atCrit: in your attack roll.

3361.name: Preserve Life
3361.rule: Score this in an end phase if you removed at least one wound token from each of at least two surviving friendly fighters in the preceding action phase.

3362.name: Preserve Their Knowledge
3362.rule: Score this in an end phase if all surviving friendly fighters (at least three) have at least one Katophrane Tome.

3363.name: Press the Advantage
3363.rule: Score this in an end phase if you have more glory points than an opponent.

3364.name: Quick on Your Feet
3364.rule: Score this in an end phase if all surviving friendly fighters (at least three) made a Move action in the preceding action phase.

3365.name: Scorched Earth
3365.rule: Score this immediately if your warband removes an objective from the battlefield.

3366.name: Seize the Initiative
3366.rule: Score this immediately if you have three or more :atCrit: when rolling to determine who takes the first activation in a round and win that roll.

3367.name: Singled Out
3367.rule: Score this in an end phase if a surviving friendly fighter has three or more upgrades.

3368.name: Solid Gains
3368.rule: Score this in an end phase if you gained at least 3 glory points in this round.

3369.name: Sorcerous Duel
3369.rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter takes an enemy wizard out of action with a spell.

3370.name: Sorcerous Retort
3370.rule: Score this immediately if your warband successfully casts a spell as a reaction.

3371.name: Sorcerous Scouring
3371.rule: Score this immediately if your warband takes an enemy fighter out of action with a spell.

3372.name: Stand Firm
3372.rule: Score this immediately if all surviving friendly fighters (at least three) have one or more Guard tokens.

3373.name: Strong Start
3373.rule: Score this immediately if the first fighter taken out of action in this round is an enemy fighter.

3374.name: Supremacy
3374.rule: Score this in an end phase if you hold three or more objectives.

3375.name: Swift Beheading
3375.rule: *(Errata update)* Score this in an end phase if your warband took an enemy leader out of action in the preceding action phase, and that leader was the first fighter taken out of action in this game.

3376.name: Tactical Supremacy 1-4
3376.rule: Score this in an end phase if you hold objectives 1 and 4.

3377.name: Tactical Supremacy 2-5
3377.rule: Score this in an end phase if you hold objectives 2 and 5.

3378.name: Tempting Target
3378.rule: Score this immediately if your warband takes an enemy fighter with at least two upgrades out of action.

3379.name: Thin Their Ranks
3379.rule: Score this in an end phase if three or more enemy fighters are out of action.

3380.name: Tireless Slayer
3380.rule: Score this in an end phase if a single friendly fighter took three or more enemy fighters out of action in the preceding action phase.

3381.name: Total Dominance
3381.rule: Score this in the third end phase if there are no surviving enemy fighters and no friendly fighters out of action.

3382.name: Trash to Treasure
3382.rule: Score this immediately if an opponent discards three objective cards in an end phase.

3383.name: United
3383.rule: Score this in an end phase if all surviving friendly fighters (at least two) are in a single group with each fighter adjacent to at least one other friendly fighter.

3384.name: Versatile Fighter
3384.rule: Score this in an end phase if the same friendly fighter made both an Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 and an Attack action with a Range of 3 or more in the preceding action phase.

3385.name: What Armour?
3385.rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter's Attack action with Cleave succeeds.

3386.name: Witch-Slayer
3386.rule: Score this immediately if your leader takes an enemy wizard out of action.

3387.name: With Our Bare Hands
3387.rule: Score this in the third end phase if there are at least three surviving friendly fighters, and no surviving friendly fighter has an upgrade.

3388.name: Abasoth's Unmaking
3388.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, choose an objective token within four hexes of the caster. Remove it from the battlefield.

3389.name: Abasoth's Withering
3389.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, choose an enemy fighter within four hexes of the caster. That fighter has -1 Wounds (to a minimum of 1). This spell persists until that fighter is out of action.

3390.name: Aetherflux
3390.rule: Until the next power step, spells that would require :MagChannel: instead require :MagFocus: and vice versa.

3391.name: Aggressive Defence
3391.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during an Attack action that targets a friendly fighter, before the attack roll. You cannot make a defence roll, but the target of the Attack action cannot be driven back. After the Attack action, if the friendly fighter survives, immediately make an attack action with that fighter that targets their attacker.

3392.name: Amnesiac Backlash
3392.rule: **Reaction :MagCrit::** Cast this spell after an enemy fighter casts a spell. If this spell is cast, that fighter suffers 1 damage and they can no longer cast spells. This spell persists until that fighter is out of action.

3393.name: Arcane Recall
3393.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagCrit:):** If this spell is cast choose one gambit spell from your power discard pile and add it to your hand.

3394.name: Arcane Shield
3394.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus::MagFocus:):** If this spell is cast, reduce all damage suffered by the caster by 1, to a minimum of 1. This spell persists until the caster is out of action.

3395.name: Arcane Smothering
3395.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If this spell is cast, choose one persisting spell. That spell is discarded.

3396.name: Arcane Transposition
3396.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, switch the positions of two adjacent fighters.

3397.name: Baffling Illusion
3397.rule: The first time a fighter would make a Move action in the next activation, their player instead Scatters X from the hex that fighter occupies, and pushes the fighter along the chain to the end hex. X is the fighter's Move characteristic. If the fighter cannot be pushed into a hex, the push ends in the last hex in the chain they can occupy. Place a Move token next to that fighter.

3398.name: Black-powder Sphere
3398.rule: Choose a hex (other than a blocked hex) within three hexes of a friendly fighter, and Scatter 1 from that hex. Then roll an attack dice. On a roll of :atSmash: or :atCrit:, any fighter in or adjacent to the end hex suffers 1 damage.

3399.name: Bolt of Inspiration
3399.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, Scatter 1 from any hex on the battlefield. Any fighter in the end hex is Inspired.

3400.name: Centre of Attention
3400.rule: *(Errata update)* Choose a fighter and push all other fighters that are within 2 hexes 1 hex so that they are closer to that fighter in an order you choose.

3401.name: Commanding Stride
3401.rule: Push your leader up to three hexes. They must end this push on a starting hex.

3402.name: Confusing Reflection
3402.rule: **Reaction:** Play this when an enemy fighter successfully casts a spell with Scatter, before they resolve the Scatter. You resolve the Scatter instead. The effect of the spell remains the same.

3403.name: Confusion
3403.rule: Choose two fighters that are adjacent to each other and switch them.

3404.name: Countercharge
3404.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an enemy fighter's Move action that is part of a Charge action. Choose a friendly fighter and push them up to three hexes. They must end this push adjacent to the enemy fighter.

3405.name: Damning Pact
3405.rule: Choose a friendly wizard. They suffer 1 damage. The first time they attempt to cast a spell before the next power step, any fighter damaged by that spell suffers 1 additional damage.

3406.name: Dancing with Death
3406.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an Attack action that targets a friendly fighter and fails. You can push the target up to two hexes.

3407.name: Death Frenzy
3407.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during an enemy warband's gambit or enemy fighter's Attack action that takes a friendly fighter out of action. For each fighter adjacent to that fighter, roll an attack dice. On a roll of :atSmash: the fighter being rolled for suffers 1 damage.

3408.name: Death Grip
3408.rule: Choose a friendly fighter. Enemy fighters adjacent to that fighter can't be pushed until the next power step.

3409.name: Determined Effort
3409.rule: +1 Dice for the first Attack action in the next activation.

3410.name: Emboldened
3410.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an Attack action that targets a friendly fighter and fails. Remove up to one wound token from that fighter's fighter card.

3411.name: Empathic Exchange
3411.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, choose a friendly fighter adjacent to the caster. Take up to 2 wound tokens from that fighter's fighter card and put them on the caster's fighter card.

3412.name: Encroaching Shadow
3412.rule: Choose an enemy fighter in an edge hex. They suffer 1 damage.

3413.name: Entropic Curse
3413.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If this spell is cast, choose an enemy fighter within four hexes of the caster. That fighter suffers 1 damage at the beginning of each round, before the first activation. This spell persists until that fighter is out of action.

3414.name: Ephemeral Form
3414.rule: The first fighter to be the target of an Attack action in the next activation has a Defence characteristic (before other modifiers) of :dfDodge: 2, instead of their usual characteristic.

3415.name: Fearful Visage
3415.rule: Choose a fighter. The first fighter to make an Attack action while adjacent to that fighter in the next activation has -1 Dice to a minimum of 1.

3416.name: Flexible Strategy
3416.rule: Discard an objective card and draw an objective card.

3417.name: Ghoulish Pact
3417.rule: Choose a friendly fighter and an upgrade card from your hand that you can apply to that fighter. That fighter suffers 1 damage. If they survive, apply the upgrade to that fighter.

3418.name: Grievous Riposte
3418.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an Attack action with a Range of 1 that targets a friendly fighter and fails, if there are any :atCrit: in your defence roll. The attacker suffers 2 damage.

3419.name: Grinding Earth
3419.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, choose an empty hex adjacent to the caster and place the chasm token on it. A hex with a chasm token is a lethal hex. Remove the token at the end of the action phase.

3420.name: Haymaker
3420.rule: +2 Dice for the first Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation. You cannot make defence rolls for that fighter. The latter effect persists until that fighter is out of action or the end of the round, whichever happens first.

3421.name: Healing Pulse
3421.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If this spell is cast, choose a friendly fighter within four hexes of the caster. Remove up to one wound token from that fighter's fighter card at the beginning of each round, before the first activation. This spell persists until that fighter is out of action.

3422.name: Imbue with Life
3422.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, choose an objective token within four hexes of the caster. Scatter 2 from that token's hex, and place the objective token in the end hex. If the end hex is blocked, lethal or contains an objective token, or if the chain would leave the battlefield, leave the objective token where it is.

3423.name: Incredible Leap
3423.rule: The first fighter to make a Move action in the next activation can pass through blocked and occupied hexes, and treats lethal hexes as normal hexes. They must end this move in an empty hex.

3424.name: Infinite Riches
3424.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel::MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, choose one upgrade from your power discard pile and add it to your hand.

3425.name: Instinctive Denial
3425.rule: **Reaction:** Play this when an enemy fighter adjacent to a friendly fighter casts a spell, before the spell is resolved. Roll a defence dice. On a roll of :dfBlock: or :dfCrit: that spell is not cast.

3426.name: Irresistible Prize
3426.rule: *(Errata update)* Choose an objective token. Push all fighters that are within 2 hexes 1 hex so that they are standing on or closer to that token in an order you choose.

3427.name: Lethal Ward
3427.rule: Choose an objective token. Any fighter in the same hex as that token suffers 1 damage.

3428.name: Levitation
3428.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, the caster treats lethal hexes as normal hexes. This spell persists until the caster is out of action or the end of the phase, whichever happens first.

3429.name: Lifesurge
3429.rule: Remove one wound token from all fighter cards that have at least one wound token.

3430.name: Magical Damping
3430.rule: **Reaction (:MagFocus:):** Cast this spell during an attempt to cast a spell, after the dice are rolled but before the spell is resolved or fails (and before the defence roll, if it is a spell Attack action). If this spell is cast, any damage caused by the other spell is reduced by 1.

3431.name: Magical Dearth
3431.rule: Until the end of the power step, only rolls of :MagCrit: are successes when a fighter attempts to cast a spell.

3432.name: Mirror Move
3432.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an opponent pushes a fighter. Choose a different fighter and push them the same number of hexes.

3433.name: Noble Sacrifice
3433.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during an Attack action that targets your leader, before any dice are rolled. Choose a friendly fighter adjacent to your leader, and roll a defence dice. On a roll of :dfSup1:, :dfSup2: or :dfCrit:, switch the positions of the fighter you chose and your leader. The fighter you chose is now the target of the Attack action.

3434.name: One Step Ahead
3434.rule: You can only play this card in the final power step of a round. Choose an opponent and name an objective, then roll an attack dice. On a roll of :atSmash: or :atCrit: that opponent cannot score that objective in the subsequent end phase.

3435.name: Piling On
3435.rule: The first Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 in the next activation has +1 Damage for each supporting fighter after the first.

3436.name: Pit Trap
3436.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an Attack action that drives an enemy fighter back. They suffer 1 damage.

3437.name: Power Surge
3437.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during an attempt to cast a spell, after the dice are rolled but before the spell is resolved or fails, if at least one :MagCrit: was rolled in the casting roll. Add a :MagCrit: to the casting roll.

3438.name: Quick Exchange
3438.rule: Choose two adjacent friendly fighters who each have at least one upgrade that could be applied to the other fighter. Take an upgrade from each fighter and apply it to the other fighter. Each fighter must be eligible for that upgrade.

3439.name: Quintok's Gamble
3439.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagCrit:):** If this spell is cast, shuffle your power discard pile face down, then add the top card to your hand.

3440.name: Razormaw Swarm
3440.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagCrit:):** If this spell is cast, Scatter 3 from the caster's hex. Any fighter in any hex in the chain suffers 2 damage.

3441.name: Regal Vision
3441.rule: Choose a friendly fighter that is holding an objective. That fighter becomes Inspired.

3442.name: Rend the Earth
3442.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel::MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, all fighters adjacent to the caster suffer 1 damage.

3443.name: Revoke
3443.rule: Choose one persisting ploy. That ploy is discarded.

3444.name: Shadowed Step
3444.rule: Choose a friendly fighter with no Move or Charge tokens and place them on an empty hex in no one's territory. Place a Move token next to them.

3445.name: Shifting Reflection
3445.rule: Choose a friendly fighter and an enemy fighter that are both holding an objective. Switch those fighters' positions.

3446.name: Sidestep
3446.rule: Choose a friendly fighter and push them one hex.

3447.name: Silence
3447.rule: Choose an enemy fighter. They cannot attempt to cast spells for the remainder of the power step.

3448.name: Sorcerous Insight
3448.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus::MagFocus:):** If this spell is cast, choose one ploy from your discard pile and add it to your hand.

3449.name: Sorcerous Riposte
3449.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel::MagChannel:) Reaction:** Play this after an Attack action that targets a friendly wizard and fails. If this spell is cast, the attacker suffers 2 damage.

3450.name: Soul Drain
3450.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:) Reaction:** Cast this spell after an Attack action or gambit that takes an enemy fighter out of action. If this spell is cast, remove up to one wound token from the caster's fighter card.

3451.name: Sphere of Aqshy
3451.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, choose an enemy fighter within four hexes of the caster. That fighter suffers 1 damage.

3452.name: Sphere of Azyr
3452.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If this spell is cast, choose an enemy fighter holding an objective. They suffer 1 damage.

3453.name: Sphere of Chamon
3453.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, choose a fighter within three hexes of the caster. That fighter has a Defence characteristic (before other modifiers) of :dfBlock: 1. This spell persists until the next power step or that fighter is out of action, whichever happens first.

3454.name: Sphere of Ghur
3454.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, the first Attack action made by a fighter standing within four hexes of the caster has +1 Dice. This spell persists until such an Attack action is made or the caster is out of action, whichever happens first.

3455.name: Sphere of Ghyran
3455.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel::MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, choose the caster or a friendly fighter adjacent to the caster. Remove 1 wound token from that fighter's fighter card.

3456.name: Sphere of Hysh
3456.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel::MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, Attack actions in the next activation have +1 Dice.

3457.name: Sphere of Shyish
3457.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, choose an enemy fighter within three hexes of the caster. Wound tokens cannot be removed from that fighter's card. This spell persists until that fighter is out of action.

3458.name: Sphere of Ulgu
3458.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If this spell is cast, Attack actions in the next activation have -1 Dice, to a minimum of 1.

3459.name: Spiked Surface
3459.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during a friendly fighter's Attack action in which the target fighter is trapped and is in an edge hex and/or adjacent to a blocked hex. The target fighter suffers 1 damage.

3460.name: Spirit Sacrifice
3460.rule: Choose a friendly wizard. They suffer 1 damage. The first time that fighter attempts to cast a spell, roll an extra dice in the casting roll. This effect persists until that fighter attempts to cast a spell or is out of action, whichever happens first.

3461.name: Stand and Shoot
3461.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an enemy fighter's Move action that is part of a Charge action. Choose a friendly fighter that is adjacent to them, and make an Attack action with that fighter that has a Range of 3 or more. It must target the enemy fighter, and that fighter cannot be driven back by this Attack action.

3462.name: Strategic Sorcery
3462.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus::MagFocus:):** If this spell is cast, choose one objective card from your objective discard pile and add it to your hand, then discard an objective card if you have more than three in your hand.

3463.name: Sudden Paranoia
3463.rule: Enemy fighters cannot provide support during the first Attack action in the next activation.

3464.name: Taunting Challenge
3464.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an enemy fighter's Move action that is part of a Charge action. Choose a friendly fighter adjacent to that fighter. If the enemy fighter does not target that fighter with their subsequent Attack action, the enemy fighter is no longer Inspired and cannot be Inspired. The latter effect persists until the enemy fighter is out of action.

3465.name: Terrifying Visage
3465.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If this spell is cast, enemy fighters adjacent to the caster have -1 Dice, to a minimum of 1, when they make Attack actions. This spell persists until the caster is out of action.

3466.name: Trading Up
3466.rule: Choose a friendly fighter with at least one upgrade. Discard one upgrade from that fighter, and apply another upgrade to that fighter from your hand.

3467.name: Transfixing Stare
3467.rule: Choose an enemy fighter within two hexes of a friendly fighter and place a Move token next to them.

3468.name: Unchecked Energy
3468.rule: Choose a lethal hex. Roll an attack dice for each fighter in or adjacent to that hex. On a roll of :atSmash: or :atCrit: the fighter being rolled for suffers 1 damage.

3469.name: Unfocused Blast
3469.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, do the following. Scatter 1 from the caster's hex: any fighter in the end hex suffers 1 damage. Do this two more times, scattering from the caster's hex each time.

3470.name: Vertigo
3470.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during an action or gambit that uses the scatter token, after the scatter token is placed but before any dice are rolled. Choose how the scatter token is oriented.

3471.name: Vital Surge
3471.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel::MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, choose a friendly fighter and remove up to two wound tokens from their fighter card.

3472.name: Whip into a Frenzy
3472.rule: Choose a friendly fighter. They suffer 1 damage. Their first Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 in the next activation has +1 Damage.

3473.name: Arcane Familiar
3473.rule: Each time this fighter attempts to cast a spell, after the casting roll, you can change one of the symbols rolled to :MagChannel:.

3474.name: Arcane Focus
3474.rule: **Action:** This fighter's next casting roll in this phase has **Innate (:MagFocus:)**.

3475.name: Arcane Savant
3475.rule: +1 wizard level. Apply this upgrade only to a level 1 wizard.

3476.name: Archer's Focus
3476.rule: You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll each time this fighter makes an Attack action with a Range of 3 or more.

3477.name: Bag of Tricks
3477.rule: **Action:** Search your power deck for a card, reveal it and add it to your hand. Then shuffle your power deck and place a Charge token next to this fighter.

3478.name: Binding Shard
3478.rule: Fighters adjacent to this fighter cannot be pushed (or driven back).

3479.name: Blessing of Argentine
3479.rule: **Reaction:** During an adjacent enemy's Attack action that damages this fighter, their attacker suffers 1 damage.

3480.name: Blessing of Hydragos
3480.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's Attack action that succeeds, push this fighter up to two hexes.

3481.name: Blessing of Ignax
3481.rule: **Action:** This fighter's next Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 in this round has +2 Damage.

3483.name: Butcher's Eye
3483.rule: If there are any :atCrit: in an attack roll for this fighter's Attack action, resolve that Attack action as if it had Cleave.

3484.name: Chained Spite
3484.rule: **Action:** Scatter 3 from this fighter's hex. Choose one fighter standing in a hex in the chain. They suffer 1 damage.

3485.name: Challenge Seeker
3485.rule: When this fighter makes an Attack action that targets a fighter with a higher Wounds characteristic than itself, that Attack action has +1 Dice.

3486.name: Champion's Fortitude
3486.rule: You can re-roll one defence dice each time you make a defence roll for this fighter.

3487.name: Circlet of Companionship
3487.rule: When this fighter is adjacent to two or more friendly fighters, this fighter has +1 Defence.

3488.name: Cloak of Shadows
3488.rule: While this fighter is adjacent to no fighters, this fighter has +1 Defence.

3489.name: Crown of Avarice
3489.rule: *(Errata update)* **Reaction:** During an opponent's gambit or during an enemy fighter's Attack action that will take this fighter out of action, after the deal damage step, pick one opponent and take up to one of their unspent glory points.

3490.name: Dirty Fighting
3490.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's Attack action that targets an adjacent enemy fighter and fails, roll an attack dice. On a roll of :atSmash: or :atCrit: that enemy fighter suffers 1 damage.

3491.name: Distracting Blow
3491.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atFury: 2 - :boom: 2] \n **Reaction:** When an adjacent enemy fighter attempts to cast a spell, but before the casting roll, make this Attack action.

3492.name: Disturbing Presence
3492.rule: Enemy fighters adjacent to this fighter cannot make Charge actions.

3493.name: Duellist's Speed
3493.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's Attack action, push them up to one hex.

3494.name: Earthing Stone
3494.rule: If this fighter is standing on an objective token in a player's territory, no fighters in that territory are considered to be holding objectives.

3495.name: Enchanted Greaves
3495.rule: This fighter treats lethal hexes as normal hexes.

3496.name: Envoy's Prerogative
3496.rule: **Action:** Draw an objective card, then discard an objective card.

3497.name: Escape Artist
3497.rule: **Reaction:** After an enemy fighter's Attack action that targets this fighter and fails, push this fighter up to one hex.

3498.name: Fading Form
3498.rule: This fighter treats lethal hexes as normal hexes and can move through blocked and occupied hexes, but cannot end their move in a blocked or occupied hex.

3499.name: Faneway Crystal
3499.rule: When this fighter makes a Move action, they do not move normally. Instead, place them on any objective token, then discard this card. It is still considered to be a Move action.

3500.name: Fated Blade
3500.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: -] \n Roll five attack dice each time this Attack action succeeds. Its Damage characteristic is equal to the number of :atSmash: and :atCrit: rolled.

3501.name: Fighter's Ferocity
3501.rule: If you score a critical hit when making an Attack action with this fighter, that Attack action has +1 Damage.

3502.name: Gallant's Courage
3502.rule: When this fighter is the target of an Attack action, they cannot be driven back if there are any successes in their defence roll.

3503.name: Gloryseeker
3503.rule: +1 Damage to this fighter's Attack actions that target a fighter with a Wounds characteristic of 4 or more.

3506.name: Great Strength
3506.rule: +1 Damage to all Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2.

3508.name: Horrifying Armour
3508.rule: -1 Wound (to a minimum of 1). Adjacent enemy fighters' Attack actions have -1 Dice, to a minimum of 1.

3509.name: Hunter's Tenacity
3509.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter makes an Attack action against an adjacent enemy fighter that drives them back, push this fighter into the hex the other was in.

3510.name: Loathe Stone
3510.rule: Players roll 1 fewer dice in the casting roll (to a minimum of 1) for fighter that attempt to cast a spell within two hexes of this fighter.

3511.name: Low Cunning
3511.rule: Fighters supported by this fighter have +1 Damage on their Attack actions with a Range or 1 or 2.

3512.name: Lucky Trinket
3512.rule: **Reaction:** During an enemy fighter's spell or spell Attack action, if the spell is cast and the caster is within three hexes of this fighter, roll three magic dice. If you roll at least one :MagCrit: that spell is not cast and is not resolved. In either case, discard this card.

3513.name: Mirror of Spite
3513.rule: **Reaction:** During an enemy fighter's Attack action that takes this fighter out of action, before removing them from the battlefield, all adjacent enemy fighters suffer 1 damage.

3514.name: Mutating Maul
3514.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 2] \n When a fighter makes this Attack action, choose Cleave or Knockback 1. This Attack action has that rule in this activation.

3515.name: Nullstone Arrows
3515.rule: [:Hex: 4 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 1] \n You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll if the target is a wizard.

3516.name: Nullstone Axe
3516.rule:
[:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 2] 
 You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll if the target is a wizard 
 [:Hex: 3 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 1] 
 After a fighter makes this Attack action, discard this upgrade. You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll if the target is a wizard.
