3517.name: Nullstone Dagger
3517.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atFury: 3 - :boom: 2] \n If there are any :atCrit: in the attack roll, this Attack action has Cleave. You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll if the target is a wizard.

3518.name: Nullstone Darts
3518.rule: [:Hex: 3 - :atFury: 3 - :boom: 1] \n You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll if the target is a wizard.

3519.name: Nullstone Hammer
3519.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 2 -(Knockback 1)-] \n You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll if the target is a wizard.

3520.name: Nullstone Mace
3520.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 2] \n You can re-roll up to two dice in the attack roll if the target is a wizard.

3521.name: Nullstone Spear
3521.rule: [:Hex: 2 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 2] \n You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll if the target is a wizard.

3522.name: Nullstone Sword
3522.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 3 - :boom: 2] \n You can re-roll one dice in the attack roll if the target is a wizard.

3523.name: Paradox Armour
3523.rule: When the target of an Attack action, this fighter counts rolls of :dfDodge: and :dfBlock: as successes, but does not count rolls or :dfCrit: as successes or critical successes.

3524.name: Parrying Blade
3524.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 1] \n **Reaction:** During an Attack action that targets this fighter and fails, this fighter cannot be pushed back and you make this Attack action.

3525.name: Possessed Weapon
3525.rule: After each Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 this fighter makes, they suffer 1 damage. Their Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2 have +1 Damage.

3526.name: Potion of Clarity
3526.rule: **Reaction:** During this fighter's attempt to cast a spell, after the casting roll, discard this card. You can re-roll one dice from the casting roll.

3527.name: Potion of Constitution
3527.rule: **Reaction:** During an Attack action or gambit that will damage this fighter, discard this card. Reduce the damage suffered by 1, to a minimum of 1.

3528.name: Potion of Grace
3528.rule: **Reaction:** After a Move token is placed next to this fighter, discard this card. Remove that token.

3529.name: Potion of Rage
3529.rule: **Reaction:** During this fighter's Attack action, before any dice are rolled, discard this card. The Attack action has +2 Dice until the action is resolved.

3530.name: Quick Learner
3530.rule: **Reaction:** After an enemy fighter's Attack action or another warband's gambit that damages this fighter but does not take them out of action, draw a power card.

3531.name: Ready for the Fight
3531.rule: **Reaction:** After an enemy fighter's Move action that is part of a Charge action, you can push this fighter up to two hexes. This push must bring them adjacent to the enemy fighter.

3532.name: Regenerative Charm
3532.rule: Remove up to one wound token from this fighter's fighter card at the beginning of each round.

3533.name: Reinforced Armour
3533.rule: This fighter takes no damage from Attack actions with a Damage characteristic (before modifiers) of 1, unless those result in a critical hit.

3534.name: Ritual Dagger
3534.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: - - :boom: 2] \n When a fighter makes this Attack action, the Dice characteristic (before other modifiers) is equal to their wizard level. If there are any :atCrit: in the attack roll, this Attack action has Cleave.

3535.name: Scroll of Recall
3535.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's gambit spell is resolved, discard this card and roll a magic dice. On a roll of :MagChannel:, place the gambit spell on top of your power deck instead of on your power discard pile.

3536.name: Seeking Blade
3536.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 1] \n Rolls of :dfDodge: aren't successes in defence rolls for targets of this Attack action.

3537.name: Seeking Stones
3537.rule: [:Hex: 3 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 1] \n Rolls of :dfDodge: are not considered successes against this Attack action.

3538.name: Shifting Map
3538.rule: If this fighter is not out of action in the third end phase, draw an objective card. If it is worth 1 glory point, you gain 1 glory point (you cannot score the card you draw).

3539.name: Slumbering Key
3539.rule: If this fighter is not out of action in the third end phase, gain 1 glory point.

3540.name: Spinning Defence
3540.rule: **Reaction:** During an Attack action that targets this fighter and fails, this fighter cannot be pushed. Scatter 2 from this fighter's hex and push this fighter along the chain to the end hex. If the fighter cannot be pushed into a hex, the push ends in the last hex in the chain they can occupy.

3541.name: Spiteful Charm
3541.rule: **Reaction:** After an enemy fighter's Attack action that damages this fighter, discard this card. Choose one of the enemy fighter's upgrades. That card is discarded.

3542.name: Strong-arm
3542.rule: **Action:** Push an adjacent enemy fighter up to one hex.

3544.name: Swordbreaker
3544.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 3 - :boom: 2] \n On a critical hit, you can choose one of the target fighter's upgrades that confers an Attack action. That card is discarded.

3545.name: Tome of Diseases
3545.rule: **Katophrane Tome** \n **Action:** Choose an adjacent enemy fighter. They suffer 1 damage.

3546.name: Tome of Glories
3546.rule: **Katophrane Tome** \n **Action:** If this fighter is holding an objective, gain 1 glory point. Place a Charge token next to this fighter.

3547.name: Tome of Healing
3547.rule: *(Errata update)* \n **Katophrane Tome** \n **Action:** Choose this fighter or an adjacent friendly fighter. Remove up to one wound token from that fighter's fighter card.

3548.name: Tome of Incantations
3548.rule: **Katophrane Tome** \n Each time this fighter attempts to cast a spell, after the casting roll, you can change one of the symbols rolled to :MagChannel:.

3549.name: Tome of Insight
3549.rule: *(Errata update)* \n **Katophrane Tome** \n **Action:** Choose an opponent. They must reveal the power cards in their hand to you.

3550.name: Tome of Offerings
3550.rule: **Katophrane Tome** \n If this fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action, gain 1 additional glory point.

3552.name: Tome of Warfare
3552.rule: **Katophrane Tome** \n **Action:** Choose this fighter or an adjacent friendly fighter. Their next Attack action has +1 Dice.

3553.name: Touch of Death
3553.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 1 - :boom: 3] \n Place a Charge token next to any fighter damaged by this Attack action.

3554.name: Unstoppable Force
3554.rule: This fighter's Attack actions with a Range of 1 or 2 gain Knockback 1.

3555.name: Voidsceptre
3555.rule: **Action:** Choose a persisting effect or spell that is affecting a fighter within two hexes of this fighter. That effect or spell ends.

3556.name: Warding Scroll
3556.rule: **Reaction:** After an enemy fighter's spell is cast, but before it is resolved, if this fighter is on the battlefield, discard this card. The spell is not cast.

3557.name: Well of Power
3557.rule: While this fighter is Inspired, you can roll an extra dice when they attempt to cast a spell.

4001.name: Focal Formation
4001.rule: Score this immediately if a friendly Rastus and a friendly Ammis are both holding objectives after an activation.

4002.name: Storm's Fury
4002.rule: The first friendly fighter's Attack action in the next activation has +1 Damage.

4004.name: Deathly Clutches
4004.rule: Score this immediately when two or more friendly fighters become Inspired at the start of your activation.

4005.name: Freezing Fear
4005.rule: Choose an enemy fighter adjacent to your leader. Place a Move token next to the enemy fighter.

4006.name: Haunting Obsession
4006.rule: This fighter cannot be pushed while they are adjacent to any enemy fighters. If a push takes this fighter adjacent to any enemy fighters, the push ends in that hex.

4007.name: Architect of Fate
4007.rule: Score this immediately if a friendly fighter is the target of an enemy Attack action with a Dice characteristic of 3 or more that fails.

4008.name: Forewarned
4008.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during an Attack action that targets a friendly fighter, before the attack roll. You can re-roll any number of dice in that fighter's defence roll.

4009.name: Mark of Favour
4009.rule: Roll a defence dice each time this fighter suffers any amount of damage. On a roll of :dfCrit: this fighter does not suffer that damage.

4010.name: Petty Vindication
4010.rule: Score this in an end phase if you scored two or more other objective cards in this round.

4011.name: Leaping Loon
4011.rule: Your leader has +2 Defence in the next activation.

4013.name: Worthy Kill
4013.rule: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter makes an Attack action that takes an enemy fighter with a Wounds characteristic of 4 or more out of action.

4014.name: Dark Portent
4014.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during an Attack action that targets a friendly fighter, before the attack roll. Rolls of :atCrit: in the attack roll are not successes or critical successes.

4015.name: Writhing Charm
4015.rule: When exactly 1 damage would be caused to this fighter, this fighter does not duffer that damage. When this happens, roll a defence dice. On anything but a :dfBlock: discard this card.

4016.name: Territorial
4016.rule: Score this in an end phase if no enemy fighters are in your territory.

4017.name: Horrible Grin
4017.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an enemy fighter's Attack action with a Range of 1 that targets a friendly Mollog but does not take that Mollog out of action. The enemy fighter is no longer Inspired, and cannot be Inspired. This effect persists.

4018.name: Spark of Sentience
4018.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's activation, draw a power card.

4019.name: Steady Aim
4019.rule: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter's attack roll includes only successes.

4020.name: Duardin Resilience
4020.rule: The first time a friendly fighter suffers any amount of damage in the next activation, they only suffer 1 damage.

4021.name: Disciplined Retreat
4021.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's Attack action, push them up to two hexes.

4022.name: Avatar of Vengeance
4022.rule: Score this immediately if there is only one surviving friendly fighter after an activation.

4023.name: Bitter Vengeance
4023.rule: The first Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has +1 Dice for each friendly fighter that is out of action.

4024.name: Spitethorn Arrow
4024.rule: [:Hex: 4 - :atSmash: 3 - :boom: 2] \n Rolls of :dfDodge: are not successes against this Attack action. Discard this card after making this Attack action.

4025.name: Burst of Speed
4025.rule: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter makes their second or subsequent Move action in this phase.

4026.name: Champions All
4026.rule: Score this immediately when a second or subsequent enemy fighter is taken out of action in this phase, and each one was taken out of action by an Attack action made by a different friendly fighter.

4027.name: Chokepoint
4027.rule: Score this in an end phase if a fighter is in each hex (other than blocked hexes) in no one's territory.

4028.name: Fusillade
4028.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband made an Attack action with a Range of 3 or more in four or more activations in the preceding action phase.

4029.name: Grievous Toll
4029.rule: Score this in an end phase if three or more enemy fighters, and no friendly fighters, were taken out of action in the preceding action phase.

4030.name: Method in the Madness
4030.rule: Score this immediately when an enemy fighter is taken out of action by a spell that has Scatter.

4031.name: Overpower
4031.rule: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter successfully casts a spell if there were one or more :MagCrit: in the casting roll.

4032.name: Shortcut
4032.rule: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter is taken out of one hex and immediately placed in a different hex, but not as a result of a push or a Move action.

4033.name: Spike
4033.rule: Score this immediately after an enemy fighter suffers damage, and they have suffered 5 or more damage in this phase (damage in excess of their Wounds characteristic counts).

4034.name: Staying Power
4034.rule: Score this in the third end phase if there are five or more surviving friendly fighters.

4035.name: Strange Demise
4035.rule: Score this immediately when an enemy fighter is taken out of action by a spell that damaged them or by a spell Attack action that damaged them.

4036.name: Warning Shot
4036.rule: Score this immediately when a friendly fighter's Attack action with a Range of 3 or more fails.

4037.name: Arrow Snare
4037.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during an enemy fighter's Attack action with a Range of 3 or more that targets a friendly fighter, before the attack roll. Place a Guard token next to that friendly fighter.

4038.name: Fizzle
4038.rule: **Reaction:** Play this when an enemy fighter successfully casts a spell. Roll a magic dice. On a roll of :MagChannel: that spell is not cast.

4039.name: Fumble
4039.rule: The first Attack action made by an enemy fighter in the next activation has -1 Dice, to a minimum of 1.

4040.name: Galvanised
4040.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an Attack action that takes a friendly fighter out of action. +2 Dice to the first Attack action made by a friendly fighter in the next activation.

4041.name: Inspired Attack
4041.rule: The first Attack action with a Range of 1 made by an Inspired friendly fighter in the next activation has +1 Dice and +1 Damage.

4042.name: Keen Avarice
4042.rule: The first Attack action with a Range of 1 or 2 made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has +1 Dice and Cleave if the target is holding an objective.

4043.name: Long Shot
4043.rule: The first Attack action with a Range or 3 or more made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has +1 Range.

4044.name: Seggut's Salvo
4044.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel::MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, choose an enemy fighter within three hexes of the caster. The fighter you chose suffers 1 damage and you can push them one hex - this push must take them further away from the caster.

4045.name: Shadow Shape
4045.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel:):** If this spell is cast, the caster cannot be pushed. This spell persists until the end of the round.

4046.name: Sorcerous Flourish
4046.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after resolving a spell cast by a friendly fighter that damaged one or more enemy fighters. Choose one of those enemy fighters. That fighter suffers 1 damage.

4047.name: Two Steps Forward
4047.rule: Choose two friendly fighters and push each of them one hex. Then choose an opponent: they choose one fighter from their warband and push them up to one hex.

4048.name: Upper Hand
4048.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during a friendly fighter's Attack action, when the attack roll and defence roll are compared. If the rolls are tied, add one success to the attack roll.

4049.name: Blazing Soul
4049.rule: This fighter is Inspired and cannot be un-Inspired. This upgrade cannot be applied to a fighter that cannot be Inspired.

4050.name: Eldritch Ward
4050.rule: When this fighter suffers damage, reduce that damage by 1 to a minimum to 1.

4051.name: Huge Presence
4051.rule: When an opponent chooses a target for an Attack action, they consider this fighter's hex to be a blocked hex, unless this fighter is chosen as the target.

4052.name: Leech Stone
4052.rule: Wound tokens cannot be removed from the fighter cards of fighters within two hexes of this fighter.

4053.name: Lethal Reflexes
4053.rule: **Reaction:** After an enemy fighter's Move action, if that fighter left a hex adjacent to this fighter during that Move action, roll an attack dice. On a roll of :atSmash: or :atCrit: that fighter suffers 1 damage.

4054.name: Prized Vendetta
4054.rule: *(Errata update)* When you give a fighter this upgrade, choose an enemy fighter. You can re-roll any number of dice in this fighter's attack rolls for Attack actions that target the chosen fighter.

4055.name: Quickening Greaves
4055.rule: In each round, you can do one of the following: push this fighter one hex before the roll to determine who has the first activation. or push this fighter one hex after the final power step.

4056.name: Spectral Armour
4056.rule: If this fighter's Defence characteristic is :dfDodge:, they have +1 Defence.

4057.name: Spiritbond
4057.rule: When you apply this upgrade, choose a friendly fighter other than the one who receives this upgrade. While the fighter you chose is on the battlefield, they are always considered to be supporting this fighter.

4058.name: Swift as an Arrow
4058.rule: **Reaction:** After an Attack action in which there were any number of :atCrit: in this fighter's attack or defence roll, push this fighter up to that number of hexes.

4059.name: Unnatural Defences
4059.rule: **Reaction:** After an enemy fighter's Attack action with a Range of 1 that damages this fighter, roll an attack dice. On a roll of :atSmash: or :atCrit: the attacking fighter suffers 1 damage.

4060.name: Wall of Force
4060.rule: [:Hex: 3 - :MagChannel: - - :boom: 0] \n This Attack action deals no damage when it is successful. It has Knockback X, where X is the number of successes in the attack roll.

5001.name: Aetheric Mastery
5001.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* There are two or more surviving friendly fighters \n *And:* All friendly fighters are Inspired.

5002.name: Forceful Banishment
5002.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when an enemy fighter is **driven back** by a friendly fighter's **Attack action** that has the **Knockback** ability.

5003.name: Martial Prowess
5003.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after your warband makes a third or subsequent successful **Attack action** in the same phase.

5004.name: Sacrosanct Purge
5004.rule: Score this in an end phase if two or more enemy fighters were taken out of action in this round.

5005.name: Sally Forth
5005.rule: Score this in an end phase if there are two or more friendly fighters adjacent to each other in enemy territory.

5006.name: Stormforged Heroes
5006.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* There are two or more surviving friendly fighters \n *And:* Each surviving friendly fighter has one or more upgrades.

5007.name: Strength in Unity
5007.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* There are two or more surviving friendly fighters \n *And:* Each surviving friendly fighter has one or more Move tokens, and/or each surviving friendly fighter has one or more Charge tokens and/or each surviving friendly fighter has one or more Guard tokens.

5008.name: Uncontested Might
5008.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds one or more objectives in enemy territory.

5009.name: Vengeance Satisfied
5009.rule: Score this in an end phase if more than half of the fighters in one or more enemy warbands are out of action.

5010.name: Vindicated Arrogance
5010.rule: Score this in an end phase if your **leader** was the target of one or more **Attack actions** in this round and is on the battlefield.

5011.name: Wrathful Blow
5011.rule: **Surge, Dual:** Score this immediately \n *If:* A friendly fighter's **Attack action** takes an enemy fighter out of action \n *And:* That friendly fighter has one or more wound tokens.

5012.name: Your Turn!
5012.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when an enemy fighter is **driven back** into a hex adjacent to a friendly fighter.

5013.name: Adaptive Tactics
5013.rule: **Draw** up to one objective card and up to one power card, and then **discard** one objective card.

5014.name: Champions of Sigmar
5014.rule: The first Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has **Innate** (:atSup1:).

5015.name: Fulminating Blast
5015.rule: **Push** an enemy fighter up to one hex.

5016.name: Improvised Blow
5016.rule: **Choose** a friendly fighter adjacent to an enemy fighter. The chosen fighter makes the following **Attack action**. \n [:Hex: 1 - :atFury: 3 - :boom: 1]

5017.name: Inevitable Blow
5017.rule: Pick **Cleave** or **Ensnare**. The first Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has that ability

5018.name: Outflank
5018.rule: **Choose** a friendly fighter adjacent to another fighter and **push** them up to two hexes.

5019.name: Steadfast
5019.rule: **Choose** a friendly fighter and **give** them a Guard token

5020.name: Thunderous Smite
5020.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during a friendly fighter's Range 1 **Attack action** that will **succeed**, before the deal damage step. In that step, instead of dealing damage equal to the Damage characteristic of the **Attack action**, the target is **dealt** 1 damage and each enemy fighter adjacent to the target is **dealt** 1 damage.

5021.name: Unyielding Resolve
5021.rule: **Choose** a friendly fighter and roll a defence dice. On a roll of :dfBlock: or :dfCrit:, **Heal** (2) that fighter, otherwise **Heal** (1) that fighter.

5022.name: Vengeful Strike
5022.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during an enemy fighter's **Attack action** that **deals** damage to an adjacent friendly fighter, before the drive back step. Roll an attack dice. On a roll of :atSmash: or :atCrit: the friendly fighter is not **driven back** and makes an **Attack action** that targets the attacker.

5023.name: Aetherically Charged Shield
5023.rule: You can **re-roll** one dice in each defence roll made for this fighter.

5024.name: Aetherically Charged Weapon
5024.rule: You can **re-roll** one dice in the attack roll of the first **Attack action** this fighter makes in each round.

5026.name: Enchanted Robes
5026.rule: +1 Move \n This fighter treats **lethal** hexes as normal hexes.

5027.name: Hallowed Aura
5027.rule: **Reaction:** After an **Attack action** that **deals** damage to this fighter, roll an attack dice. On a roll of :atSmash: or :atCrit: **Heal** (1) this fighter.

5028.name: Punishing Blow
5028.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 3 - :boom: 4 -(Cleave)-] \n After a fighter makes this **Attack action**, **discard** this card.

5029.name: Sanctified Armour
5029.rule: When this fighter is **dealt** damage, reduce that damage by 1, to a minimum of 1.

5030.name: Soul-hardened Shield
5030.rule: When this fighter is activated, before making an action with them, **give** them a Guard token.

5031.name: Spirit Flask
5031.rule: **Action: Choose** one: **Deal** 1 damage to an adjacent enemy fighter, or **Heal** (2) this fighter. **Discard** this card.

5033.name: Bitter Embrace
5033.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* There are two or more surviving friendly fighters \n *And:* Each surviving friendly fighter is adjacent to one or more enemy fighters.

5034.name: Creeping Dread
5034.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* There are three or more surviving friendly fighters \n *And:* Each surviving friendly fighter has one or more Move and/or Charge tokens.

5035.name: Dominion of Death
5035.rule: Score this in the third end phase if you have scored the most objective cards.

5036.name: Fleeting Memories
5036.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when a friendly fighter finishes a **Move action** and entered two or more different hexes that contained an objective during that **Move action**.

5037.name: Frozen in Place
5037.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if one or more enemy fighters each have one or more Guard tokens.

5038.name: Ghostly Torment
5038.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* There are two or more surviving friendly fighters \n *And:* Two or more surviving fighters each have one or more wound tokens.

5039.name: Inescapable Hunger
5039.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when a friendly fighter makes a **Move action** through one or more **blocked** hexes and ends that **Move action** adjacent to an enemy fighter.

5040.name: Nagash's Tithe
5040.rule: Score this in an end phase if there are more enemy fighters out of action than friendly fighters out of action.

5041.name: Nexus of Terror
5041.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds the most objectives.

5042.name: One Will
5042.rule: **Surge, Dual:** Score this immediately \n *If:* Your warband holds one or more even numbered objectives \n *And:* Your warband holds one or more odd numbered objectives.

5043.name: Spectral Vortex
5043.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when an enemy fighter is the target of a second or subsequent successful **Attack action** in this phase, and each **Attack action** was made by a different friendly fighter.

5044.name: Tide of Malice
5044.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* There are two or more surviving friendly fighters \n *And:* Each surviving friendly fighter is Inspired.

5045.name: Call of the Grave
5045.rule: **Choose** an enemy fighter and **push** them up to two hexes towards a friendly fighter.

5046.name: Chilling Scream
5046.rule: Your opponents cannot play power cards. This **persists** until the end of the power step.

5047.name: Dissipate
5047.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during an **Attack action**, before the attack roll. **Choose** a friendly fighter. That fighter gains **Innate** (:dfDodge:). This **persists** until the **Attack action** ends or until that friendly fighter is taken out of action.

5048.name: Echoing Spite
5048.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's Range 1 **Attack action** that fails. That fighter makes that **Attack action** again.

5049.name: Enervating Sorrow
5049.rule: **Reaction:** Play this when an opponent plays a ploy, before that ploy is resolved. That opponent can **discard** a power card. If they do not, the ploy is not resolved.

5050.name: Frightful Aspect
5050.rule: **Push** an enemy fighter up to one hex.

5051.name: Shared Agony
5051.rule: **Choose** a friendly fighter with one or more wound tokens and an enemy fighter adjacent to them. **Heal** (1) the friendly fighter. The enemy fighter is **dealt** 1 damage.

5052.name: Soaring Spite
5052.rule: Double the Move characteristic of the first friendly fighter to make a **Move action** (not as part of a **Charge action**) in the next activation.

5053.name: Spectral Charge
5053.rule: +1 Damage to the first Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter in the next activation.

5054.name: Spectral Grasp
5054.rule: Reduce the Move characteristic of the first fighter to be activated in the next activation by the number of friendly fighters that are out of action, to a minimum of 0.

5055.name: Arcane Siphon
5055.rule: **Action: Choose** one enemy fighter within three hexes of this fighter. Pick one of that fighter's upgrades. That upgrade is **discarded**. Roll an attack dice. On a roll of :atSmash: or :atCrit: **discard** this card.

5056.name: Debilitating Aura
5056.rule: The **Attack actions** of adjacent enemy fighters have -1 Dice (to a minimum of 1).

5057.name: Gravesand Glass
5057.rule: **Reaction:** After an **Attack action** or ploy that takes an enemy fighter out of action, **Heal** (1) this fighter.

5058.name: Hollow Hatred
5058.rule: You can **re-roll** one dice in the attack roll of the first **Attack action** this fighter makes in each round.

5059.name: Maddening Hunger
5059.rule: This fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions** have +1 Dice if they have a Charge token.

5060.name: Soul Harvest
5060.rule: **Action:** If one or more enemy fighters are out of action, **Heal** (1) this fighter, and **give** this fighter a Guard token.

5061.name: Soul Leech
5061.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter makes a **Move action**, roll an attack dice. On a roll of :atSmash: or :atCrit: the first enemy fighter they moved through in that **Move action** is **dealt** 1 damage.

5062.name: Spirit Blade
5062.rule: While one or more enemy fighters are out of action, this fighter has the following **Attack action:** \n [:Hex: 1 - :atFury: 3 - :boom: 3 -(Cleave)-]

6001.name: Bestial Cunning
6001.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when you play your third or subsequent gambit in a single round.

6002.name: Blood Ritual
6002.rule: Score this in an end phase if there are two or more Ritual counters on your **leader's** fighter card.

6003.name: Bloodshed
6003.rule: Score this in an end phase if *three* or more enemy fighters are out of action.

6004.name: Conquerors
6004.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds one or more objectives in enemy territory.

6005.name: Despoilers
6005.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if your warband holds three or more objectives.

6006.name: Killing Blow
6006.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when a friendly fighter's **Attack action** that targets a fighter that has no wound tokens takes the target fighter out of action.

6007.name: Proven Superiority
6007.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* Any enemy **leaders** are out of action \n *And:* Your **leader** is not out of action.

6008.name: Raiders
6008.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if three or more friendly fighters are in enemy territory.

6009.name: Stampede
6009.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when a third or subsequent friendly fighter makes a **Charge action** in the same phase.

6010.name: Survival of the Fittest
6010.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* There are one or more surviving friendly fighters \n *And: Five* or more fighters are out of action.

6011.name: Swarm the Battlefield
6011.rule: Score this in an end phase if there are one of more friendly fighters in each of the following: your territory, enemy territory, and no one's territory.

6012.name: Taint of Ruin
6012.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband **cast** two or more spells in the preceding action phase.

6013.name: Baying Anger
6013.rule: +1 Dice to the first Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter in the next activation.

6014.name: Baying Hatred
6014.rule: +1 Damage to the first Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter in the next activation.

6015.name: Berserk Bellow
6015.rule: **Choose** an enemy fighter adjacent to a friendly fighter and **push** them up to one hex, and up to one additional hex for each wound token the friendly fighter has.

6016.name: Bestial Vigour
6016.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If **cast**, friendly fighters have +2 Move in the next activation.

6017.name: Blood Taunt
6017.rule: **Choose** a friendly fighter. They are **dealt** 1 damage. **Give** them a Guard token. +2 Dice to the first **Attack action** made by that fighter in the next activation.

6018.name: Bull Charge
6018.rule: The first **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter as part of a **Charge action** in the next activation has **Innate (:atFury:)**.

6019.name: Devolve
6019.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagCrit:):** If **cast**, **choose** an enemy fighter within four hexes of the caster. That fighter is **dealt** 1 damage. Then **push** that fighter up to one hex. This must take them closer to the caster.

6020.name: Skirmisher
6020.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's **Move action** (not as part of a **Charge action**). That fighter can make a Range 3+ **Attack action**.

6021.name: Vile Invaders
6021.rule: **Choose** up to two friendly **Hunters** and **push** them up to two hexes each.

6022.name: Weight of Numbers
6022.rule: +1 Damage to the first **Attack action** made by a friendly **Hunter** in the next activation if there are one or more friendly **supporting Hunters**.

6023.name: Blinding Attack
6023.rule: [:Hex: 3 - :atFury: 3 - :boom: 1] \n This **Attack action** has +1 Damage when it targets an adjacent enemy fighter.

6024.name: Bloodcrazed
6024.rule: +1 Damage to this fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions** if this fighter has one or more wound tokens and/or is adjacent to a fighter that has one or more wound tokens.

6026.name: Dogged Survivor
6026.rule: **Reaction:** After an **Attack action** that targets this fighter and fails, **push** this fighter up to two hexes.

6027.name: Endless Hatred
6027.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's **Attack action** that takes an enemy fighter out of action, this fighter makes another **Attack action**. You can only use this reaction once per round.

6029.name: Jabbing Spear
6029.rule: +1 Range to this fighter's Shortspear **Attack action**.

6030.name: Savage Bolt
6030.rule: [:Hex: 3 - :MagFocus: - - :boom: 1] \n **Knockback** 1. On a **critical hit** this **Attack action** has +1 Damage.

6031.name: Sorcerous Trinket
6031.rule: You can **re-roll** one dice in the casting roll each time this fighter attempts to cast a spell.

6032.name: Trophy Taker
6032.rule: When this fighter's **Attack action** takes an adjacent enemy fighter out of action, gain 1 glory point.

6033.name: Aspects of Kurnoth
6033.rule: Score this in an end phase if all surviving friendly fighters are Inspired.

6034.name: Cry of the Wild
6034.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* A friendly Karthaen made the Hunting Horn action in the previous phase \n *And:* There is a surviving friendly Karthaen.

6035.name: Gifts of the Kurnoth
6035.rule: Score this in an end phase if three or more surviving friendly fighters each have one or more upgrades.

6036.name: Hunt's End
6036.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* An enemy fighter with a Wounds characteristic of 4 or greater is out of action \n *Or:* Your warband holds three or more objectives.

6037.name: Kurnoth's Snare
6037.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when an enemy fighter is **pushed** into a **lethal** hex.

6038.name: Purifying Rites
6038.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds all objectives in one or more player's territory.

6039.name: Ritual Kill
6039.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when your warband takes an enemy fighter standing in the same hex as an objective out of action.

6040.name: Run Down
6040.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when a friendly fighter takes an enemy fighter out of action with an **Attack action** made as part of a **Charge action**.

6041.name: Run Through
6041.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when your **leader** takes an enemy fighter out of action.

6042.name: Safety in Swiftness
6042.rule: Score this in an end phase if three or more surviving friendly fighters each have one or more Move and/or Charge tokens.

6043.name: Slay the Corrupted
6043.rule: Score this in an end phase if *three* or more enemy fighters are out of action.

6044.name: Soulbinding
6044.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when your warband **casts** a spell.

6045.name: Binding Wind
6045.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If **cast**, **choose** an enemy fighter within four hexes of the caster. **Give** that fighter a Move token.

6046.name: Fleet of Foot
6046.rule: **Choose** a friendly fighter that has no Move or Charge tokens. They make a **Move action**.

6047.name: Healing Breeze
6047.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If **cast**, pick a hex within four hexes of the caster. **Heal** (1) any fighters in that hex and in hexes adjacent to that hex.

6048.name: Hunt in Concert
6048.rule: **Choose** up to two friendly fighters and **push** each of them up to one hex.

6049.name: Might of Kurnoth
6049.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If **cast**, **choose** a friendly fighter. Their Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions** have +1 Damage. This spell **persists** until the end of the round or until that fighter is taken out of action.

6050.name: Pounce
6050.rule: **Push** a friendly fighter up to three hexes so that they are adjacent to an enemy fighter that has one or more wound tokens.

6051.name: Retrieve Javelin
6051.rule: Your **leader** is no longer considered to have made a Javelin of the Hunt **Attack action**.

6052.name: Song of Swiftness
6052.rule: Friendly fighters have +1 Move. This effect **persists** until the end of the round or until the friendly Karthaen is taken out of action.

6053.name: Strike in Concert
6053.rule: The first Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has +1 Damage for each friendly **supporting** fighter.

6054.name: Swift as the Wind
6054.rule: **Choose** a friendly fighter that has one or more Move tokens. **Remove** one of those tokens.

6055.name: Battle Cry
6055.rule: **Action: Remove** all Guard tokens from adjacent enemy fighters. **Push** all adjacent enemy fighters up to one hex.

6057.name: Eye of Kurnoth
6057.rule: This fighter's **Attack actions** have +1 Dice. If the target is a **Quarry**, this fighter's **Attack actions** also have **Ensnare**.

6058.name: Fast Shot
6058.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's activation in which they made a Range 3+ **Attack action**, they make another Range 3+ **Attack action**.

6060.name: Hale Charm
6060.rule: When this fighter is **dealt** damage, reduce that damage by 1, to a minimum of 1.

6062.name: Kurnoth's Mark
6062.rule: You can **re-roll** one dice in the defence roll when this fighter is the target of an **Attack action**. \n **Reaction:** After a friendly fighter's **Attack action** that takes an adjacent enemy fighter out of action, if this card is in your hand, give that friendly fighter this upgrade (do not spend any glory points).

6064.name: Vicious Darts
6064.rule: [:Hex: 3 - :MagFocus: - - :boom: 1] \n **Ensnare**. On a **critical hit** this **Attack action** has +1 Damage.

6065.name: Bravely Done!
6065.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when a friendly fighter with one or more **supporting** fighters takes an enemy fighter out of action with an **Attack action**.

6066.name: Charnel House
6066.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in the third end phase \n *If:* All surviving friendly fighters are in enemy territory \n *Or:* There are no enemy fighters in your territory.

6067.name: Conquering Heroes
6067.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds one or more objectives in enemy territory.

6068.name: Defending the Hearth
6068.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when an enemy fighter is taken out of action in your territory.

6069.name: Ghoul Pack
6069.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if three or more friendly fighters are adjacent to the same enemy fighter.

6070.name: Glory of the Court
6070.rule: Score this in an end phase if three or more surviving friendly fighters are Inspired.

6071.name: In the Name of the King
6071.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if your warband holds three or more objectives.

6072.name: Incomprehensible Scheme
6072.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds more objectives than each enemy warband.

6073.name: Mordant Triumph
6073.rule: Score this in an end phase if you have scored five or more **surge** objective cards in this game.

6074.name: Mouths to Feed
6074.rule: Score this in an end phase if there are fewer surviving enemy fighters than there are enemy fighters out of action.

6075.name: Pervasive Delusion
6075.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when you play your third or subsequent gambit card in a single round.

6076.name: Shifting Madness
6076.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if your warband holds the objective when the same number as the current round (e.g. objective 1 in the first round).

6077.name: Appalling Visage
6077.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter and one adjacent enemy fighter. **Push** the chosen enemy fighter up to 2 hexes away from the chosen friendly fighter.

6078.name: Combat Drill
6078.rule: **Reaction:** After a friendly fighter's **Move action** made as part of a **Charge action**, **choose** another friendly fighter. The chosen fighter makes a **Move action**. The chosen fighter must end that **Move action** adjacent to the fighter making the **Charge action**.

6079.name: Double Time
6079.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's **Move action** (but not during a superaction). That fighter makes another **Move action**.

6080.name: Horrifying Spectacle
6080.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during an **Attack action** or gambit that has **dealt** enough damage to an enemy fighter to take it out of action, but before removing the fighter from the battlefield. All friendly fighters adjacent to that fighter are Inspired.

6081.name: Pack, Advance!
6081.rule: **Choose** one or more friendly **Crypt Ghouls** and **push** each of the chosen fighters up to 2 hexes.

6082.name: Recycled Riches
6082.rule: Take all the cards from your power discard pile that have the Grymwatch warband symbol. Shuffle them face down, then add the top card to your hand. Return the other cards to your power discard pile.

6083.name: Scrabbling Claws
6083.rule: **Choose** one enemy fighter that has one or more upgrades and is adjacent to one or more friendly fighters. The chosen fighter's player picks one of that fighter's upgrades and **discards** it.

6084.name: Shattering Impact
6084.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's **Attack action**, if that fighter has one or more upgrades. Pick one of their upgrades and one of their target's upgrades. Both cards are **discarded**.

6085.name: Stench of Victory
6085.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during a friendly fighter's successful **Attack action**, before the deal damage step. **Choose** another friendly fighter and **push** the chosen fighter up to 3 hexes so they are adjacent to the target.

6086.name: Strident Summons
6086.rule: A friendly Crakmarrow makes the Ghoul Call action.

6087.name: Aura of Command
6087.rule: **Action:** **Choose** two other friendly fighters. You cannot **choose** fighters with any Move or Charge tokens. Each of the chosen fighters makes a **Move action**.

6088.name: Drawn to Weakness
6088.rule: **Reaction:** After an activation, **push** this fighter 1 hex towards an enemy fighter that has one or more wound tokens.

6089.name: Grip of Madness
6089.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's **Move action**, if this fighter is holding an objective, place a Madness counter on this card. While there are one or more Madness counters on this card, this fighter cannot be **pushed**. **Remove** all Madness counters from this card when this fighter makes a **Move action**.

6090.name: Heroic Vision
6090.rule: +1 Dice to this fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions**.

6091.name: Hunter's Nose
6091.rule: Each enemy fighter is a **Quarry**. +1 Dice to this fighter's **Attack actions** that target a **Quarry**.

6092.name: Impervious Delusion
6092.rule: If this fighter would be **dealt** more than 2 damage by an **Attack action** or gambit, they are instead **dealt** 2 damage. This damage cannot be further modified.

6093.name: Right-hand Ghoul
6093.rule: **Reaction:** After a friendly Crakmarrow's **Move action**, if this fighter has no Move or Charge tokens, this fighter makes a **Move action**. This fighter must end the **Move action** adjacent to a friendly Crakmarrow

6094.name: Seized Weapon
6094.rule: When you give this upgrade to a friendly fighter from your hand, one adjacent enemy fighter is **dealt** 1 damage. \n [:Hex: 1 - :atFury: 3 - :boom: 2]

6095.name: Severed Trophy
6095.rule: When this fighter's **Attack action** takes an adjacent enemy fighter out of action, gain 1 additional glory point.

6096.name: Well Motivated
6096.rule: +1 Damage to this fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions**.

6097.name: Burning Spite
6097.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if two or more surviving friendly fighters are Inspired.

6098.name: Chase Down
6098.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if two or more friendly fighters are adjacent to the same enemy fighter.

6099.name: Conquered Land
6099.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds all objectives in one or more player's territories.

6100.name: Cruel Hunters
6100.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* Two or more enemy fighters are out of action \n *And:* One or more friendly fighters are in enemy territory.

6101.name: Feeding Time
6101.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when an enemy fighter is taken out of action by a friendly fighter's Snarlfang's Jaws **Attack action**.

6102.name: Lay Waste
6102.rule: Score this in an end phase if all enemy fighter's are out of action.

6103.name: Leading the Charge
6103.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after your **Leader** makes a successful **Attack action** as part of a **Charge action**.

6104.name: Loaded with Plunder
6104.rule: Score this in an end phase if one or more friendly fighters have three or more upgrades.

6105.name: Marking Your Territory
6105.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds one or more objectives in enemy territory.

6106.name: No Mercy
6106.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's successful **Attack action** that targeted an enemy fighter with one or more wound tokens.

6107.name: Plunderers
6107.rule: Score this in an end phase if each surviving friendly fighter has one or more upgrades.

6108.name: Swift Hunters
6108.rule: Score this in an end phase if three or more surviving friendly fighters each have one or more Move and/or Charge tokens.

6109.name: Defensive Manoeuvre
6109.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter. **Push** that fighter up to 1 hex away from the nearest enemy fighter. **Give** the friendly fighter one Guard token.

6110.name: Furious Reprisal
6110.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an enemy fighter's **Attack action** that targeted a friendly fighter. That friendly fighter makes an **Attack action** that must target that enemy fighter, and you can **re-roll** any number of dice in the attack roll.

6111.name: Hamstring
6111.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's  successful Snarlfang's Jaws **Attack action**. **Give** the target of that **Attack action** one Move token.

6112.name: Narrow Escape
6112.rule: **Reaction:** Play this when a friendly fighter is **dealt** damage, before placing wound tokens on their fighter card. Reduce that damage by 1, to a minimum of 1.

6113.name: Pack Tactics
6113.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter and up to two friendly fighters adjacent to that fighter. **Push** each chosen fighter 1 hex.

6114.name: Savage Mauling
6114.rule: The first Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has +1 Dice and +1 Damage for each **supporting** friendly fighter.

6115.name: Smell Weakness
6115.rule: The first **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has **Cleave** and **Ensnare** if the target has one or more wound tokens.

6116.name: Unbridled Ferocity
6116.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's failed Snarlfang's Jaws **Attack action**. That fighter makes a Snarlfang's Jaws **Attack action**.

6117.name: Venomous Spittle
6117.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's successful Snarlfang's Jaws **Attack action**. The target of that **Attack action** is **dealt** 1 damage at the end of each action phase. This effect **persists** until the target is out of action.

6118.name: Vindictive Attack
6118.rule: +2 Dice to the first **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter in the next activation.

6119.name: Bonded
6119.rule: When this fighter makes an **Attack action** that targets an adjacent enemy fighter, or is the target of an **Attack action** made by an adjacent enemy fighter, this fighter is considered to have one additional **supporting** fighter.

6120.name: Boss Hat
6120.rule: If your **leader** is out of action: \n +1 Defence \n +1 Damage to this fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions**.

6121.name: Circling Hunter
6121.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's **Attack action** (but not during a superaction) or after an **Attack action** that targets this fighter (but not during a superaction), **push** this fighter 1 hex.

6123.name: Fiendish Jab
6123.rule: +1 Damage to this fighter's Stabbin' Stikka **Attack action** for each :atCrit: in the attack roll.

6125.name: Hunt as One
6125.rule: When this fighter supports a friendly fighter, this fighter is considered to be two **supporting** fighters.

6127.name: Pack Leader
6127.rule: You can **re-roll** any number of dice in this fighter's attack rolls for the Snarlfang's Jaws **Attack action**.

6128.name: Quickdrop Venom
6128.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's successful **Attack action** (other than a Snarlfang's Jaws **Attack action**), roll one attack dice. On a :atSmash: or :atCrit: the target of that **Attack action** is **dealt** 1 damage.

6129.name: Blessed Endurance
6129.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when an **Attack action** with a Damage characteristic of 3 or more targets a friendly fighter and succeeds, if the friendly fighter is not taken out of action.

6130.name: Blessings Three
6130.rule: Score this in an end phase if any surviving friendly fighter has three or more upgrades.

6131.name: Chosen Warriors
6131.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* There are one or more surviving friendly fighters \n *And: Three* or more enemy fighters are out of action.

6132.name: Cycle of Decay
6132.rule: Score this in an end phase if you played two or more **Cycle** ploys in the preceding action phase.

6133.name: Faithful Reward
6133.rule: Score this in an end phase if each surviving friendly fighter is Inspired.

6134.name: Fell the Faithless
6134.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when an enemy **leader** is taken out of action.

6135.name: Nurgle's Garden Grows
6135.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in the third end phase \n *If:* There are no enemy fighters in your territory \n *Or:* Your warband holds more objectives than each opposing warband.

6136.name: Rotbringers
6136.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband successfully **cast** two or more spells in the preceding action phase.

6137.name: Sacred Tri-lobe
6137.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds three or more objectives.

6138.name: Seeping Rot
6138.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when a friendly fighter holding an objective is the target of an **Attack action** and is not **driven back**, if that fighter survives.

6139.name: Spread his Blessings
6139.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds one or more objectives in enemy territory.

6140.name: Strength of the Devoted
6140.rule: Score this in the third end phase if no friendly fighters are out of action.

6141.name: Blades of Putrefaction
6141.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If **cast**, friendly fighters' Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions** have +1 Damage on a **critical hit**. This spell **persists** until the end of the round.

6142.name: Blessing of Rust
6142.rule: **Choose** one enemy fighter adjacent to one or more friendly fighters. The chosen fighter's Defence characteristic is :dfDodge:. This effect **persists** until the chosen fighter is taken out of action.

6143.name: Fecund Vigour
6143.rule: **Cycle** \n You can **re-roll** one attack dice in friendly fighter's attack rolls. This effect **persists** until after the next **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter, the end of the round, or you play another **Cycle** ploy.

6144.name: Gift of Contagion
6144.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:)** If **cast**, **choose** one enemy fighter within 3 hexes of the casts. -1 Damage (to a minimum of 1) from the chosen fighter's **Attack actions**. This spell **persists** until the end of the round or the chosen fighter is taken out of action.

6145.name: Nauseous Revulsion
6145.rule: **Cycle** \n -1 Dice (to a minimum of 1) from **Attack actions** made by enemy fighters adjacent to one or more friendly fighters. This effect **persists** until the end of the round or you play another **Cycle** ploy.

6146.name: Rampant Disease
6146.rule: **Cycle** \n Roll one attack dice for each enemy fighter adjacent to one or more friendly fighters. For each roll of :atCrit: that enemy fighter is **dealt** 1 damage.

6147.name: Rancid Visitations
6147.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel::MagChannel:):** If **cast**, each enemy fighter adjacent to the caster is **dealt** 1 damage.

6148.name: Steady Advance
6148.rule: **Choose** up to two friendly fighters and **push** each chosen fighter 1 hex.

6149.name: The Burgeoning
6149.rule: **Cycle** \n **Heal (1)** the first friendly fighter that moves, is **place**, **pushed**, or **driven back** into a **lethal** hex. That fighter is not **dealt** damage from the **lethal** hex. This effect **persists** until a friendly fighter is healed in this way or you play another **Cycle** ploy.

6150.name: Unnatural Vitality
6150.rule: **Cycle** +1 Move to friendly fighters. This effect **persists** until the end of the round or you play another **Cycle** ploy.

6151.name: Fly Swarm
6151.rule: -1 Dice (to a minimum of 1) from **Attack actions** with a Range of 3 or more that target this fighter.

6152.name: Foetid Shroud
6152.rule: You can **re-roll** one dice in this fighter's defence rolls.

6153.name: Hulking Physique
6153.rule: -1 Move (to a minimum of 0) \n +1 Wounds \n +1 Damage to this fighter's Range 1 **Attack actions**.

6154.name: Living Plague
6154.rule: **Reaction:** After an enemy fighter's successful Range 1 **Attack action** that targets this fighter, roll one defence dice. On a roll of :dfBlock: or :dfCrit: that enemy fighter is **dealt** 1 damage.

6155.name: Pestilent Deliverer
6155.rule: This fighter's **Attack actions** made as part of a **Charge action** have **Cleave**.

6157.name: Retchling
6157.rule: Each time this fighter attempts to **cast** a spell, after the casting roll, you can change one of the symbols rolled to :MagChannel:. In addition, this fighter cannot be **dealt** damage by **backlash**.

6159.name: Unstoppable Tread
6159.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's activation, **push** this fighter 1 hex.

6160.name: Virulent Blade
6160.rule: You can **re-roll** one attack dice in this fighter's attack rolls for Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions**.

6161.name: Always Moving
6161.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* There is at least one surviving friendly fighter \n *And:* There are no friendly fighters in your territory.

6162.name: Arm of the Everwinter
6162.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when your warband **removes** a feature token from the battlefield, or flips a feature token.

6163.name: Boxed In
6163.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if there are three of more friendly fighters adjacent to the same enemy fighter.

6164.name: Butchering
6164.rule: Score this in an end phase if there are more enemy fighters out of action than surviving enemy fighters.

6165.name: Dinner Time
6165.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when an enemy fighter Moves into, is **pushed** into or is **placed** in the same hex as a friendly Trap model.

6166.name: Extra Crunchy
6166.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when your warband takes an enemy fighter with three or more upgrades out of action.

6167.name: Flush Them Out
6167.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately if your warband **pushes** an enemy fighter that is not adjacent to your **leader**, and after the **push** they are adjacent to your **leader**.

6168.name: Hunter's Feast
6168.rule: **Surge, Dual:** Score this immediately \n *When:* Your **leader's Attack action** takes an enemy fighter out of action \n *And:* Your **Leader** made one or more **Attack actions** that took an enemy fighter out of action earlier in this phase.

6169.name: Momentarily Sated
6169.rule: Score this in an end phase if *all enemy fighters* are out of action.

6170.name: Surprising Competence
6170.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when a friendly **Gnoblar's Attack action** takes an enemy fighter out of action.

6171.name: Top of the Food Chain
6171.rule: Score this in an end phase if your **leader** is the only surviving **leader**.

6172.name: Unexpected Cunning
6172.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after playing your third or subsequent power card in the same phase.

6173.name: Carnivore Senses
6173.rule: The first **Attack action** made by a friendly **Hunter** in the next activation has **Ensnare**.

6174.name: Driven Onwards
6174.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter that has one or more Move tokens. **Remove** those tokens.

6175.name: Frozen Earth
6175.rule: Pick a feature token in a hex that contains or is adjacent to your **leader**. **Remove** it from the battlefield.

6177.name: Gotcha!
6177.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's successful Trap Launcher **Attack action** that does not take the target out of action. **Give** the target one Move token.

6178.name: Icy Breath
6178.rule: **Choose** one enemy fighter within 3 hexes of your **leader** and roll one magic dice. On a roll of :MagChannel: or :MagCrit: the chosen fighter is **dealt** 1 damage.

6179.name: More Traps
6179.rule: Pick one feature token in a hex that contains or is adjacent to a friendly Bushwakka. Flip that token.

6180.name: Near Miss
6180.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly **Hunter's** failed **Attack action**. **Push** the target 1 hex.

6181.name: Quick Snack
6181.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an enemy fighter adjacent to your **leader** is taken out of action. If the enemy fighter's Wounds characteristic is 4 or more, **Heal (2)** your **leader**, otherwise **Heal (1)** your **leader**.

6182.name: Ravenous Fury
6182.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after your **leader's** failed Range 1 **Attack action**. Your **leader** makes one **Attack action**.

6183.name: Desperate Parry
6183.rule: **Reaction:** During an **Attack action** that targets this fighter, before the deal damage step, roll one defence dice. On a roll of :dfBlock: or :dfCrit: the combat sequence ends and this fighter is **dealt** no damage. Then **discard** this card.

6184.name: Famed Hunter
6184.rule: You can **re-roll** one attack dice in this fighter's attack rolls.

6185.name: Hunting Beast
6185.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's successful **Attack action**, pick one: \n **Push** the target 1 hex, or **push** this fighter 1 hex.

6186.name: Living Avalanche
6186.rule: +1 Damage to this fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions**.

6188.name: Plucky Pair
6188.rule: Rolls of :atSup1: are successes in this fighter's attack rolls and defence rolls.

6189.name: Savage Instinct
6189.rule: This fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions** have **Ensnare**.

6190.name: Scion of the Everwinter
6190.rule: **Action: Give** each adjacent enemy fighter one Move token.

6191.name: Toughened Hide
6191.rule: When this fighter is **dealt** damage, reduce that damage by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

6192.name: Veteran Hunter
6192.rule: **Action: Draw** up to two power cards.

6193.name: Blessings of Khaine
6193.rule: Score this in an end phase if two or more surviving friendly fighters are Inspired.

6194.name: Blood Rite
6194.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when a friendly fighter holding an objective makes an **Attack action** that takes an enemy fighter out of action.

6195.name: Consecrate to Khaine
6195.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when a friendly fighter's Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action** takes an enemy fighter holding an objective out of action.

6196.name: Daughters of the First Temple
6196.rule: Score this in an end phase of *two* or more enemy fighters are out of action.

6197.name: Devoted Disciple
6197.rule: Score this in an end phase if one or more surviving friendly fighters have one or more wound tokens.

6198.name: Perfect Kill
6198.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when a friendly fighter's **Attack action deals** exactly enough damage to take that fighter's target out of action.

6199.name: Proof of Devotion
6199.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in the third end phase \n *If:* All enemy fighters are out of action \n *Or:* Your warband holds all objectives in enemy territory.

6200.name: Purposeful Strike
6200.rule: Score this in an end phase if a friendly fighter with one or more Charge tokens is holding an objective.

6201.name: Ritualised Formation
6201.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds three or more objectives.

6202.name: Swift Sacrifice
6202.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when a friendly **leader** or Kyrae makes a Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action** that takes an enemy fighter out of action.

6203.name: Torturous Death
6203.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when your warband makes a third or subsequent **Attack action** that targets the same enemy fighter in this phase.

6204.name: Triumphant Stance
6204.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* One friendly fighter is holding an objective \n *And:* No other fighter is holding an objective.

6205.name: Bloodbane Venom
6205.rule: **Poison** \n **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's successful Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action**. Roll three attack dice. For each roll of :atCrit: the target of that **Attack action** is **dealt** 1 damage.

6206.name: Carve a Rune
6206.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during a friendly fighter's Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action** that succeeds, before dealing damage, if there was one or more :atCrit: in the attack roll. Gain 1 spent glory point.

6207.name: Catechism of Murder
6207.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter. That fighter is Inspired.

6208.name: Crimson Rejuvenation
6208.rule: **Heal** (1) each friendly fighter within 2 hexes of your **leader**.

6209.name: Drilled to Perfection
6209.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter and up to one adjacent friendly fighter. **Give** each chosen fighter one Guard token.

6210.name: Fanatical Faith
6210.rule: The first time a friendly fighter would be **dealt** any amount of damage in the next activation, that fighter is **dealt** 1 damage instead.

6211.name: Headlong Fury
6211.rule: **Choose** one Inspired friendly fighter. The chosen fighter makes a **Move action**. Do not **give** the chosen fighter a Move token for that action.

6212.name: Incredible Agility
6212.rule: In the next activation, friendly fighters other than Kyrae treat **lethal** hexes as normal hexes and can move through **occupied** hexes, but cannot end their move in an **occupied** hex.

6213.name: Perfect Precision
6213.rule: You can **re-roll** one attack dice in the attack roll of the first **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter in the next activation.

6214.name: Zealot's Rage
6214.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's **Attack action** that fails. That fighter makes an **Attack action**.

6215.name: Crimson Shard
6215.rule: You can **re-roll** one attack dice in this fighter's attack rolls for Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack actions**.

6216.name: Crone Blade
6216.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atFury: 3 - :boom: 2] \n **Reaction:** After this **Attack action**, if it succeeded, **Heal** (1) this fighter.

6217.name: Death Dancer
6217.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's **Attack action** (not during a superaction), **push** this fighter 1 hex.

6218.name: High Oracle's Butcher
6218.rule: After this fighter's **Attack action** that takes an adjacent enemy fighter out of action, gain 1 additional glory point.

6219.name: Invigorated Attack
6219.rule: +1 Dice to this fighter's **Attack actions** while this fighter is holding an objective.

6221.name: Rune of Khaine
6221.rule: **Reaction:** When this fighter is taken out of action by an enemy fighter's **Attack action** or an enemy warband's gambit, before removing this fighter from the battlefield, each adjacent enemy fighter is **dealt** 1 damage.

6222.name: Rune of Slaughter
6222.rule: +1 Damage to this fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions** for each :atCrit: in the attack roll.

6223.name: Victor of a Thousand Duels
6223.rule: **Reaction:** During a Range 1 **Attack action** that targets this fighter and fails, before the Drive Back step, roll one attack dice. On a roll of :atSmash: or :atCrit: this fighter cannot be **driven back** and can make an **Attack action**. It must target the attacker.

6225.name: Avalanche of Aggression
6225.rule: Score this in an end phase if there are more surviving friendly fighters than surviving enemy fighters.

6226.name: Brute Triumph
6226.rule: Score this in an end phase if *all enemy fighters* are out of action.

6227.name: Brutes is da Best
6227.rule: Score this in an end phase if your **leader** is the only surviving **leader**.

6228.name: Called to Waaagh!
6228.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if there are six or more Waaagh! counters on friendly fighters' fighter cards.

6229.name: Good Day's Work
6229.rule: Score this in an end phase if there are more enemy fighters out of action than surviving enemy fighters.

6230.name: Got It, Boss
6230.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if your warband holds one or more objectives in enemy territory.

6231.name: In Their Element
6231.rule: Score this in an end phase if each surviving friendly fighter is Inspired.

6232.name: Might of the Orruk
6232.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when a friendly fighter's **Attack action** with a Damage characteristic of 4 or more succeeds.

6233.name: Now Wot?
6233.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if your warband holds two or more objectives.

6234.name: Orruk Kunnin'
6234.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when you play your third or subsequent gambit in this round.

6235.name: Proppa Rumble
6235.rule: Score this in an end phase if four or more fighters are out of action and/or have wound tokens.

6236.name: Waaagh! Unleashed
6236.rule: Score this in an end phase if you **removed** four or more Waaagh! counters from friendly fighters' fighter cards in the previous phase.

6237.name: Berserk Fortitude
6237.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during an **Attack action** that targets a friendly fighter, before the deal damage step. **Remove** any number of Waaagh! counters from that fighter's fighter card. The **Attack action** has -1 Damage for each counter **removed** (to a minimum of 1).

6238.name: Berserk Strength
6238.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during a friendly fighter's Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action** after choosing a target. **Remove** any number of Waaagh! counters from that friendly fighter's fighter card. \n +1 Damage to that **Attack action** for each counter **removed**.

6239.name: Brawling
6239.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter adjacent to one or more enemy fighters. Place one Waaagh! counter on the chosen fighter's fighter card.

6240.name: Brutal Attack
6240.rule: +1 Dice to the first **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter in the next activation. After that **Attack action**, place one Waaagh! counter on that fighter's fighter card.

6241.name: Brutal Kunnin'
6241.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's **Move action** but not during a superaction. That fighter make an **Attack action**.

6242.name: Brutal Reprisal
6242.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during an **Attack action** that targets a friendly fighter and succeeds, before the drive back step. The friendly fighter cannot be **driven back**, and makes an **Attack action** that must target the attacker.

6243.name: Eager Advance
6243.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter and **push** them 1 hex. Place one Waaagh! counter on the chosen fighter's fighter card.

6244.name: Kunnin' Brutality
6244.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's **Attack action** (but not during a superaction). **Push** them up to 3 hexes.

6245.name: Power of the Waaagh!
6245.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter and roll two magic dice. For each roll of :MagFocus:, **Heal** (1) the chosen fighter.

6246.name: Waaagh! Energy
6246.rule: Roll one magic dice for each surviving friendly fighter. On a roll of :MagChannel: place one Waaagh! counter on that fighter's fighter card.

6247.name: Berserk Whirl
6247.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's activation, **Scatter** 2 from this fighter's hex and **push** them 1 hex along the **chain**. If you cannot **push** this fighter into an **empty** hex, nothing happens.

6248.name: Brute Charge
6248.rule: Rolls of :atSmash: and :atFury: are **successes** for this fighter's Range 1 **Attack actions** made as part of a **Charge action**.

6249.name: Brute Swing
6249.rule: This fighter's Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack actions** have **Knockback** 1.

6250.name: Incredible Bellow
6250.rule: **Action:** Pick one: **push** all adjacent enemy fighters up to 2 hexes, or **push** all other friendly fighters up to 1 hex.

6251.name: Inured to Pain
6251.rule: When this fighter is **dealt** damage, reduce that damage by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

6253.name: Seething Hatred
6253.rule: You can **re-roll** any number of attack dice in the attack rolls for this fighter's **Attack actions** that target a fighter with a Wounds characteristic of 4 or more.

6254.name: Vengeful Glare
6254.rule: **Reaction:** After an **Attack action** that targeted this fighter, place one Waaagh! counter on this fighter's fighter card.

6255.name: Vessel of the Waaagh!
6255.rule: **Action:** Place one Waaagh! counter on the fighter card of each friendly fighter within 2 hexes.

6256.name: Waaagh! 'Eadbutt
6256.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 2] \n **Remove** any number of Waaagh! counters from this fighter's fighter card before making the attack roll. \n +1 Damage to that **Attack action** for each counter **removed**.

6257.name: Absolute Stillness
6257.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* A friendly **Quarry** is holding an objective \n *And:* That fighter has no Move or Charge tokens.

6258.name: Abundance of Caution
6258.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation or power step if all surviving friendly fighters have one or more Guard tokens.

6259.name: Adaptive Strategy
6259.rule: Score this in an end phase if you have scored 5 or more **hybrid** objective cards.

6260.name: Addicted to Power
6260.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after a friendly fighter is **dealt** damage by **backlash**, if that fighter is not taken out of action.

6261.name: Against the Wall
6261.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when an enemy fighter in an **edge** hex is taken out of action.

6262.name: Aggressive Strategy
6262.rule: Score this in an end phase if you have scored 5 or more **surge** objective cards.

6263.name: Ahead of the Hunt
6263.rule: Score this in an end phase if there is at least one surviving friendly **Quarry**.

6264.name: Annihilation
6264.rule: Score this in an end phase if *all enemy fighters* are out of action.

6265.name: Arcane Arrest
6265.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's spell that **deals** damage to an enemy **Hunter** or **Quarry**.

6266.name: Arcane Expertise
6266.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an enemy fighter is **dealt** precisely enough damage to take them out of action by a friendly fighter's spell.

6267.name: Awesome Resilience
6267.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* Each surviving friendly fighter has no wound tokens \n *Or:* You healed friendly fighters of 3 or more wound tokens in the previous phase.

6268.name: Beyond Mortal
6268.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* A friendly fighter has 4 or more wound tokens \n *Or:* A surviving friendly fighter has a Move and/or Wounds characteristic or 8 or more.

6269.name: Blaze a Trail
6269.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if each surviving friendly fighter is in enemy territory and adjacent to no enemy fighters.

6270.name: Brought to Bay
6270.rule: **Surge, Dual:** Score this immediately \n *If:* A friendly **Hunter** makes an **Attack action** that takes an enemy fighter out of action \n *And:* That enemy fighter was in enemy territory.

6271.name: Change of Fortunes
6271.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when a feature token is flipped in a hex that contains a friendly fighter.

6272.name: Committed
6272.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* Each surviving friendly fighter is adjacent to one or more enemy fighters \n *Or:* One or more friendly fighters are each adjacent to three or more enemy fighters.

6273.name: Conquest
6273.rule: Score this in the third end phase if all surviving friendly fighters are *in your opponent's territory*.

6274.name: Coveted Spoils
6274.rule: Score this in an end phase if all objectives are held.

6275.name: Denial
6275.rule: Score this in the third end phase if there are no enemy fighters in your territory.

6276.name: Duck and Parry
6276.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an **Attack action** that targets a friendly fighter with one or more Guard tokens fails.

6277.name: Dug In
6277.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* Your warband holds three or more objectives \n **And:** Your warband held three or more objectives at the start of the round.

6278.name: Fateful Strike
6278.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's successful **Attack action** that targets a fighter with a Defence characteristic of 2 or more.

6279.name: Feed the Beastgrave
6279.rule: Score this in an end phase if there are no objective tokens on the battlefield.

6280.name: Frantic Exchange
6280.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after a fifth or subsequent power card is played in the same power step.

6281.name: Gathered Momentum
6281.rule: **Surge, Hybrid:** Score this immediately \n *If:* You score your second or subsequent **surge** objective card in a phase \n *Or:* A friendly fighter makes a **Charge action** and ends that action five or more hexes from the hex in which they began the action.

6282.name: Hidden Purpose
6282.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if your warband holds two or more objectives.

6283.name: Hold Objective 1
6283.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objective *1*.

6284.name: Hold Objective 2
6284.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objective *2*.

6285.name: Hold Objective 3
6285.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objective *3*.

6286.name: Hold Objective 4
6286.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objective *4*.

6287.name: Hold Objective 5
6287.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objective *5*.

6288.name: Master of Battle
6288.rule: Score this in an end phase if one surviving friendly fighter took three or more actions in the previous phase.

6289.name: Master of Hazards
6289.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after you flip a second or subsequent feature token in this phase.

6290.name: Master of Many Paths
6290.rule: Score this in an end phase if there is a surviving friendly fighter who is a **leader**, a **wizard** and a **Hunter**.

6291.name: Master Poisoner
6291.rule: Score this in an end phase if you have played two or more **Poison** gambits.

6292.name: Meticulous Strategy
6292.rule: Score this in an end phase if you have scored 3 or more **dual** objective cards.

6293.name: No One is Safe
6293.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after a second or subsequent enemy fighter is taken out of action by damage **dealt** by a gambit in this phase.

6294.name: Over My Dead Body
6294.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an enemy fighter's **Attack action** that targets a friendly fighter, if the friendly fighter was holding an objective at the start of that action and is still holding that objective.

6295.name: Path to Victory
6295.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* One or more enemy fighters were taken out of action in the previous phase \n *And:* Your warband holds two or more objectives.

6296.name: Perfect Match
6296.rule: Score this in an end phase if you have scored 10 or more objectives.

6297.name: Rising Power
6297.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after a friendly fighter **casts** a spell and you rolled three or more dice in the casting roll.

6298.name: Run Ragged
6298.rule: Score this in an end phase if each surviving fighter has one or more Move and/or Charge tokens.

6299.name: Scrum
6299.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if four or more fighters on the battlefield are in a single group in which each fighter is adjacent to at least one other fighter in that group.

6300.name: Set the Tempo
6300.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* You have scored 2 or more **dual** objective cards and 2 or more **hybrid** objective cards \n *And:* You have scored 6 or more objective cards.

6301.name: Show of Force
6301.rule: **Surge, Hybrid:** Score this immediately after an activation \n *If:* Three or more friendly fighters are in enemy territory \n *Or:* One or more friendly fighters each have three or more upgrades.

6302.name: Skilled Duellist
6302.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's successful **Attack action** made as a reaction to that fighter's **Attack action** with **Combo**.

6303.name: Sorcerous Volley
6303.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after the same friendly fighter's second or subsequent **spell Attack action** in a single phase that targets the same enemy fighter.

6304.name: Steady Assault
6304.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after the same friendly fighter's third or subsequent **Attack action** in a single phase.

6305.name: Supremacy
6305.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds three or more objectives.

6306.name: Swift Capture
6306.rule: **Surge, Dual:** Score this immediately after an activation \n *If:* Your warband holds one or more objectives in friendly territory \n *And:* Your warband holds one or more objectives in enemy territory.

6307.name: Team Effort
6307.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* There are two or more surviving friendly fighters \n *And:* Each surviving friendly fighter made one or more actions in the previous phase.

6308.name: Temporary Victory
6308.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if your warband holds three or more objectives.

6309.name: Test of Courage
6309.rule: Score this in an end phase if two or more friendly fighters are standing in **lethal** hexes.

6310.name: The Avatar Risen
6310.rule: Score this in an end phase if a surviving friendly fighter has the Avatar of the Ur-grub upgrade.

6311.name: The Beast is Slain
6311.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after a friendly **Hunter's** **Attack action** that takes an enemy **leader** or enemy **Quarry** out of action.

6312.name: The Great Hunt
6312.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* One or more friendly **Hunters** each have three or more upgrades \n *Or:* Three or more friendly **Hunters** each have one or more upgrades.

6313.name: The Hunter Hunted
6313.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after a friendly **Quarry's Attack action** takes an enemy **Hunter** out of action.

6314.name: To the End
6314.rule: Score this in an end phase if there are no cards left in your power deck.

6315.name: Trading Blows
6315.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's **Attack action** made as a reaction during or immediately after an enemy fighter's **Attack action**.

6316.name: Triumphant Hunt
6316.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase \n *If:* Three or more enemy fighters are out of action \n *And:* At least one enemy **Quarry** is out of action.

6317.name: Uncontested
