9198.rule: Score this in the third end phase if you have more tithe counters than the number of friendly fighters out of action.

9199.name: Pitiless Harvest
9199.rule: Score this in an end phase if two or more enemy fighters were taken out of action in the preceding action phase.

9200.name: Pride of the Emissarian Caste
9200.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if your **leader** holds an objective in enemy territory.

9201.name: Pride of the Thorac Caste
9201.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if three or more **Morteks** are in enemy territory.

9202.name: Ranks Unbroken By Dissent
9202.rule: Score this in an end phase if three or more friendly **Morteks** are in one group in which each fighter is adjacent to one or more other fighters in that group.

9203.name: Tithemasters
9203.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately  after you gain a second or subsequent tithe counter in the same phase.

9204.name: Walking Mass Grave
9204.rule: Score this in an end phase if each surviving friendly fighter has one or more Move and/or Charge tokens.

9205.name: Ceaseless Advance
9205.rule: When you play this, you can discard any number of your tithe counters. **Push** one friendly **Mortek** for each tithe counter you discarded, and one additional friendly **Mortek**, up to 2 hexes towards the nearest enemy fighter.

9206.name: Deathless Warriors
9206.rule: At the start of the deal damage step for each enemy fighter's **Attack action** that targets a friendly **Mortek**, roll one defence dice. On a roll of :dfCrit:, that **Attack action deals** no damage, the combat sequence ends and you **discard** this card. This effect **persists** until the end of the round.

9207.name: Dire Ultimatum
9207.rule: -1 Dice from enemy fighters' **Attack actions**, to a minimum of 1, unless the **Attack action** targets a friendly Kainan. This effect **persists** until an enemy fighter makes an **Attack action** that targets a friendly Kainan, until a friendly Kainan is out of action, or until the end of the round.

9208.name: Exceptional Efficiency
9208.rule: When you play this card, pick one opponent. That opponent picks one: you gain two tithe counters, or in the next activation, you can **re-roll** any number of dice in friendly **Morteks'** attack rolls.

9209.name: Lethal Accuracy
9209.rule: When you play this, you can discard any number of your tithe counters. In the next activation, +1 Dice to the first **Attack action** made by a friendly **Mortek**, and +X Dice in addition where X is the number of tithe counters you discarded.

9210.name: Methodical Assault
9210.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly **Mortek's** failed **Attack action**. Pick one opponent. That opponent picks one: you gain two tithe counters, or that **Mortek** makes an **Attack action**.

9211.name: Mortal Contract
9211.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel:):** If **cast**, **choose** one enemy fighter within 3 hexes of the caster. That fighter's player picks one: you gain one tithe counter, or each time a friendly fighter is taken out of action, **deal** 1 damage to the chosen fighter. This effect **persists** until the chosen fighter is taken out of action.

9212.name: Never Falter
9212.rule: +1 Move to friendly **Morteks**. This effect **persists** until the end of the round.

9213.name: Never Sleep
9213.rule: When you play this, discard two tithe counters. When you do so, friendly **Morteks** adjacent to one or more friendly **Morteks** have +1 Defence. This effect **persists** until the end of the round.

9214.name: Never Yield
9214.rule: Each time a friendly **Mortek** is **dealt** damage, you can discard one tithe counter. If you do, reduce that damage by 1, to a minimum of 1. This effect **persists** until the end of the round.

9215.name: Artificer's Blade
9215.rule: This fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions** have **Cleave**.

9216.name: Aura of Shyish
9216.rule: -1 Dice from adjacent enemy fighters' **Attack actions**, to a minimum of 1.

9217.name: Disciplined Charge
9217.rule: You can **re-roll** any number of dice in this fighter's attack rolls during this fighter's **Charge action**.

9218.name: Empowered Nadirite
9218.rule: +1 Damage to this fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 **Nadirite Attack actions**. \n +1 Dice to this fighter's **Nadirite Attack actions**.

9219.name: Hatred of the Living
9219.rule: You can **re-roll** one attack dice in this fighter's attack rolls for Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions**. \n **Reaction:** During an **Attack action** that targets this fighter, before the deal damage step, reduce the Damage characteristic of that **Attack action** by 1, to a minimum of 1, then **discard** this card.

9220.name: Horrifying Soultraps
9220.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's activation in which this fighter's Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action** takes an enemy fighter out of action, **choose** one enemy fighter and **push** the chosen fighter 1 hex away from this fighter.

9221.name: Tithestone
9221.rule: **Reaction:** During a friendly **Mortek's** Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action**, before the attack roll, discard one tithe counter. If you do, +1 Dice to that **Attack action** until it has been resolved.

9222.name: Unnerving Synchrony
9222.rule: **Reaction:** After an adjacent friendly **Mortek's Attack action**, other than a **Scything Attack action**, this fighter makes an **Attack action**.

9224.name: Witchlight Glimmer
9224.rule: This fighter is Inspired and cannot be un-Inspired. \n You can **re-roll** one dice in this fighter's attack rolls.

9225.name: Cold-eyed Killers
9225.rule: Score this in an end phase if two or more enemy fighters were taken out of action in the preceding action phase.

9226.name: Dead or Doomed
9226.rule: Score this in the third end phase if each enemy fighter is either out of action or adjacent to one or more friendly fighters.

9227.name: Guardians of the Deep
9227.rule: Score this in an end phase if no enemy fighters are in your territory.

9228.name: Merciless Raiders
9228.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's **Attack action** made as part of a **Charge action** that takes an enemy fighter in enemy territory out of action.

9229.name: Smothered Memories
9229.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an opponent **discards** a card from their hand in the action phase without playing it or scoring it.

9230.name: Soul Raiders
9230.rule: Score this in an end phase if two or more enemy fighters are out of action.

9231.name: Speed of the Flood Tide
9231.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately  after an activation if three or more friendly fighters are in enemy territory.

9232.name: Surging Tide
9232.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after one friendly fighter's second or subsequent **Move action** in the same phase.

9233.name: Taker of Souls
9233.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after your **leader's** Range 1 **Attack action** that takes an enemy fighter out of action.

9234.name: Tides of Death
9234.rule: Score this in an end phase if three or more friendly fighters each have one or more Charge tokens.

9235.name: Unseen Menace
9235.rule: Score this in an end phase if two or more friendly **Idoneth** are within 2 hexes of the same enemy fighter.

9236.name: Utter Isolation
9236.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase if: \n There are one or more surviving friendly fighters \n *And:* No fighter is adjacent to any other fighter.

9237.name: Brain Barnacles
9237.rule: **Choose** one enemy fighter within 3 hexes of one or more friendly **Idoneth**. The chosen fighter has -1 Move, to a minimum of 0. In addition, if the chosen fighter is within 1 hex of one or more friendly **Idoneth** when this card is played, that fighter's **Attack actions** have the :atFury: characteristic. This effect **persists** until the end of the round or until that fighter is out of action.

9238.name: Chill Mist
9238.rule: In the next activation, fighters have -1 Move, to a minimum of 0, and cannot make Range 3+ **Attack actions**.

9239.name: Cloud of Midnight
9239.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter. Until the end of the next activation, that fighter cannot be the target of **Attack actions**, cannot be chosen or damaged by gambits, and cannot be pushed.

9240.name: Crushing Pressure
9240.rule: **Choose** one enemy fighter. That fighter's player picks one: in the next activation, the chosen fighter has -2 Move, to a minimum of 0, and -2 Dice from their **Attack actions**, to a minimum of 1, or that player **discards** one power card.

9241.name: Forgotten Nightmares
9241.rule: When an enemy fighter makes an **Attack action**, pick one eligible fighter as the target of that **Attack action** unless, during the declare Attack action step, that enemy fighter's player **discards** one power card. This effect **persists** until the end of the round.

9242.name: Fury of the Storm
9242.rule: Play this only in the third round. Each surviving friendly fighter is Inspired, unless another player **discards** two power cards, in which case nothing happens.

9243.name: Phantasmal Forms
9243.rule: In the next activation, friendly fighters have a Defence characteristic of :dfDodge: 3.

9244.name: Shifting Currents
9244.rule: Pick one: **remove** all friendly shoal tokens from the battlefield and then **place** one shoal token in an **empty** hex, or pick one objective token in an **empty** hex and move that objective token into an adjacent hex. You cannot move it into a **lethal** hex or a hex that contains a feature token.

9245.name: Spinefin Toxin
9245.rule: **Poison** \n **Choose** one enemy fighter adjacent to a friendly Spinefin. **Deal** 1 damage to that fighter. In addition, the chosen fighter cannot hold objectives, cannot be on Guard, and cannot make Range 3+ **Attack actions**. This effect **persists** until the end of the round or until that fighter is out of action.

9246.name: Terrornight Venom
9246.rule: **Poison** \n **Choose** one enemy fighter adjacent to one or more friendly fighters. You can **re-roll** one attack dice in attack rolls for **Attack actions** made by friendly fighters that target the chosen fighter. This effect **persists** until the end of the round or until that fighter is out of action.

9247.name: Armour of the Cythai
9247.rule: -1 Dice from adjacent fighters' **Attack actions** that target this fighter, to a minimum of 1.

9248.name: Born From Agony
9248.rule: +1 Wounds \n **Lethal** hexes cannot **deal** damage to this fighter.

9249.name: Ethersea Predator
9249.rule: This fighter's Crushing Claw **Attack action** has **Ensnare**. \n **Reaction:** During an enemy fighter's **Move action**, after that fighter enters a hex adjacent to this fighter for the first time in that action, roll one attack dice. On a roll of :atSmash: that fighter's **Move action** ends.

9250.name: Hunter of Souls
9250.rule: +1 Damage to this fighter's **Attack actions** that target a fighter with one or more wound counters.

9251.name: Lurelight
9251.rule: When an enemy fighter is taken out of action while adjacent to this fighter, that fighter's player pick one: you gain 1 glory point, or that player **discards** one power card.

9252.name: Martial Excellence
9252.rule: If this fighter has one or more Charge tokens, this fighter is on Guard.

9253.name: Sanguine Pearl
9253.rule: Reduce the damage **dealt** to this fighter by adjacent enemy fighters' **Attack actions** by 1, to a minimum of 1.

9254.name: Soulbond
9254.rule: When this fighter makes an **Attack action**, if there is a friendly Elathain within 3 hexes, that fighter is considered to be **supporting** this fighter.

9255.name: Unstoppable Fury
9255.rule: You can **re-roll** one attack dice in this fighter's attack rolls for **Attack actions** made as part of a **Charge action**.

9256.name: Voltane Eel
9256.rule: [:Hex: 3 - :atFury: 3 - :boom: 1] \n On a **critical hit**, **give** the target one Move token.

9257.name: Absolute Dominance
9257.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase if: \n There are two or more surviving friendly fighters \n *And:* No more than one surviving enemy fighter.

9258.name: Advancing Swarm
9258.rule: Score this in an end phase if three or more friendly fighters have one or more Charge tokens.

9259.name: Aggressive Display
9259.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in an end phase if: \n Two or more enemy fighters are out of action \n *Or:* One or more surviving friendly fighters each have two or more **Attack action** upgrades.

9260.name: Arcane Cleansing
9260.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's spell **removes** two or more counters from any fighters.

9261.name: Avatar of Famine
9261.rule: Score this in an end phase if one or more friendly fighters each have five or more Hunger counters.

9262.name: Awesome Predator
9262.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in an end phase if: \n You have the Primacy token \n *Or:* One or more surviving friendly fighters have one or more **Attack actions** with a Damage characteristic of 4+.

9263.name: Bold Deeds
9263.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase if: \n There are two or more enemy fighters out of action \n *And:* Each surviving friendly fighter is in enemy territory.

9264.name: Bristling with Weapons
9264.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in an end phase if: \n One or more friendly **Hunters** each have three or more upgrades \n *Or:* One or more friendly **Hunters** each have two or more **Attack action** upgrades.

9265.name: Brutal Attrition
9265.rule: Score this in an end phase if the number of enemy fighters out of action is equal to or greater than the number of surviving friendly fighters.

9266.name: Channeled Hunger
9266.rule: Score this in an end phase if one or more friendly **wizards** with one or more Hunger counters is holding an objective.

9267.name: Clean Kills
9267.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase if: \n Enemy fighters with a combined Wounds characteristic of 6 or more are out of action \n *And:* No enemy fighter has one or more wound counters.

9268.name: Cold-blooded Killers
9268.rule: Score this in an end phase if two or more enemy fighters are out of action.

9269.name: Demolish the Opposition
9269.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in the third end phase if: \n There are no enemy fighters in enemy territory \n *Or:* There is no more than one surviving enemy fighter.

9270.name: Disastrous Hunt
9270.rule: Score this in an end phase if two or more enemy **Hunters** are out of action.

9271.name: Dominant Display
9271.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase if: \n Each surviving friendly fighter is in enemy territory \n *And:* You have the Primacy token.

9272.name: Dominant Position
9272.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds more objectives than any other warband.

9273.name: Everything to Prove
9273.rule: **Surge, Hybrid:** Score this immediately after an activation if: \n An opponent has the Primacy token \n *Or:* There is one or more surviving friendly **Quarry** and you have the Primacy token.

9274.name: Fatal Underestimation
9274.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's **Attack action** that takes the target out of action, if the target had one or more **supporting** fighters.

9275.name: Feast and Famine
9275.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase if: \n Two or more enemy fighters are out action \n *And:* Two or more friendly fighters each have three or more Hunger counters.

9276.name: Fleeting Primacy
9276.rule: **Surge, Hybrid:** Score this immediately after an activation if: \n Your warband holds three or more objectives \n *or:* Your warband holds two or more objectives in enemy territory and you have the Primacy token.

9277.name: Forbidding Strike
9277.rule: **Surge, Dual:** Score this immediately after an activation in which a friendly fighter's **Attack action** took an enemy fighter out of action if: \n That was your first activation in this round \n *And:* That enemy fighter was holding an objective.

9278.name: Formidable Prey
9278.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in an end phase if: \n One or more surviving friendly fighters each have two or more upgrades that give them the **Quarry** keyword \n *Or:* One or more surviving friendly fighters each have a Wounds characteristic of 6+ and are a **Quarry**.

9279.name: Futile Hunt
9279.rule: **Surge, Hybrid:** Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's **Attack action** in which they take an enemy fighter out of action if: \n That friendly fighter is a **Quarry** \n *Or:* The target had one or more Hunger counters.

9280.name: Growing Hunger
9280.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in an end phase if: \n Each surviving friendly fighter has one or more Hunger counters \n *Or:* Each surviving enemy fighter has one or more Hunger counters.

9281.name: Hunger for Power
9281.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in an end phase if: \n One or more friendly **wizards** each have two or more Hunger counters \n *Or:* One or more surviving friendly **wizards** each have two or more upgrades.

9282.name: Hunger for Supremacy
9282.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase if: \n Two or more friendly fighters hold objectives \n *And:* Each of those fighters has one or more Hunger counters.

9283.name: Hungry for Victory
9283.rule: Score this in an end phase if one or more friendly fighters each have two or more Hunger counters.

9284.name: Immortal Hunger
9284.rule: **Dual:** Score this in the third end phase if: \n The number of surviving friendly fighters is greater or equal to the number of friendly fighters out of action \n *And:* Each surviving friendly fighter has four or more Hunger counters.

9285.name: Impending Doom
9285.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if one or more enemy fighters are adjacent to two or more friendly fighters.

9286.name: Inedible Prize
9286.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in an end phase if \n One or more enemy fighters with one or more Hunger counters hold an objective \n *Or:* One or more enemy fighters who each have two or more upgrades are out of action.

9287.name: Intimidating Display
9287.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in an end phase if: \n A surviving friendly fighter has a higher Wounds characteristic than any other surviving fighter \n *Or:* Three or more friendly fighters are in enemy territory.

9288.name: Killing Strike
9288.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation in which a friendly fighter's **Attack action** took an enemy fighter out of action, if that was your first activation in this round.

9289.name: Levelling Strike
9289.rule: **Surge, Hybrid:** Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's **Attack action** which: \n Takes an enemy fighter with a higher Wounds characteristic than each surviving fighter out of action \n *Or:* Takes an enemy **leader** out of action.

9290.name: Lie in Wait
9290.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in an end phase if: \n Three or more friendly **Hunters** hold objectives \n *Or:* Two or more friendly fighters hold objectives, and each is a **Quarry.**

9291.name: Magic Morsel
9291.rule: **Surge, Dual:** Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's **Attack action** that took an enemy fighter out of action if: \n The friendly fighter has one or more Hunger counters \n *And:* The enemy fighter is a **wizard** or has two or more upgrades.

9292.name: Magical Mark
9292.rule: Score this in an end phase if a friendly **wizard** is holding an objective.

9293.name: Magical Mauling
9293.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's spell **deals** 3 or more damage.

9294.name: Martial Adept
9294.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in an end phase if: \n One or more friendly fighters each have two or more **Attack action** upgrades \n *Or:* one or more friendly fighters each have three or more upgrades.

9295.name: Martial Mage
9295.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after a friendly **wizard's** Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action** that takes an enemy fighter out of action.

9296.name: Moment of Glory
9296.rule: **Surge, Dual:** Score this immediately after an activation if: \n There are three or more surviving friendly fighters \n *And:* Each surviving friendly fighter is Inspired.

9297.name: Myriad Incantations
9297.rule: Score this in an end phase if there are more **gambit spells** in your discard pile than in each opponent's discard pile.

9298.name: Nearing Hunt's End
9298.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in an end phase if \n Two or more friendly **Hunters** and at least one enemy **Quarry** are in the same territory \n *Or:* One or more enemy fighters each have three or more wound counters.

9299.name: Not so Fast
9299.rule: **Surge, Hybrid:** Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's **Attack action** which: \n Takes an enemy fighter with a higher Move characteristic than each surviving fighter out of action \n *Or:* Takes an enemy **Quarry** out of action.

9300.name: Orchestrated Kill
9300.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's **Attack action** that takes an enemy fighter out of action, if the friendly fighter had one or more **supporting** fighters.

9301.name: Peerless Hunter
9301.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase if: \n One or more surviving friendly **Hunters** have **Ensnare** and/or **Cleave** on one or more of their **Attack actions** \n *And:* You have the Primacy token.

9302.name: Perfect Strike
9302.rule: **Surge, Dual:** Score this immediately after friendly fighter's **Attack action** that took an enemy fighter out of action if: \n The attack roll contained only **successes** and/or **critical successes** \n *And:* The **Attack action dealt** the precise amount of damage necessary to take the target out of action.

9303.name: Pitiable Death
9303.rule: **Surge, Hybrid:** Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's *Attack action* that takes an enemy fighter out of action if: \n The enemy fighter had one or more Hunger counters \n *Or:* The enemy fighter was in a **starting** hex.

9304.name: Predatory Spell
9304.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after your warband's **spell Attack action deals** damage that takes an enemy fighter out of action.

9305.name: Primal Assertion
9305.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after you discard the Primacy token if your warband holds more objectives than any other warband.

9306.name: Primal Display
9306.rule: **Surge, Dual:** Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's **Attack action** if: \n That **Attack action** took the target out of action \n *And:* You have Primacy token.

9307.name: Primal Escalation
9307.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase if: \n One or more surviving friendly fighters each have three or more upgrades \n *And:* You have the Primacy token.

9308.name: Primal Supremacy
9308.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase if: \n Your warband holds three or more objectives \n *And:* You have the Primacy token.

9309.name: Prize Beyond Measure
9309.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if one or more surviving friendly fighters hold an objective and each have three or more upgrades.

9310.name: Prized Kill
9310.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after a friendly **Hunter's Attack action** that takes an enemy **leader** out of action.

9311.name: Promise of Destruction
9311.rule: Score this in an end phase if there are one or more persisting gambits.

9312.name: Proud Commander
9312.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in the third end phase if: \n You have scored seven or more objective cards \n *Or:* Your **leader** is in enemy territory.

9313.name: Punctured Pride
9313.rule: **Surge, Hybrid:** Score this immediately after: \n An enemy fighter from the warband whose player has the Primacy token is taken out of action \n *Or:* Damage **dealt** by a **lethal** hex or warband takes an enemy **leader** out of action.

9314.name: Sated Hunger
9314.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately when you **remove** three or more Hunger counters from a surviving fighter.

9315.name: Savage Exemplar
9315.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after your **leader's Attack action** that takes an enemy fighter out of action.

9316.name: Scant Resources
9316.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in an end phase if: \n All objectives are held \n *Or:* Each player has no unspent glory points.

9317.name: Season of Famine
9317.rule: Score this in an end phase if surviving fighters have ten or more Hunger counters.

9318.name: Show No Fear
9318.rule: Score this in an end phase if each surviving friendly fighter is a **Quarry.**

9319.name: Silent Sentinel
9319.rule: Score this in an end phase if one or more friendly fighters each have two or more **Silent Relics**.

9320.name: Silver Lining
9320.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if you have four or more upgrade cards in your hand. You must reveal the power cards in your hand to your opponent(s) when you do so.

9321.name: Skin and Bones
9321.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in an end phase if: \n One or more enemy fighters has a number of Hunger counters equal to or greater than their Wounds characteristic \n *Or:* There are no surviving enemy fighters with a Wounds characteristic of 3 or more.

9322.name: Starvation
9322.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation if there are one or more enemy fighters who each have three or more Hunger counters.

9323.name: Stinging Strike
9323.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation in which a friendly fighter's Range 3+ **Attack action** was successful, if that was your first activation in this round.

9324.name: Successful Hunt
9324.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after a friendly **Hunter's Attack action** that takes an enemy **Quarry** out of action.

9325.name: Supreme Confidence
9325.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after you discard the Primacy token if your warband holds one or more objectives in enemy territory.

9326.name: Surge of Aggression
9326.rule: **Surge, Hybrid:** Score this immediately after: \n You gain the Primacy token \n *Or:* A friendly fighter's successful **Attack action** with a Damage characteristic of 4+.

9327.name: Swelling Pride
9327.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately if you would gain the Primacy token, but you already have the Primacy token.

9328.name: Tale of Victory
9328.rule: Score this in the third end phase if each surviving fighter is a friendly **Hunter**.

9329.name: The Greater Hunt
9329.rule: Score this in an end phase if there are more surviving friendly **Hunters** than surviving enemy **Hunters**.

9330.name: The Hunt Advances
9330.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase if: \n There are three or more friendly fighters in enemy territory \n *And:* Each friendly fighter in enemy territory is a **Hunter**.

9331.name: Treasure Hunter
9331.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds two or more objectives in enemy territory.

9332.name: Turned Tables
9332.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after a friendly **Quarry's** **Attack action** that takes an enemy fighter out of action.

9333.name: Unafraid
9333.rule: Score this in an end phase if each surviving friendly fighter is within 2 hexes of one or more enemy fighters.

9334.name: Unassailable
9334.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in an end phase if: \n Your **leader** is the only surviving **leader** \n *Or:* You have the Primacy token.

9335.name: Unassailable Primacy
9335.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase if: \n You had the Primacy token in the previous end phase \n *And:* You have the Primacy token.

9336.name: Underdog
9336.rule: **Hybrid:** Score this in an end phase if: \n An opponent has the Primacy token \n *Or:* Each opponent has scored 3 or more objective cards more than you.

9337.name: Untouchable Swarm
9337.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase if: \n Four or more surviving friendly fighters have one or more Charge tokens \n *And:* No friendly fighters were taken out of action in this round.

9338.name: Wasteland
9338.rule: Score this an end phase if there are no objectives in one or more players' territories.

9339.name: Winged Death
9339.rule: **Surge, Hybrid:** Score this immediately after: \n A friendly fighter's Range 3+ **Attack action** takes an enemy fighter out of action \n *Or:* A friendly fighter ends a **Charge action** 6 or more hexes away from the hex in which they started.

9340.name: Wrested Dominance
9340.rule: **Surge, Hybrid:** Score this immediately after: \n You gain the Primacy token from an opponent \n *Or:* An activation, if your warband holds an objective that another warband held at the start of the round.

9341.name: Abasoth's Smothering
9341.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If **cast**, in the next activation, each Dice characteristic is 1 and each Defence characteristic is 1.

9342.name: Acidic Strike
9342.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's successful **Attack action.** Pick one of the target's upgrades and **discard** that card.

9343.name: Beast Trail
9343.rule: **Choose** one friendly **Hunter** or **Quarry** with no Move or Charge tokens that is in an **edge** hex. **Place** that fighter in another **edge** hex. Then **give** that fighter one Move token.

9344.name: Blood-soaked Ground
9344.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an **Attack action** or gambit that takes a fighter out of action, if that fighter was in the same hex as a feature token. Flip that token. If that fighter was an enemy fighter, gain 1 spent glory point.

9345.name: Bountiful Bait
9345.rule: Each fighter with one or more Hunger counters is a **Quarry** and is on Guard. This effect **persists** until the end of the round.

9346.name: Call to Hunt
9346.rule: Discard the Primacy token. If you do, friendly fighters are **Hunters** and each enemy fighter is a **Quarry**. This effect **persists** until the end of the round.

9347.name: Carnivores All
9347.rule: Starting with you, each player can **choose** one or more fighters from their warband. **Give** each chosen fighter one Hunger counter. \n Each fighter with two or more Hunger conuters is a **Hunter**. This effect **persists** until the end of the round.

9348.name: Claim to Domination
9348.rule: At the end of the next activation, the player with the highest number of surviving fighters in enemy territory gains the Primacy token.

9349.name: Claim to Supremacy
9349.rule: At the end of the next activation, the player whose warband holds the highest number of objectives gains the Primacy token.

9350.name: Colossal Blow
9350.rule: The first Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has **Knockback** 2. If an enemy fighter **driven back** by that **Attack action** cannot be **driven back** the full distance, **deal** 1 damage to that enemy fighter.

9351.name: Compelling Hunger
9351.rule: **Choose** one fighter with one or more Hunger counters. **Push** that fighter 1 hex and **give** that fighter one Hunger counter.

9352.name: Cunning Paths
9352.rule: Pick one: +1 Move to friendly fighters in the next activation, or in the next activation, each time a **Quarry** moves into a hex that contains a feature token, flip that feature token.

9353.name: Dauntless Aspect
9353.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel:):** If **cast**, **choose** one friendly fighter within 3 hexes of the caster. **Give** the chosen fighter one Guard token.

9354.name: Delicious Morsel
9354.rule: **Choose** one fighter. **Heal** (1) that fighter. If that fighter has any Hunger counters, instead **Heal** (2) that fighter and **remove** two of that fighter's Hunger counters, or one Hunger counter if the fighter only has one.

9355.name: Desperate Caution
9355.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter. **Give** that fighter one Guard token. If that fighter is a **Quarry**, **push** that fighter up to 1 hex.

9356.name: Endurance Hunter
9356.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter. **Push** the chosen fighter 1 hex towards the closest enemy fighter, or up to 2 hexes towards the closest enemy fighter if that enemy fighter is a **Quarry**.

9357.name: Energy Drain
9357.rule: **Choose** one fighter in the same hex as an objective. **Give** one Move token to that fighter, and one Hunger counter to each fighter within 2 hexes of that fighter.

9358.name: Eternal Chase
9358.rule: Each fighter's Move characteristic is 4 and cannot be modified further, each fighter is a **Hunter** and each fighter is a **Quarry**. This effect **persists** until the end of the round.

9359.name: Feign Strength
9359.rule: Gain the Primacy Token. If you have the Primacy token at the end of an action phase, discard this Primacy token. This effect **persists** until the end of the round.

9360.name: Feign Weakness
9360.rule: Play this only if you have the Primacy token. Give the Primacy token to an opponent, than gain 1 spent glory point.

9361.name: Ferocious Blow
9361.rule: +1 Damage to the first Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter in the next activation. \n In addition, that **Attack action** has **Cleave** if that friendly fighter has one or more Hunger counters.

9362.name: Ferocious Lunge
9362.rule: +1 Move to the first friendly fighter to make a **Move action** in the next activation \n +2 Move instead if that fighter has one or more Hunger counters.

9363.name: Ferocious Resistance
9363.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter. Roll one magic dice for each of the chosen fighter's wound counters, and one additional magic dice if that fighter has one or more Hunger counters. For each roll of :MagChannel:, **Heal** (1) that fighter.

9364.name: Fury Barbs
9364.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an enemy fighter's **Move action.** That fighter's **Attack actions** have the :atFury: characteristic instead of their printed characteristic. This effect **persists** until the next activation.

9365.name: Great Tremors
9365.rule: Roll 5 attack dice. For each roll of :atCrit:, pick one feature token and flip it. You cannot pick the same token twice.

9366.name: Heeded Instinct
9366.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter. **Push** the chosen fighter 1 hex, or up to 2 hexes if that fighter is a **Quarry**.

9367.name: Hidden Sting
9367.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's successful Range 1 **Attack action,** if there were one or more :atCrit: in the attack roll. **Deal** 1 damage to the target.

9368.name: Hopesink
9368.rule: **Trap** \n **Reaction:** Play this after an enemy fighter's **Move action**. That fighter is a **Quarry** and has -1 Defence (to a minimum of 1). This effect **persists** until that fighter is taken out of action.

9369.name: Horrific Aspect
9369.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If **cast,** in the next activation, enemy fighters cannot end a **Move action** adjacent to the caster.

9370.name: Hunger Pangs
9370.rule: **Choose** one enemy fighter with one or more Move and/or Charge tokens. If the chosen fighter has one or more Hunger counters, **deal** 1 damage to that fighter and **remove** that fighter's Hunger counters. Otherwise, **give** the chosen fighter one Hunger counter.

9371.name: Hungry Advance
9371.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter. **Push** that fighter 1 hex towards the closest enemy fighter. Then **give** the chosen fighter one Hunger counter.

9372.name: Hungry Bolt
9372.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If **cast**, **Scatter** 3 from the caster's hex. **Deal** 1 damage to each enemy fighter in the **chain**. Then **give** the caster and each fighter in the **chain** one Hunger counter.

9373.name: Hunter's Aspect
9373.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel:):** If **cast**, the caster is a **Hunter**, and you can **re-roll** one dice in the caster's attack rolls for **Attack actions** that target a **Quarry**. This spell **persists** until the caster is taken out of action.

9374.name: Hunter's Helper
9374.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly **Hunter's Attack action**, if there are one or more enemy fighters adjacent to that fighter other than the target of that **Attack action**. **Choose** one of those enemy fighters and **deal** 1 damage to the chosen fighter.

9375.name: Hunting Season
9375.rule: Each fighter is a **Hunter** and each fighter is a **Quarry**. This effect **persists** until the end of the round.

9376.name: Hypnotic Aspect
9376.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel:):** If **cast**, **choose** one enemy fighter within 3 hexes of the caster. **Push** the chosen fighter 1 hex.

9377.name: Hypnotic Buzz
9377.rule: **Choose** one enemy fighter within 2 hexes of one or more friendly fighters. **Push** the chosen fighter 1 hex.

9378.name: Invincible Aspect
9378.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel::MagChannel:):** If **cast, choose** one friendly fighter within 2 hexes of the caster. **Heal** (2) the chosen fighter and gain the Primacy token.

9379.name: Irresistible Hunger
9379.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter. **Give** that fighter one Hunger counter, then **push** one enemy fighter within 2 hexes of that fighter 1 hex towards that fighter, or if that friendly fighter has two or more Hunger counters, **push** each enemy fighter within 2 hexes of that fighter up to 1 hex towards that fighter.

9380.name: Keila's Clarion
9380.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel::MagChannel:):** If **cast**, **choose** one or more friendly fighters within 2 hexes of the caster and **push** each chosen fighter 1 hex.

9381.name: Lifeblood Draught
9381.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's **Attack action** that took an adjacent enemy fighter out of action. **Heal** (1) that fighter or **Heal** (2) that fighter if that fighter's target was a **leader** and/or a **wizard**.

9382.name: Living Land
9382.rule: Pick one: flip an objective token that has the same number as the round number, or move one objective token in your territory 1 hex.

9383.name: Lost in Reflection
9383.rule: **Choose** one enemy fighter from a warband whose player has the Primacy token, or pick an opponent: that opponent **chooses** one surviving fighter from their warband. The chosen fighter cannot be activated in the next activation.

9384.name: Macabre Feast
9384.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's **Attack action** that takes an adjacent enemy fighter out of action. **Remove** any number of Hunger counters from the friendly fighter, then **Heal** (X) that fighter, where X is the number of Hunger counters **removed**.

9385.name: Maddening Drone
9385.rule: **Choose** one enemy fighter. That fighter's player picks one: **give** that fighter one Move token, or that fighter is un-Inspired and cannot be Inspired. If they pick the latter, this effect **persists** until the end of the round, or until that fighter is taken out of action. When this effect ends, the chosen fighter is Inspired.

9386.name: Magnificent Aspect
9386.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel::MagChannel:):** If **cast, choose** one friendly fighter within 2 hexes of the caster. The chosen fighter is Inspired.

9387.name: Mazzig's Machinations
9387.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If **cast**, pick one: flip each feature token within 2 hexes of the caster, or one feature token in no one's territory or one opponent's territory.

9388.name: Membranous Wings
9388.rule: +2 Move to the next friendly fighter to make a **Charge action**. This effect **persists** until after the next friendly fighter's **Charge action**.

9389.name: Momentary Match
9389.rule: **Choose** one enemy fighter and one friendly fighter. Until the end of the next activation, set the chosen friendly fighter's Move, Defence or Wounds characteristic to that of the chosen enemy fighter.

9390.name: More Muscle
9390.rule: The player who has the most surviving friendly fighters adjacent to enemy fighters gains the Primacy token.

9391.name: Narrowing Passage
9391.rule: **Choose** one enemy **Quarry** with one or more upgrades, or pick one opponent: that opponent **chooses** one fighter in their warband with one or more upgrades. **Discard** one of that fighter's upgrades at random.

9392.name: Outrun Death
9392.rule: **Choose** one fighter. That fighter is a **Quarry**. If that fighter is a **Quarry**, that fighter has +2 Move. This effect **persists** until the end of the round or until that fighter is taken out of action.

9393.name: Predatory Form
9393.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagFocus:):** If **cast**, this fighter is a **Hunter** and this fighter's **Attack actions** have **Ensnare**. This spell **persists** until the end of the round or until this fighter is taken out of action.

9394.name: Predatory Impulse
9394.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter. In the next activation that fighter has +1 Move and that fighter's Range 1 **Attack actions** have **Ensnare.**

9395.name: Pride Before a Fall
9395.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during a friendly fighter's **Attack action**, after the drive back step, if the target's player has the Primacy token. **Deal** 1 damage to the target.

9396.name: Primal Power
9396.rule: You can **re-roll** one dice in your warband's next casting roll. In addition, if you have the Primacy token, roll one extra dice in that roll. This effect **persists** until after your warband's next attempt to **cast** a spell.

9397.name: Puffed Up
9397.rule: Friendly fighters have +1 Wounds if you have the Primacy token. If a friendly fighter's **Attack action** fails, discard the Primacy token. This effect **persists** until the end of the phase.

9398.name: Punching Up
9398.rule: **Choose** one fighter with the lowest Wounds characteristic of any surviving fighters. In the next activation, that fighter is a **Hunter** and has +1 Dice and +1 Damage to their Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions**.

9399.name: Quintok's Quarrel
9399.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel:):** If **cast**, **choose** one enemy fighter within 3 hexes of the caster. **Roll off** with that fighter's player. If your opponent wins, nothing happens. If you win, that fighter has -1 Wounds, is un-Inspired and cannot be Inspired. this effect **persists** until the end of the round. When this effect ends, the chosen fighter is Inspired.

9400.name: Roar of Defiance
9400.rule: Discard the Primacy token. If you do, **give** one friendly fighter one Guard token. In addition, friendly fighters cannot be a **Quarry**. This effect **persists** until the end of the round.

9401.name: Sanity Siphon
9401.rule: **Trap** \n **Reaction:** Play this after an enemy fighter's **Move action** made as part of a **Charge action**. Roll one magic dice: on a roll of :MagChannel:, **choose** one friendly fighter that could be the target of one of that fighter's **Attack actions**. The enemy fighter must target the chosen fighter with the **Attack action** made as a part of their **Charge action**.

9402.name: Savage Contest
9402.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly **Hunter** or **Quarry's** successful Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action**, if their target is a **Hunter** or a **Quarry. Deal** 1 damage to the target.

9403.name: Shocking Ferocity
9403.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during an **Attack action** that targets an adjacent friendly fighter, after the deal damage step. **Deal** 1 damage to the attacker.

9404.name: Silence Descends
9404.rule: **Give** one Move token to each fighter in no one's territory.

9405.name: Slickrock
9405.rule: **Trap** \n **Reaction:** Play this after an enemy fighter's **Move action** that ends in the same hex as an objective token. **Scatter** 1 from that hex and **push** that enemy fighter to the end of the **chain**. If that enemy fighter cannot be pushed into a hex, that fighter is not pushed.

9406.name: Souljaws
9406.rule: **Trap** \n **Reaction:** Play this after an enemy fighter's **Move action**. Roll one magic dice. On a roll of :MagChannel:, that fighter is un-Inspired and cannot be Inspired. This effect **persists** until the end of the round or until that fighter is taken out of action. When this effect ends, the chosen fighter is Inspired.

9407.name: Spiritcomb
9407.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter. **Heal** (1) that fighter, or **Heal** (2) that fighter if that fighter has three or more upgrades.

9408.name: Starvation Snare
9408.rule: **Trap** \n **Reaction:** Play this after an enemy fighter's **Move action**. Pick one: **give** that enemy fighter three Hunger counters, or **remove** up to three of that fighter's Hunger counters.

9409.name: Storm of Foreboding
9409.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel::MagChannel:):** If **cast**, +1 Dice to friendly fighters' **Attack actions**. This spell **persists** until the end of the round.

9410.name: Strength of the Swarm
9410.rule: +1 Dice to the next **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter if the attacker has one or more **supporting** fighters. \n In addition, +1 Damage to the next **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter if the attacker has two or more **supporting** fighters. \n This effect **persists** until after the next **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter.

9411.name: Suffocating Heat
9411.rule:
Each time a fighter makes a **Move action, give** that fighter one Hunger counter after that action. 
 -1 Move from each fighter with one or more Hunger counters, to a minimum of 0. 
 -1 Wounds from each fighter with three or more Hunger counters, to a minimum of 1. 
 This effect **persists** until the end of the round.

9412.name: Swarming Advance
9412.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter in enemy territory. **Push** up to two other friendly fighters 1 hex so that they are closer to the chosen fighter.

9413.name: Swarming Strike
9413.rule: The first friendly fighter to make an **Attack action** in the next activation is considered to have one additional **supporting** fighter.

9414.name: Symbiote's Call
9414.rule: Pick one feature token within 1 hex of one or more friendly fighters, then pick one: flip that token, or **push** one friendly fighter 1 hex so that they are in the same hex as that token.

9415.name: Taste for Power
9415.rule: **Give** one Hunger counter to each fighter in the warband whose player has the Primacy token.

9416.name: The Trap is Sprung
9416.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after you play a **Trap** gambit. Pick one: **choose** one friendly fighter adjacent to one or more enemy fighters and **give** the chosen fighter one Guard token, or **choose** one friendly fighter that is not within 2 hexes of an enemy fighter and **push** the chosen fighter up to 2 hexes.

9417.name: Thrill of the Hunt
9417.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's **Attack action** that takes an enemy fighter out of action. You gain the Primacy token. Then pick one. **Heal** (1) that fighter, or **push** that fighter 1 hex.

9418.name: Too Hungry to Care
9418.rule: The first fighter to make an **Attack action** in the next activation is considered to have one additional **supporting** fighter for each of their Hunger counters during that **Attack action.**

9419.name: Untapped Resources
9419.rule: Play this only if your warband holds two or more objectives. Pick one: spend one glory point and gain the Primacy token, or discard the Primacy token and **draw** three power cards.

9420.name: Whetted Hunger
9420.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a fighter is taken out of action by damage **dealt** by a **lethal** hex. Pick a feature token and flip that token. If a fighter is in that hex, **deal** 1 damage to that fighter.

9421.name: Amber Realmstone
9421.rule:
**Realmstone** 
 When this fighter's **Attack action** takes the target out of action, put one amber counter on this card. The following cumulative effects apply, depending on the number of counters on this card: 
 **1+:** +2 Move 
 **2+:** +1 Damage to this fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions** 
 **3+:** -1 Wounds, to a minimum of 1

9422.name: Armed to the Teeth
9422.rule: This fighter's Range 1 **Attack actions** have **Knockback 1**. \n This fighter's Range 2 **Attack actions** have **Ensnare**. \n This fighter's Range 3+ **Attack actions** have Cleave.

9423.name: Armour of Confidence
9423.rule: +1 Defence if you have the Primacy token.

9424.name: Armour of Disdain
9424.rule: This fighter is a **Quarry**. If this fighter is a **Quarry**, gambits cannot **deal** damage to this fighter, and this fighter's Move, Defence and Wounds characteristics cannot be modified.

9425.name: Augmented Limbs
9425.rule: This fighter is a **Quarry**. If this fighter is a **Quarry**, this fighter's Range 1 **Attack actions** have +1 Dice.

9426.name: Awesome Appetite
9426.rule: Each time this fighter makes an **Attack action** that takes an adjacent target out of action, **Heal** (1) this fighter and **give** this fighter one Hunger counter.

9427.name: Biting Axe
9427.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 2] \n On a **critical hit,** this **Attack action** has +1 Damage.

9428.name: Bottomless Appetite
9428.rule: When this fighter is activated, **give** this fighter one Hunger counter. Then if this fighter has a number of Hunger counters equal to or greater than their Wounds characteristic, **deal** 1 damage to this fighter.

9429.name: Charike Claws
9429.rule: This fighter is a **Quarry**. If this fighter is a **Quarry**, this fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions** have **Cleave**. If this fighter is a **Hunter**, this fighter's **Attack actions** have **Cleave**.

9430.name: Chitin Scimitar
9430.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atFury: 3 - :boom: 2 -(Cleave)-] \n If you roll no **successes**, you can **re-roll** one dice in the attack roll.

9431.name: Chitin Spear
9431.rule: [:Hex: 2 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 2] \n If you roll no **successes**, you can **re-roll** one dice in the attack roll.

9432.name: Collector
9432.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's activation in which this fighter makes an **Attack action** that takes an adjacent enemy fighter out of action, give this fighter one upgrade from your hand.

9434.name: Dominant Defender
9434.rule: If this fighter is holding an objective, this fighter is on Guard. \n If this fighter's defence roll includes no successes, discard the Primacy token. \n **Reaction:** After an **Attack action** in which this fighter's defence roll included one or more :dfCrit:, gain the Primacy token.

9435.name: Driven by Envy
9435.rule: +1 Move \n This fighter's **Attack actions** have +1 Dice and **Cleave** if the target is a **leader**.

9436.name: Driven by Hunger
9436.rule: Each time this fighter makes a **Move action**, you can first **remove** one or more of this fighter's Hunger counters. If you do, increase their Move characteristic by that number for that action.

9437.name: Eagle-eye
9437.rule: This fighter is a **Hunter**. You can **re-roll** one attack dice in this fighter's attack rolls for Range 3+ **Attack actions**.

9438.name: Earthing Staff
9438.rule: This fighter is a **Quarry**. If this fighter is a **Quarry**, **backlash** and **gambit spells** cannot **deal** damage to this fighter.

9439.name: Experienced Eye
9439.rule: This fighter is a **Hunter**. \n You can **re-roll** one attack dice in each of this fighter's attack rolls for each instance of the **Quarry** keyword on the target's fighter card and upgrades.

9440.name: Extruded Snare
9440.rule: [:Hex: 3 - :atFury: 3 - :boom: 1] \n If this **Attack action** succeeds, **give** the target one Move token. Then **discard** this card.

9441.name: Eye for Weakness
9441.rule: Each enemy fighter with one or more Hunger counters is a **Quarry**.

9442.name: Famine's Ferocity
9442.rule: [:Hex: 3 - :MagFocus: - - :boom: 1] \n +1 Damage to this **Attack action** if this fighter has three or more hunger counters.

9443.name: Famished Familiar
9443.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's casting roll, **deal** 1 damage to this fighter and **give** this fighter one Hunger counter. If you do, you can **re-roll** one dice in that casting roll.

9444.name: Fearsome Trappings
9444.rule: This fighter is a **Hunter**. In addition, if you have the Primacy token, you can **re-roll** one attack dice in this fighter's attack rolls.

9445.name: Feral Symbiote
9445.rule: +1 Damage to this fighter's Range 1 **Attack actions**. After this fighter's activation, **give** this fighter 1 Hunger counter. Then, if this fighter has 3 or more Hunger counters, **deal** 1 damage to this fighter.

9446.name: Flight Before Food
9446.rule: **Remove** all Hunger counters from this fighter. This fighter is a **Quarry**. If this fighter is a **Quarry**, +1 Move and this fighter cannot have Hunger counters.

9447.name: Formidable Defence
9447.rule: This fighter is a **Quarry**. If this fighter is a **Quarry:** \n +1 Defence. \n -1 Dice from this fighter's **Attack actions** (to a minimum of 1).

9448.name: Geomancer's Gauntlet
9448.rule: **Action:** Flip each feature token within 1 hex.

9449.name: Haughty Resistance
9449.rule: **Reaction:** During an **Attack action** that targets this fighter, after the deal damage step, gain the Primacy token. If you have the Primacy token, instead **discard** the Primacy token and reduce the damage **dealt** by 1 (to a minimum of 1).

9450.name: Hunger for Success
9450.rule: After each activation in which this fighter made one or more **Attack actions**, **give** this fighter one Hunger counter. \n **Reaction:** After this fighter's failed **Attack action**, **remove** three of this fighter's Hunger counters. If you do, this fighter makes an **Attack action.** If that **Attack action** fails, **deal** 1 damage to this fighter.

9451.name: Hunger Siphon
9451.rule: When this fighter is activated, pick one: **remove** one Hunger counter from each adjacent fighter, then **give** an equal number of Hunger counters to this fighter, or **remove** all of this fighter's Hunger counters and **give** an equal number of Hunger counters to one adjacent fighter.

9452.name: Hungering Harpoon
9452.rule: [:Hex: 3 - :atFury: 1 - :boom: 2] \n When you give a fighter this upgrade, **give** that fighter one Hunger counter. \n +2 Dice to this **Attack action** if this fighter has three or more Hunger counters.

9453.name: Hungry Armour
9453.rule: **Give** this fighter one Hunger counter at the beginning of each round. If this fighter has one or more Hunger counters, you can **re-roll** one defence dice in this fighter's defence rolls.

9454.name: Impressive Bulk
9454.rule: -1 Move, to a minimum of 0 \n +1 Wounds \n This fighter is **Quarry**.

9455.name: Inured by Hunger
9455.rule: **Reaction:** Use this during an **Attack action** that targets this fighter, after the determine success step. If you do, **remove** all of this fighter's Hunger counters. Reduce the damage **dealt** to this fighter by that **Attack action** by the number of counters **removed**, to a minimum 1.

9456.name: Keen Hunger
9456.rule: **Reaction:** Use this during this fighter's **Attack action**, after the attack roll. **Remove** one Hunger counter from this fighter. If you do, you can **re-roll** one attack dice in that attack roll.

9457.name: Labyrinth Boots
9457.rule: To resolve this fighter's **Move action**, make a sequence of the objectives on the battlefield from lowest to highest (this will normally be 1, 2, 3, 4, 5). If this fighter is not in the same hex as an objective, or is in the same hex as the last objective in the sequence, **place** them in the same hex as the first objective in the sequence. Otherwise, **place** them in the same hex as the next objective in the sequence. If you cannot do this, this fighter cannot make a **Move action**.

9458.name: Mask of the Silent People
9458.rule: **Silent Relic** \n This fighter is a **Quarry**. If this fighter is a **Quarry**, each enemy fighter is a **Quarry**.

9459.name: Master Commander
9459.rule: **Action:** Discard the Primacy token. If you do, **push** each other surviving friendly fighter up to 1 hex. \n If this fighter is taken out of action, discard the Primacy token.

9460.name: Master Duellist
9460.rule: **Action:** Discard the Primacy token. If you do, this fighter makes one Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action** with +2 Dice. \n If this fighter is taken out of action, discard the Primacy token.

9461.name: Master of Spoils
9461.rule: Gain the Primacy token each time this fighter makes an **Attack action** that takes an enemy fighter out of action. After this fighter is taken out of action, discard the Primacy token.

9462.name: Master of Ways
9462.rule: **Action:** Discard the Primacy token. If you do, **place** this fighter in the same hex as an objective token. Then **give** this fighter one Charge token. \n If this fighter is taken out of action, discard the Primacy token.

9463.name: Mundane Razor
9463.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 2] \n **Reaction:** After the attack roll for this **Attack action**, if you rolled one or more successes, pick one persisting gambit and **discard** it.

9464.name: Painful Brilliance
9464.rule: -1 Dice from Range 3+ **Attack actions** that target this fighter, to a minimum of 1 \n -1 Dice from **Attack actions** that target this fighter instead, to a minimum of 1, if you have the Primacy token.

9465.name: Preybond
9465.rule: This fighter is a **Quarry** If this fighter is a **Quarry**, when this fighter is the target of an **Attack action**, this fighter is considered to have one additional **supporting** fighter for each other surviving friendly **Quarry**.

9466.name: Preyscent
9466.rule: This fighter is a **Quarry** If this fighter is a **Quarry**, this fighter can make the following reaction: \n **Reaction:** After an enemy fighter's activation, if that fighter is 2 hexes from this fighter, or if that fighter has three or more Hunger counters, push that fighter 1 hex towards this fighter.

9467.name: Preyskin Mask
9467.rule: This fighter is a **Quarry**. -1 Dice to this fighter's **Attack actions** (to a minimum of 1). This card cannot be **discarded**. \n **Reaction:** During a Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action** that targets this fighter, after the deal damage step, give the attacker this upgrade.

9468.name: Primal Lunge
9468.rule: **Reaction:** After an activation, discard the Primacy token. If you do, this fighter makes one **Move action** or **Attack action**. Then **discard** this card.

9469.name: Proud Runner
9469.rule: +1 Move \n Each time this fighter finishes a **Move action** 5 or more hexes from where the **Move action** began, gain the Primacy token. At the end of the action phase, if this fighter has no Move or Charge tokens, **discard** the Primacy token.

9470.name: Rampaging Killer
9470.rule: This fighter is a **Hunter** and a **Quarry**. \n This fighter's Range 1 **Attack actions** have **Scything**. After each superaction made by this fighter, **deal** 2 damage to this fighter.

9471.name: Ravening Stone
9471.rule: **Metalith** \n This fighter is a **Hunter**. \n At the end of each action phase, pick one: **give** one Hunger counter to each fighter within 2 hexes, or **remove** one Hunger counter from each fighter within 2 hexes.

9472.name: Regenerative Cycle
9472.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's activation, **discard** one or more power cards. **Heal** (X) this fighter where X is the number of power cards you **discarded.**

9473.name: Rod of the Archmage
9473.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's **gambit spell** or **spell Attack action** that takes one or more enemy fighters out of action, gain the Primacy token.

9474.name: Savage Agility
9474.rule: This fighter is a **Hunter.** \n **Reaction:** After a failed Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action** that targets this fighter, **deal** 1 damage to the attacker.

9475.name: Savage Hunger
9475.rule: This fighter is a **Hunter**. \n If this fighter has one or more Hunger counters, this fighter's Range 1 **Attack actions** have **Ensnare**.

9476.name: Savage Soldier
9476.rule: This fighter has the following cumulative benefits, determined by how many upgrades they have: \n **2+:** +1 Dice to this fighter's Range 1 **Attack actions** \n **4+:** This fighter's **Attack actions** have **Cleave** and **Ensnare.**

9477.name: Savage Speed
9477.rule: This fighter is a **Hunter**. \n +2 Move. \n -1 Defence (to a minimum of 1).

9478.name: Savage Strength
9478.rule: This fighter is a **Hunter**. \n +1 Damage to this fighter's Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack actions**. \n -1 Defence (to a minimum of 1).

9479.name: Savage Visage
9479.rule: This fighter is a **Hunter**. \n You can **re-roll** one dice in this fighter's attack rolls for Range 1 **Attack actions** for each of this fighter's upgrades that have one or more instances of the **Hunter** keyword.

9480.name: Scavenged Armour
9480.rule: You cannot give this upgrade to a fighter in your territory. When you give this upgrade to a fighter, **give** that fighter one Guard token. \n +1 Wounds.

9481.name: Silent Armour
9481.rule:
**Silent Relic** 
 This fighter is a **Quarry**. If this fighter is a **Quarry**, this fighter has the following reaction. 
 **Reaction:** After this fighter's **Move action**, **remove** all Guard tokens from enemy fighters adjacent to this fighter. 
 +1 Wounds if this fighter has two or more **Silent Relics**.

9482.name: Silent Bracers
9482.rule: **Silent Relic** \n This fighter is a **Quarry**. If this fighter is a **Quarry**, this fighter can move through **blocked** and **occupied** hexes, but must end their move in an **empty** hex. If this fighter's **Move action** begins in non one's territory, this fighter has +2 Move for the duration of that action. \n +1 Move if this fighter has two or more **Silent Relics**.

9483.name: Silent Helm
9483.rule: **Silent Relic** \n This fighter is a **Quarry**. If this fighter is a **Quarry**, each time this fighter is the target of an **Attack action**, one :atCrit: in the **attack** roll is considered to be a **success** instead. \n If this fighter has three or more **Silent Relics**, you can **re-roll** one dice in this fighter's defence rolls.

9484.name: Silent Ring
9484.rule:
**Silent Relic** 
 This fighter is a **Quarry**. If this fighter is a **Quarry**, this fighter has the following reaction. 
 **Reaction:** After this fighter's activation, if you have three or fewer power cards in your hand, **draw** one power card. 
 +1 Dice to this fighter's Range 1 **Attack actions** if this fighter has two or more **Silent Relics**.

9485.name: Silent Shield
9485.rule: **Silent Relic** \n This fighter is a **Quarry**. If this fighter is a **Quarry** and in no one's territory, their Defence characteristic is :dfBlock: 2. \n This fighter is on Guard if this fighter has three or more **Silent Relics**.

9486.name: Silent Sword
9486.rule:
**Silent Relic** 
 This fighter is a **Quarry**. 
 [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 3 - :boom: 2] 
 If this fighter is a **Quarry** and in no one's territory, +1 Damage to this **Attack action.** 
 This **Attack action** has **Ensnare** if this fighter has two or more **Silent Relics.**

9487.name: Soultooth Bow
9487.rule: This fighter is a **Hunter**. \n [:Hex: 4 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 1] \n You can **re-roll** one dice in the attack roll if the target has one or more Move and/or Charge tokens.

9488.name: Soultooth Dagger
9488.rule: This fighter is a **Hunter**. \n [:Hex: 1 - :atFury: 3 - :boom: 2] \n +1 Damage on a **critical hit**. You can **re-roll** one dice in the attack roll if the target has one or more Move and/or Charge tokens.

9489.name: Soultooth Darts
9489.rule: This fighter is a **Hunter**. \n [:Hex: 3 - :atFury: 3 - :boom: 1 -(Ensnare)-] \n You can **re-roll** one dice in the attack roll if the target has one or more Move and/or Charge tokens.

9490.name: Soultooth Javelin
9490.rule: This fighter is a **Hunter**. \n [:Hex: 3 - :atFury: 3 - :boom: 1 -(Cleave)-] \n +1 Damage when made during this fighter's **Charge action**. You can **re-roll** one dice in the attack roll if the target has one or more Move and/or Charge tokens. After making this **Attack action**, **discard** this card.

9491.name: Soultooth Net
9491.rule:
This fighter is a **Hunter.** 
 [:Hex: 2 - :atFury: 3 - :boom: 1] 
 If this **Attack action** succeeds, **give** the target one Charge token. You can **re-roll** one dice in the attack roll if the target has one or more Move and/or Charge tokens. 
 After making this **Attack action**, **discard** this card.

9492.name: Soultooth Spear
9492.rule: This fighter is a **Hunter**. \n [:Hex: 2 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 2] \n You can **re-roll** one dice in the attack roll if the target has one or more Move and/or Charge tokens.

9493.name: Soundless Step
9493.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's activation, **push** this fighter 1 hex.

9494.name: Spiteglass
9494.rule: **Reaction:** After an **Attack action** that targets this fighter, pick one of the attacker's upgrades. **Discard** that card and this card.

9495.name: Starvation's Grip
9495.rule: If this fighter has one or more Hunger counters, this fighter cannot be pushed.

9496.name: Swift Soldier
9496.rule: This fighter has the following cumulative benefits, determined by how many upgrades they have: \n **2+:** +1 Move \n **4+:** +2 Move

9497.name: Terror Shield
9497.rule: This fighter is a **Quarry**. \n **Reaction:** After an enemy fighter's **Move action** made during that fighter's activation, if that fighter is adjacent to this fighter and this fighter is a **Quarry**, roll one magic dice. On a roll of :MagChannel:, this fighter has +1 Defence until the end of that enemy fighter's activation.

9498.name: Tremendous Maul
9498.rule: [:Hex: 2 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 2] \n **Cleave** and **Knockback 2** if you have the Primacy token.

9499.name: Voidsphere
9499.rule: **Action:** **Discard** all **persisting** gambits. \n [:Hex: 3 - :atFury: 3 - :boom: 1] \n On a **critical hit** this **Attack action** has +1 Damage. After making this **Attack action**, **discard** this card.

9500.name: Wicked Lash
9500.rule: [:Hex: 2 - :atFury: 2 - :boom: 1] \n +1 Dice and +1 Damage if this fighter has one or more wound counters \n +1 Dice and +1 Damage if the target has one or more wound counters.

10001.name: Advancing Storm
10001.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation in which a friendly fighter makes a Range 1 **Attack action** that takes an enemy fighter in enemy territory out of action.

10002.name: Balanced Strategy
10002.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an opponent's activation if your warband holds objectives 2 and 4.

10003.name: Bold Claim
10003.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an opponent's activation if your warband holds two or more of the following objectives: 1, 3 and 5.

10004.name: Bulwark Against the Dark
10004.rule: Score this in an end phase if each surviving friendly fighter has one or more upgrades.

10005.name: Crucial Objective
10005.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an opponent's activation if your warband holds objective 2 or 4.

10006.name: Great Purification
10006.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds 3 or more objectives or if 4 or more enemy fighters are out of action.

10007.name: Here We Stand
10007.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds two or more objectives.

10008.name: Lightning Strike
10008.rule: Score this in an end phase if an enemy **leader** is out of action.

10009.name: Point Blank
10009.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation in which a friendly fighter made a successful Range 3+ **Attack action** which targeted an adjacent enemy fighter.

10010.name: Righteous Banishment
10010.rule: Score this in an end phase if two or more enemy fighters are out of action.

10011.name: Shining Heroes
10011.rule: Score this in an end phase if each surviving friendly fighter is Inspired.

10012.name: Zone of Banishment
10012.rule: Score this in an end phase if there are no enemy fighters in your territory.

10013.name: Aetheric Channelling
10013.rule: Play this only in an opponent's power step. The first Range 3+ **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has your pick of +1 Dice, **Cleave** or **Ensnare**.

10014.name: Channelled Step
10014.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter holding an objective that is not within 2 hexes of any enemy fighters. **Place** that fighter on another objective token that is not within 2 hexes of any enemy fighters. **Give** that fighter one Move token.

10015.name: Concerted Consolidation
10015.rule: **Choose** up to two friendly fighters in your territory. **Push** each chosen fighter 1 hex towards the nearest objective token.

10016.name: Distracting Shot
10016.rule: Play this only in your power step. -1 Dice from enemy fighter's **Attack actions** in the next activation (to a minimum of 1).

10017.name: Greatbow Block
10017.rule: Play this only in your power step. Each time a friendly fighter other than Sleek is **dealt** damage in the next activation, reduce that damage to 1.

10018.name: Healing Tempest
10018.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter and roll one defence dice. On a roll of :dfBlock:, **Heal** (2) that fighter. Otherwise **Heal** (1) that fighter.

10019.name: Lightning Flare
10019.rule: Play this only in your power step. In the next activation, enemy fighters cannot target fighters that are 2 or more hexes away.

10020.name: Raise the Alarm
10020.rule: Play this only in an opponent's power step. +1 Dice to friendly fighters' **Attack actions** in the next activation that target an enemy fighter with one or more Charge tokens.

10021.name: Stalwart Defence
10021.rule: Play this only in your power step. +1 Defence to each friendly fighter holding an objective in the next activation.

10022.name: Swift Step
10022.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter. **Push** that fighter 1 hex. **Push** that fighter up to 2 hexes instead if it is Sleek.

10023.name: Cautious Advance
10023.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's activation in which this fighter made an **Attack action**, **push** this fighter 1 hex.

10024.name: Concussive Cloud
10024.rule: [:Hex: 3 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 1 -(Knockback 1)-] \n If this **Attack action** succeeds, **give** the target one Move token.

10025.name: Cool Head
10025.rule: You can **re-roll** one dice in this fighter's attack rolls.

10026.name: I'll Cover You!
10026.rule: If this fighter has not yet made a Thunderhead Greatblow **Attack action** in this round, each time a friendly fighter within 3 hexes is the target of an **Attack action**, this fighter is a **supporting** fighter.

10027.name: Long Ranged
10027.rule: +1 Range to this fighter's Thunderhead Greatbow **Attack action**.

10028.name: Loyal Companion
10028.rule: **Reaction:** After another friendly fighter's activation, **push** this fighter up to 2 hexes so that the two fighters are adjacent. If you cannot, you cannot use this reaction.

10029.name: Reconquerer
10029.rule: +1 Move \n **Reaction:** After this fighter's **Move action**, **push** this fighter 1 hex onto an objective token.

10030.name: Reconsecrate
10030.rule: **Action:** This fighter can only make this action if this fighter is in the same hex as an objective token. Pick another objective token. **Place** each objective token in the hex the other token was in. Then **give** this fighter one Charge token.

10032.name: Strength of Sigmar
10032.rule: +1 Damage to this fighter's Range 1 **Attack actions**.

10033.name: Death's Bounty
10033.rule: Score this in an end phase if four or more enemy fighters are out of action.

10034.name: Death's Triumph
10034.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds two or more objectives in enemy territory.

10035.name: Deathly Blooms
10035.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds one or more objectives in enemy territory.

10036.name: Dread Harvest
10036.rule: Score this in an end phase if two or more enemy fighters are out of action.

10037.name: Ethereal Hunters
10037.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation in which a friendly fighter made a **Charge action** in which they moved through one or more **blocked** and/or **occupied** hexes.

10038.name: Inevitable Advance
10038.rule: Score this in an end phase if each surviving friendly fighter has one or more Move and/or Charge tokens.

10039.name: Massed Blades
10039.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation in which a friendly fighter made an **Attack action** with one or more **supporting** fighters.

10040.name: Piercing Blow
10040.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation in which a friendly fighter's **Attack action** with **Cleave** was successful.

10041.name: Scythed Down
10041.rule: Score this in an end phase if three or more enemy fighters are out of action.

10042.name: The Hunt Pursues
10042.rule: Score this in an end phase if each surviving friendly fighter is in enemy territory.

10043.name: Unstoppable Death
10043.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation in which a friendly fighter made a **Charge action** in which they took an enemy fighter out of action.

10044.name: Vengeance of Nagash
10044.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an activation in which a friendly fighter made an **Attack action** that took an enemy **leader** out of action.

10045.name: Deadly Vengeance
10045.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during an enemy fighter's **Attack action**, after the deal damage step, if that **Attack action** will take a friendly fighter out of action. That friendly fighter makes an **Attack action**.

10046.name: Drifting Death
10046.rule: **Choose** up to two friendly fighters. **Push** each chosen fighter 1 hex closer to the nearest enemy fighter.

10047.name: Enervating Beat
10047.rule: Play this only in your power step. -1 Damage from enemy fighters' Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions** in the next activation (to a minimum of 1).

10048.name: Fevered Beat
10048.rule: Play this only in your power step. Enemy fighter's **Attack actions** have the :atFury: characteristic in the next activation.

10049.name: Heart-piercer
10049.rule: Play this only in an opponent's power step. The first Range 2 **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter in the next activations has **Cleave**.

10050.name: Horrifying Shriek
10050.rule: **Choose** one enemy fighter within 3 hexes of one or more friendly fighters. **Push** the chosen fighter 1 hex.

10051.name: Methodical Attacks
10051.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an activation in which a friendly fighter made a failed **Attack action**. That fighter makes an **Attack action**.

10052.name: Somnolent Beat
10052.rule: Play this only in your power step. -1 Move from enemy fighters in the next activation (to a minimum of 0).

10053.name: Stuff of Nightmares
10053.rule: **Choose** one enemy fighter within 2 hexes of a friendly fighter and roll one attack dice. On a roll of :atSmash:, **deal** 1 damage to the chosen fighter.

10054.name: Unending Pursuit
10054.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter. **Push** that fighter 1 hex.

10055.name: Bitter Strength
10055.rule: +1 Damage to this fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions**.

10056.name: Carrion Companion
10056.rule: After this fighter's **Attack action** which takes an adjacent enemy fighter out of action, gain 1 glory point.

10057.name: Death Grasp
10057.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 3 - :boom: 2] \n If this **Attack action** succeeds, **give** the target one Move token.

10060.name: Murderous Accomplice
10060.rule: **Reaction:** After another friendly fighter's **Move action** made as part of a **Charge action**, **push** this fighter up to 2 hexes so that this fighter is adjacent to one or more of that fighter's targets.

10061.name: Murderpact
10061.rule: +1 Damage to this fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions** if this fighter has one or more **supporting** fighters. \n +1 Dice to other friendly fighters' **Attack actions** if this fighter is **supporting** the attacker.

10062.name: Pall of Fear
10062.rule: -1 Dice from enemy fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions** that target this fighter (to a minimum of 1).

10064.name: The Point of Death
10064.rule: You can **re-roll** one dice in this fighter's attack rolls during this fighter's **Charge action**.

11001.name: Annihilation
11001.rule: Score this in an end phase if *each enemy fighter* is out of action.

11002.name: Branching Fate
11002.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after an **Attack action** if you roll three or more dice during the attack or defence roll and they all show a different symbol.

11003.name: Conquest
11003.rule: Score this in the third end phase if each surviving friendly fighter is in one opponent's territory.

11004.name: Denial
11004.rule: Score this in the third end phase if there are no enemy fighters in your territory.

11005.name: Great Gains
11005.rule: Score this in an end phase if you scored five or more glory points in this round.

11006.name: Hold Objective 1
11006.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objective *1*.

11007.name: Hold Objective 2
11007.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objective *2*.

11008.name: Hold Objective 3
11008.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objective *3*.

11009.name: Hold Objective 4
11009.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objective *4*.

11010.name: Hold Objective 5
11010.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objective *5*.

11011.name: Making a Statement
11011.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds each objective in one opponent's territory.

11012.name: No Remorse
11012.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after a friendly fighter's **Attack action** that takes an enemy fighter out of action, if that **Attack action** had a Damage characteristic greater than the target's Wounds characteristic.

11013.name: Path to Victory
11013.rule: **Dual:** Score this in an end phase if \n One or more enemy fighters were taken out of action in the preceding action phase \n *And:* Your warband holds two or more objectives.

11014.name: Plant a Standard
11014.rule: Score this in an end phase if your **leader** holds an objective in enemy territory.

11015.name: Pure Carnage
11015.rule: Score this in the third end phase if *seven or more* fighters are out of action.

11016.name: Strong Start
11016.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after the first fighter is taken out of action in this round, if that fighter is an enemy fighter.

11017.name: Supremacy
11017.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds three or more objectives.

11018.name: Tactical Supremacy 1-2
11018.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objectives 1 and 2.

11019.name: Tactical Supremacy 3-4
11019.rule: Score this in an end phase if your warband holds objectives 3 and 4.

11020.name: Victorious Duel
11020.rule: **Surge:** Score this immediately after your **leader's Attack action** which takes an enemy **leader** out of action.

11021.name: Centre of Attention
11021.rule: **Choose** one fighter and **push** each other fighter that is within 2 hexes of the chosen fighter up to 1 hex so that they are closer to the chosen fighter in an order you choose.

11022.name: Commanding Stride
11022.rule: **Push** your **leader** up to 3 hexes. After this **push** your **leader** must be in a **starting** hex.

11023.name: Confusion
11023.rule: **Choose** two fighters that are adjacent to each other. **Place** each fighter in the hex that was occupied by the other fighter when you chose them.

11024.name: Countercharge
11024.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an enemy fighter's **Move action** that is part of a **Charge action**. **Choose** one friendly fighter and **push** the chosen fighter up to 3 hexes. The chosen fighter must end this **push** adjacent to the enemy fighter.

11025.name: Daylight Robbery
