11025.rule: Roll one attack dice. On a roll of :atSmash: or :atCrit: take one unspent glory point from one opponent.

11026.name: Determined Effort
11026.rule: +1 Dice to the first **Attack action** made in the next activation.

11027.name: Duel of Wits
11027.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an opponent plays a ploy. **Draw** two power cards.

11028.name: Flickering Step
11028.rule: Roll eight dice. **Choose** one friendly fighter and **push** the chosen fighter up to a number of hexes equal to the number of :atCrit: rolled.

11029.name: Grievous Riposte
11029.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a failed Range 1 **Attack action** that targets a friendly fighter, if there was one or more :dfCrit: in the defence roll. **Deal** 2 damage to the attacker.

11030.name: Healing Potion
11030.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter and roll one defence dice. On a roll of :dfBlock: or :dfCrit: **Heal** (2) that fighter. Otherwise **Heal** (1) that fighter.

11031.name: Inspired Attack
11031.rule: +1 Dice and +1 Damage to the first Range 1 **Attack action** made by an Inspired friendly fighter in the next activation.

11032.name: Inspired Command
11032.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter other than your **leader** and pick one: **push** the chosen fighter 1 hex, or **give** the chosen fighter one Guard token.

11033.name: Keen Avarice
11033.rule: The first Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has +1 Dice and **Cleave** if the target holds an objective.

11034.name: Lethal Ward
11034.rule: Pick one objective token. **Deal** 1 damage to any fighter in the same hex as that token.

11035.name: Mighty Swing
11035.rule: The first Range 1 **Attack action** made by a friendly fighter in the next activation has **Scything**.

11036.name: Mirror Move
11036.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an opponent **pushes** one fighter. **Choose** one other fighter and **push** the chosen fighter the same number of hexes.

11037.name: Misdirection
11037.rule: **Reaction:** Play this when one friendly fighter is chosen by a ploy. **Choose** one other friendly fighter that could be chosen by that ploy. That fighter is chosen instead.

11038.name: No Time
11038.rule: Power cards cannot be played until after the next activation.

11039.name: Shifting Shards
11039.rule: Pick one objective token in an **empty** hex and move that objective token into an adjacent hex.

11040.name: Sidestep
11040.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter and **push** that fighter 1 hex.

11041.name: Army of One
11041.rule: If this fighter is the last surviving friendly fighter: \n +1 Defence \n +1 Dice to this fighter's **Attack actions**.

11042.name: Bag of Tricks
11042.rule: **Action:** Search your power deck for a card, reveal it to each opponent and add it to your hand. Then shuffle your power deck and **give** this fighter one Charge token.

11043.name: Champion's Fortitude
11043.rule: You can **re-roll** one dice in this fighter's defence rolls.

11045.name: Duellist's Speed
11045.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter's **Attack action**, but not during a superaction, **push** this fighter 1 hex.

11046.name: Earthing Stone
11046.rule: **Metalith** \n If this fighter is in the same hex as an objective token in one player's territory, fighters cannot hold objectives in that territory.

11047.name: Fighter's Ferocity
11047.rule: On a **critical hit**, this fighter's **Attack actions** have +1 Damage.

11048.name: Gloryseeker
11048.rule: +1 Damage to this fighter's **Attack actions** that target a fighter with a Wounds characteristic of 4 or more.

11051.name: Great Strength
11051.rule: +1 Damage to this fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions**.

11052.name: Guardian Glaive
11052.rule: [:Hex: 2 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 2] \n If this fighter holds an objective, you can **re-roll** any number of attack dice in the attack roll.

11053.name: Horrifying Armour
11053.rule: -1 Wounds (to a minimum of 1) \n -1 Dice from adjacent enemy fighters' **Attack actions** (to a minimum of 1).

11055.name: Mutating Maul
11055.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 2] \n Before the attack roll, pick **Cleave** or **Knockback** 1. This **Attack action** has that ability until it has been resolved.

11056.name: Potion of Grace
11056.rule: **Reaction:** After this fighter is given one Move token, **discard** this card. **Remove** that token.

11057.name: Quickening Greaves
11057.rule: In each round, you can do one of the following: **push** this fighter 1 hex before the roll to determine who has the first activation. or **push** this fighter 1 hex after the final power step.

11058.name: Regenerative Charm
11058.rule: At the start of each round **Heal** (1) this fighter.

11059.name: Shardcaller
11059.rule: At the beginning of each action phase, you can pick one objective held by this fighter and one other objective, then **place** each objective you picked in the hex that contained the other objective.

11060.name: Swordbreaker
11060.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 3 - :boom: 2] \n On a **critical hit**, pick one of the target's **Attack action** upgrades. **Discard** that card.

12001.name: A Cunning Ruse
12001.rule: Reveal two power cards in your hand to your opponents. Then pick one opponent and up to two random power cards in their hand. That opponent must reveal those cards to each player.

12002.name: A Good Death
12002.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an enemy fighter's **Attack action** that takes a friendly fighter with a lower Wounds characteristic than the attacker out of action. Gain 1 spent glory point.

12003.name: A Hard Death
12003.rule: **Reaction:** Play this during an enemy fighter's **Attack action**, after the deal damage step, if that **Attack action dealt** enough damage to a friendly fighter to take that fighter out of action. Roll one magic dice for each enemy fighter adjacent to that friendly fighter. On a roll of :MagChannel:, **deal** 1 damage to that fighter and **give** that fighter one Move token.

12004.name: Abject Grovelling
12004.rule: Pick one opponent and a number between 1 and 3. That opponent gains that amount of spent glory points. After your opponent gains those glory points, you can **draw** up to X power cards or **Heal** (X) one surviving friendly fighter, where X was the number you picked.

12005.name: Arcane Apoplexy
12005.rule: **Gambit Spell (:MagChannel::MagChannel:):** If **cast**, +1 Dice and +1 Damage to Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions**. This effect **persists** until the end of the action phase.

12006.name: Breaking the Food Chain
12006.rule: +1 Dice to **Attack actions** that target an enemy fighter with a Wounds characteristic of 5 or higher. This effect **persists** until a fighter with a Wounds characteristic of 5 or higher is taken out of action.

12007.name: Burning Wrath
12007.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter. You can **re-roll** any number of attack dice in that fighter's attack rolls. At the start of each of your activations, **deal** 1 damage to the chosen fighter. This effect **persists** until the chosen fighter is taken out of action.

12008.name: Courage of the Meek
12008.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter with a Wounds characteristic of 3 or less. In the next activation, after the first time the chosen fighter's **Attack action** takes a target with a higher Wounds characteristic out of action, gain 1 glory point.

12009.name: Dark Sacrifice
12009.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a gambit or **Attack action** that takes one or more friendly fighters out of action. **Draw** two power cards.

12010.name: Drawing Power
12010.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter that is holding an objective. **Deal** 1 damage to the chosen fighter and **give** that fighter one Guard token and one Charge token. \n +1 Dice and +1 Damage to that fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions**. This effect **persists** until the chosen fighter is taken out of action.

12011.name: Final Gambit
12011.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter and roll three attack dice. If you roll one or more :atCrit:, the chosen fighter makes a **Charge action**. If you do not roll any :atCrit:, the chosen fighter is taken out of action.

12012.name: Finish It!
12012.rule: The first **Attack action** made in the next activation is treated as having been made as a reaction to a successful **Attack action** with **Combo** that targeted the same fighter.

12013.name: If at First You Don't Succeed...
12013.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's failed **Attack action** that was made as a reaction to that fighter's successful **Attack action** with **Combo**. Make that **Attack action** again, and treat it as having been made as a reaction to a successful **Attack action** with **Combo** that targeted the same fighter.

12014.name: Lessons Learned
12014.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a gambit or **Attack action** that takes one or more friendly fighters out of action. Friendly fighters have **Innate** (:dfDodge::dfBlock:). This effect **persists** until after an **Attack action** that targeted a friendly fighter, or until a friendly fighter is taken out of action.

12015.name: Lights Out!
12015.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's successful **Attack action** with **Combo**. **Give** the target one Charge token.

12016.name: Never Saw It Coming
12016.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after a friendly fighter's **Attack action** with **Combo** that took an enemy fighter out of action. Gain 1 glory point.

12017.name: Omega's Offering
12017.rule: **Choose** one friendly fighter and put one glory point on this card. Ater the chosen fighter is taken out of action by an enemy warband, you gain the glory point on this card. This effect **persists** until the chosen fighter is taken out of action.

12018.name: Quick Opener
12018.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after you give a friendly fighter an **Attack action** upgrade with **Combo**. That fighter makes that **Attack action**.

12019.name: Scent of Weakness
12019.rule: You can **re-roll** one dice in friendly fighters' attack rolls for **Attack actions** that target an enemy fighter with one or more wound counters. This effect **persists** until a fighter is taken out of action.

12020.name: Your Blade is Broken
12020.rule: **Reaction:** Play this after an enemy fighter's Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action** that takes a friendly fighter out of action. Reduce that **Attack action's** Damage characteristic by 1, to a minimum of 1. This effect **persists** until that enemy fighter is taken out of action.

12021.name: Berserker Rage
12021.rule: +1 Dice and +1 Damage to this fighter's Range 1 **Attack actions**. \n During **Attack actions** that target this fighter, skip the defence roll in the combat sequence for that **Attack action**. This fighter is considered to have rolled 0 **successes** in their defence roll.

12022.name: Blessing of Behemat
12022.rule: When this fighter makes a **Move action**, this fighter can move through **blocked** and **occupied** hexes and cannot be **dealt** damage by **lethal** hexes. This fighter must end their **Move action** in an **empty** hex. After this upgrade is given to a fighter, discard one glory point. If you do not, **discard** this card.

12024.name: Dying Curse
12024.rule: **Reaction:** During an enemy fighter's **Attack action**, after the deal damage step, if that **Attack action dealt** enough damage to this fighter to take them out of action, **discard** this card. \n -2 Wounds to the attacker, to a minimum of 1. This effect **persists** in the same way as a persistent gambit until the attacked is taken out of action.

12025.name: Fortress of Arrogance
12025.rule: +2 Wounds \n During **Attack actions** that target this fighter, skip the attack and defence roll: no dice are rolled. Instead each **Attack action** that targets this fighter results in a **critical hit**.

12026.name: Heavy Reminder
12026.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 1] \n Rolls of :atSmash: and :atFury: are **successes** for attack rolls for this **Attack action**. \n **Reaction:** After this fighter's successful **Attack action** with **Combo**, make this **Attack action**. It must target the same fighter. When made in this way, +2 Damage to this **Attack action**.

12027.name: Insanely Territorial
12027.rule: You can **re-roll** any number of dice in this fighter's defence rolls and any number of attack dice in attack rolls for this fighter's Range 1 and Range 2 **Attack actions**. This fighter cannot make **Move actions**.

12028.name: Puncturing Riposte
12028.rule: **Reaction:** During an enemy fighter's **Attack action**, after the deal damage step, if that **Attack action dealt** enough damage to this fighter to take them out of action, **choose** one adjacent enemy fighter and then **discard** this card. \n **Deal** 1 damage to the chosen fighter at the beginning of each round. This effect **persists** in the same way as a persistent gambit until that fighter is taken out of action.

12029.name: Return Strike
12029.rule: **Reaction:** During an enemy fighter's **Attack action**, after the deal damage step, if that **Attack action dealt** enough damage to this fighter to take them out of action, **discard** this card. \n -1 Move, to a minimum of 1, and -1 Defence, to a minimum of 1, from the attacker. This effect **persists** in the same way as a persistent gambit until the attacker is taken out of action.

12030.name: Screaming Demise
12030.rule: **Reaction:** During an enemy fighter's **Attack action**, after the deal damage step, if that **Attack action dealt** enough damage to this fighter to take them out of action, **choose** one enemy fighter and then **discard** this card. \n **Give** the chosen fighter one Charge token.

12031.name: Shadowstep Blow
12031.rule: [:Hex: 2 - :atFury: 3 - :boom: 2 -(Combo, Ensnare)-] \n This **Attack action's** characteristics cannot be modified.

12032.name: Spinning Menace
12032.rule: +1 Dice and **Scything** to this fighter's Range 1 **Attack actions**, other than **Attack actions** with **Combo**. \n To resolve this fighter's **Move action**, **Scatter** 3 from this fighter's hex and **push** this fighter along the **chain** to the **end hex**. If this fighter cannot be pushed into a hex, the **push** ends in the last hex in the **chain** this fighter can occupy.

12033.name: The Glory Kill
12033.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 2] \n **Reaction:** After this fighter's successful **Attack action** with **Combo**, make this **Attack action**. \n If, after being made as a reaction to this fighter's successful **Attack action** with **Combo**, this **Attack action** takes an enemy fighter out of action, gain 1 glory point.

12034.name: The Last Word
12034.rule: **Reaction:** After a Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action** that takes this fighter out of action, roll one magic dice and then **discard** this card. You can use this reaction when this fighter is out of action. \n On a roll of :MagChannel:, **deal** 2 damage to the fighter whose **Attack action** took this fighter out of action.

12035.name: The Seal of Ordolos
12035.rule: **Seal of Power** \n +2 Defence \n After an **Attack action** in which you made a defence roll for this fighter that contained one or more :dfCrit:, **deal** 1 damage to this fighter and pick one opponent. That opponent gains 1 glory point.

12036.name: The Seal of Primus
12036.rule: **Seal of Power** \n This fighter's **Attack actions** that target an adjacent fighter have **Cleave** and **Ensnare**. \n After this fighter is taken out of action, pick one opponent. That opponent gains 1 glory point.

12037.name: The Seal of Retris
12037.rule: **Seal of Power** \n **Reaction:** After an upgrade this fighter has is discarded, give this fighter that upgrade. Then **discard** this card.

12038.name: The Seal of Ultimus
12038.rule:
**Seal of Power** 
 This upgrade has the following cumulative effects, depending on the number of **Seal of Power** upgrades this fighter has: 
 **2+:** +1 Wounds 
 **3+:** +1 Move 
 **4+: Action:** Pick one opponent. Take one of that opponent's glory points. Then **discard** this card.

12039.name: The Seal of Xereus
12039.rule: **Seal of Power** \n **Reaction:** During this fighter's Range 1 or Range 2 **Attack action**, after the drive back step, **deal** 1 damage to the target and **give** this fighter a Charge token. If you do, pick one opponent. That opponent gains 1 glory point.

12040.name: The Setup
12040.rule: [:Hex: 1 - :atSmash: 2 - :boom: 1 -(Combo)-] \n This **Attack action's** characteristics cannot be modified. Skip the defence roll in the combat sequence for this **Attack action:** the target is considered to have rolled 0 successes in their defence roll.

cardrestrictions.1167: Lurking Skaven, Hungering Skaven, Festering Skaven
